<p><i>Landmark Broadcast Delivers Pristine 4K Ultra HDTV Signals</i></p><p><b>SEOUL, Sept. 21, 2015 </b> Leading Korean broadcaster SBS partnered with LG Electronics for the first live over-the-air broadcast of 4K Ultra HD signals using technologies behind the emerging ATSC 3.0 next-generation television broadcast standard.</p><p>Youngsoo Park, SBS Chief Technology Officer, said this marks the first time ATSC 3.0 broadcasting technologies have been successfully tested in Korea. This is significant achievement in realizing the feasibility of new broadcasting technology and an important first step in preparation for next years test transmissions here.</p><p>SBS and LG successfully demonstrated transmission and reception of 4K UHD and HD mobile signals simultaneously in a single 6-MHz channel. LG also demonstrated capability to receive HD mobile signals in a fast-moving vehicle using the robust technology expected to be part of the ATSC 3.0 physical layer.</p><p>Dr. Skott Ahn, President and CTO, LG Electronics, said, LG is leading the way in development and commercialization of ATSC 3.0. Test broadcasts like this show how we are partnering with broadcasters around the world to drive adoption next-generation broadcasting technology.</p><p>This months landmark Korean broadcast comes on the heels of field tests in the United States conducted since last fall by LG Electronics, its Zenith R&amp;D Lab, and GatesAir.</p><p>The real-world field tests in Seoul, Cleveland and Madison, Wis., represent important milestones in the collaborative effort by LG, GatesAir and Zenith to develop core technologies behind the new ATSC 3.0 Standard. Their innovations are expected to be used in the majority of the baseline Physical Layer transmission system, which is likely to become an ATSC Candidate Standard next month.</p><p>Expected to redefine TV broadcasting for decades to come, the next-generation ATSC 3.0 broadcast standard will require higher capacity to deliver 4K Ultra-High-Definition services, robust reception on mobile devices and improved spectrum efficiency. The increased payload capacity of the physical layer combined with HEVC encoding will allow broadcasters many more options when planning their broadcast service offerings.</p><p>Development of ATSC 3.0 technologies represents the latest collaboration among LG, Zenith and GatesAir, co-inventors of the transmission system behind the ATSC A/153 Mobile Digital TV Standard, adopted by the industry in 2009.  Zenith invented the core transmission system at the heart of todays ATSC A/53 Digital Television Standard, approved by the Federal Communications Commission in 1996.</p><p><br></p><p><i>Photo Caption: </i>Dr. Kook-yeon Kwak, Senior Executive Vice President, LG Electronics Inc. (left), and Mr. Youngsoo Park, Chief Technology Officer, SBS, discuss Koreas first test transmission of 4K Ultra HD signals using ATSC 3.0 next-generation broadcast technologies.</p><p></p><p><i><br></i></p><p># # #</p><p><br></p><p><b>About LG Electronics, Inc.</b></p><p>LG Electronics, Inc. (KSE: 066570.KS) is a global leader and technology innovator in consumer electronics, mobile communications and home appliances, employing 83,000 people working in 128 locations around the world. With 2014 global sales of USD 55.91 billion (KRW 59.04 trillion), LG comprises four business units ? Home Entertainment, Mobile Communications, Home Appliance &amp; Air Solution, and Vehicle Components ? and is one of the worlds leading producers of flat panel TVs, mobile devices, air conditioners, washing machines and refrigerators. LG Electronics is a 2015 ENERGY STAR Partner of the Year.</p><p><i><br></i></p><p><i>Media Contact:</i><i></i></p><p><i><br></i></p><p>LG Electronics USA</p><p>John I. Taylor</p><p>202-719-3490</p><p>                                                          </p><p>john.taylor@lge.com</p>
<p>This may be the most unique and yet totally genius project created in the name of safety. For the past two years Byte Logic Systems Inc have been pouring hard work and dedication into the worlds first GPS tracking system in an incredibly under-appreciated every day accessory shoelaces!</p><p>Consider the extremely practical applications that this new gadget can offer before overlooking it. The safety of small children, the disabled and the elderly could be dramatically increased by utilising this wonderful application of existing technology, blended seamlessly into everyday use. On a daily basis thousands of elderly dementia sufferers, people with Autism and small children are unable to be found due to wandering away from carers and their homes. Currently, the procedure for locating these people is contacting Police authorities and setting out a search party in the hopes that they have not been gone long enough to achieve great distances. On the occasion that these lost individuals are approached by a considerate citizen it is rare that they will be in possession of a bracelet or dog-tag necklace with their details on it. To solve this all too common predicament, the G-Lace was created using the latest applied GPS tracking technology.</p><p>Byte Logic Systems Inc have recently launched their crowdfunding campaign with the leadership of their Senior Software Developer and founder, Carlos Martinez. Their dream is to see a second prototype of the G-Lace to improve its capabilities and make its practical applications even more versatile. Visit Indiegogo to pledge support and back this wonderful idea:</p><p><a href="http://igg.me/at/worlds-first-gps-shoelace"><b>http://igg.me/at/worlds-first-gps-shoelace</b></a><b>&nbsp;</b></p><p>The G-Lace already has practical features such as being water-proof and fully connected at all times, whilst also being discreet and non-bulky in design. During a recent interview Carlos has described the G-Lace as An innovative way to keep individuals from being lost if they wander and doing it discreetly to avoid any discomfort. Byte Logic Systems Inc believe that the implementation of the G-Lace into society will cut the missing persons count in the USA by half, which is an extremely positive outlook. Society will gradually become safer for the children, the ill and the elderly and will offer carers and the like peace of mind in the tedious stresses and worries of day to day living.&nbsp;</p><p>By showing support to the G-Lace via the Indiegogo campaign, backers can receive their own G-Lace to utilise with their loved ones.</p><p>Visit <a href="http://igg.me/at/worlds-first-gps-shoelace"><b>http://igg.me/at/worlds-first-gps-shoelace</b></a> for more information.</p><div><br></div>

<p><i>More than Dozen Key Building Blocks Comprise&nbsp;</i><i>Next-Generation Broadcast TV Transmission System</i></p><p><b>WASHINGTON, Sept. 29, 2015 </b> The Advanced Television Systems Committee announced today that the Physical Layer transmission system for ATSC 3.0 next-generation television broadcasting has been elevated to Candidate Standard status. The ATSC TG3 Technology Group approved the ATSC 3.0 Physical Layer Candidate Standard.</p><p>&nbsp;Over the course of months leading up to this vote, hundreds of volunteers have evaluated proposed technologies all with the mindset of selecting the best and most flexible transmission system as the foundation of ATSC 3.0. This represents a major milestone, and we expect to see manufacturers developing prototypes that can test the more than a dozen interconnected core building-block elements of the Physical Layer, said ATSC President Mark Richer.</p><p><i><b><br></b></i></p><p><i><b>Flexible, Robust and Efficient</b></i></p><p>The ATSC 3.0 Physical Layer is intended to offer far more flexibility, robustness and spectrum efficiency than the ATSC 1.0 standard, which was adopted two decades ago. The ATSC 3.0 physical layer allows television broadcasters to choose from a wide variety of transmission parameters so that each station can tailor its signal to best serve its local market by providing the combination of services and coverage area best suited for the market and its terrain.</p><p></p><blockquote>The system will allow high-capacity, low-robustness modes and also lower-capacity, high- robustness modes in the same transmission. That flexibility means that were likely to see both 4K Ultra HD broadcasts running side-by-side with robust mobile broadcasts to handheld devices, Richer explained.</blockquote><p></p><p>Technologies can be selected for various use cases like Single Frequency Networks, Multiple Input/Multiple Output channel operation, channel bonding and more, well beyond a single transmitting tower. There are a large range of selections for data protection including a wide range of guard intervals, forward error correction code lengths and code rates.<i>&nbsp;</i></p><p><i>&nbsp;</i></p><p><i><b>ATSC 3.0: Suite of Standards</b></i></p><p>ATSC is grateful for the support and active involvement of some of the best minds in broadcasting from around the world to develop the standard for the Physical Layer. But this is not the end of the process. The Phy Layer Candidate Standard sets the stage for field testing in the months ahead leading to the Proposed Standard phase in 2016, Richer said. </p><p>Work continues on the other parts of the suite of ATSC 3.0 standards. They include Video and Audio Compression, Closed Captioning, Advanced Emergency Alerting, Security, Companion Devices, Personalization, Applications &amp; Interactivity, Watermarking and Fingerprinting, and Internet Protocol Delivery. All told, some 20 standards are expected to be part of ATSC 3.0.</p><p># # #</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>About the ATSC: The Advanced Television Systems Committee is an international, non-profit organization developing voluntary standards for digital television. The ATSC member organizations represent the broadcast, broadcast equipment, motion picture, consumer electronics, computer, cable, satellite, and semiconductor industries. For more information visit <a href="http://atsc.org/news-release/advanced-television-systems-committee-honors-james-a-kutzner-with-bernard-lechner-outstanding-contributor-award-at-2014-atsc-broadcast-tv-conference/www.atsc.org">www.atsc.org</a></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><u>Media Contact:</u></p><p>Dave Arland, Arland Communications</p><p>(317) 701-0084</p><p>Dave@ArlandCom.com</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>                                                                                  </p><p><i>&nbsp;</i></p>

<p><b>CARMEL, Ind.</b>  NextGear Capital presented its third annual Auction Partner Awards last night in Orlando, FL during the 2015 National Automobile Auction Association (NAAA) Convention. These awards recognize independently-owned auto auctions for their dedication and support of the industry.<br><br>Amidst a festive atmosphere, NextGear Capital President Brian Geitner presided over the awards presentation during an evening reception, held in conjunction with the auction industrys premier yearly event.<br><br>Weve fostered many relationships with auctions over the years, helping make the floor plan process simple and efficient, said Brian Geitner, president of NextGear Capital. However, we recognize that these relationships are a two-way street, and we wouldnt be who we are today without the dedication, attention to detail and customer-centric focus of our auction partners.<br><br>Four auctions were honored with the Operational Excellence award, which is given to auctions that demonstrate excellent efficiency, top sales retention, overall operational performance and the most effective response to the needs of NextGear Capital. The Cox Automotive company also presented a Remarketer of the Year award to the auction that demonstrated the highest percentage of sales recovered based on percentage of valuation of each vehicle, the best throughput performance (number of days from when a vehicle is at the auction to days sold) and the best sales follow-up (efficient timing on getting proceeds of sales to NextGear Capital).<br><br>The 2015 Auction Partner Award winners are:</p><p><ul><li>Operational Excellence Award: Acadia Auto Auction  Richmond, ME</li><li>Operational Excellence Award: Rochester-Syracuse Auto Auction  Waterloo, NY</li><li>Operational Excellence Award: Oklahoma Auto Exchange  Oklahoma City, OK</li><li>Operational Excellence Award: Lynnway Auto Auction - North Billerica, MA</li><li>Remarketer of the Year: Tallahassee Auto Auction  Tallahassee, FL</li></ul></p>
<b>September 30th, 2015, New York, New York -&nbsp;</b><a href="http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-3255356/You-favorite-victim-Nurse-sues-NYPD-3M-cop-allegedly-tried-sex-investigating-sexual-assault-case.html" target="_blank" title="Link: http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-3255356/You-favorite-victim-Nurse-sues-NYPD-3M-cop-allegedly-tried-sex-investigating-sexual-assault-case.html">The plaintiff suing the city is a 25 year-old nursing student who trusted NYPD enough to report a serious crime to them</a>. Irrelationship is a jointly created defense system that two or more people maintain in order to avoid awareness of the anxiety thats a natural part of becoming close to others  especially anxiety about letting people see and know us for who we really are. Irrelationship happens outside of awareness, working well to protect us from anxiety, intimacy, and emotional investment while blocking mutually satisfying relationships from developing.<br><br>Those in irrelationship generally tend to fall into the role of either Performer or Audience. The Performer desperately tries to take care of the Audience, and the Audience hangs back and lets the Performer try to rescue and fix him or her. By doing so, the Audience is also taking care of the Performer by giving her or him the opportunity to avoid anxiety by getting caught up in those same futile activities. While it fends off anxiety, it only leads to repetitive cycles of fighting and withdrawal.<br><br>Irrelationship is often seen in people drawn to one another in romance; but can just as easily affect friendships, work-life, family, and even society and culture.<br><br>While the basic idea of irrelationship is straightforward, getting a deeper understanding of how it works, what sustains it, the many ways it can manifest, and how to start finding ways out of irrelationship into real relationship is complex. These facets in particular are helpful starting points:

<p>The transgender community has rarely seen the spotlight throughout the history of cinema, but in a moving twist, Strictly Taboo: A film noir transgender love story, is ready to break the status quo. The social issues surrounding the Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender (LGBT) community are diminishing slowly as their exposure becomes more frequent. <u>Strictly Taboo has embraced the unspoken challenges of an intimate relationship between a heterosexual man and a transgender woman in the modern world.</u> </p><p>Visit the <a href="http://bit.ly/StrictlyTaboo " target="_blank">'Strictly Taboo'&nbsp;Indiegogo campaign</a></p><p>Throwing Mud Productions Inc is a film production company proudly showcasing Strictly Taboo as its first feature film. Their vision to bring transgender social issues out of the dark, and believe that the film will have great impact on society. The CEO of Throwing Mud Productions is also the man responsible for the writing and directing of the film. Bob McAndrew has an esteemed and lengthy career in writing, directing and teaching, including bragging rights of previous students who have become Academy Award winners. His directing resume is highlighted by previous films with various awards and accolades from numerous corners of the globe. Bob feels strongly that Strictly Taboo expresses the heart and soul of a transgender person, and believes that it will foster tolerance and understanding for individuals in the LGBT community all over the world.</p><p><img alt="" src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/robin8-production/robin8-production/9760a9a6-5935-4ba6-8298-998e6ecd69ca/11223480_563056693833478_5170208050332316179_n.jpg" title="Image httpwwwucarecdncom9760a9a6-5935-4ba6-8298-998e6ecd69ca"><br></p><p>Bob began writing Strictly Taboo before the LGBT community was widely acknowledged, and naturally he experienced difficulty and disinterest when presenting the idea before media companies. Recently however, there has been an increased awareness of the social issues surrounding the LGBT community, in part thanks to programs such as Orange Is The New Black and Becoming Us. Additionally the victory in US Supreme Court which has now affirmed the rights to same sex marriage has been a major contributor to the increase in acceptance and understanding within society. Bob has embraced this opportunity to finally see his vision brought to life.</p><p>It is evident that Strictly Taboo will be stand out film to challenge and educate wider society about the heart wrenching trials faced by LGBT people. This coupled with Bobs experience and passion is a sure indication that the film will be of the highest quality and will deliver an emotionally charged and intimate story that will stay in the audiences mind forever.</p><p>       </p><p></p><div><iframe frameborder="0" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/aaLP0Jsw1-g" width="560" height="315"></iframe></div><br><p></p><p>Backers and contributors can choose between a number of fantastic perks as thanks for their interest and support in the film. The itemisation of how raised funds will contribute to overall filming costs have been listed within the Indiegogo campaign, visit <a href="http://bit.ly/StrictlyTaboo">http://bit.ly/StrictlyTaboo</a>&nbsp; today.</p><div><br></div>
Neighborhood Psychiatric was founded to fill the gap in psychiatric care by providing excellent services while working with patients health insurance.<div><br></div><div>We are creating a model of care which does not exist in NYC. Most people are used to getting little personalized attention when they use health insurance for psychiatric services.</div><div><br></div><div>Our vision is to do a better job of providing the heartfelt care we were trained to give, and went into medicine to provide. We meet for a long enough time to get to know patients better, and make recommendations tailored to who people actually are, and follow up closely to check the results.</div><div><br></div><div>We work collaboratively with other healthcare provides so that care is integrated, and we focus on wellness while carefully addressing problems.<br><div><br></div><div><br></div></div>

<p>* Irrelationship: How We Use Dysfunctional Relationships to Hide from Intimacy, Release before official October 20, 2015 date from Central Recovery Press</p><p>* Co-Authored by Mark B. Borg, Jr., PhD, Grant H. Brenner, MD and Daniel Berry, RN, MHA, IRRELATIONSHIP addresses a previously un-named defense against intimacy and the risks which come with being close with important others in romance, friendships, family, work and on a societal level.  <br></p><p>* IRRELATIONSHIP is a shared defense which operates mainly out of awareness, creating and sustaining a false relationship which takes the place of real relationships, sparing the person from the risks of closeness, and preventing mutuality.</p><p>* Available in Paperback and E-Book for Kindle</p><p>* Contact Michelle McQueen at DavEllePR for media relations Michelle@davellepr.com</p><br>
<p><b>Launched by Food-Loving Social Tech Veterans, Bestaurant Lets Friends Make and Privately Share Lists of Favorite Restaurants</b><br></p><p>SAN FRANCISCO, February 21, 2015</p><p>SAN FRANCISCO, February 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Bestaurant is the new mobile app that offers food-lovers and travelers a streamlined and superior way to answer questions like: Wheres the best steak in New York City? The creators of Bestaurant today announced the official launch of the app on both the iPhone and Android platforms. Unlike the thousands of existing apps and websites that offer user-generated restaurant reviews by strangers, Bestaurant is designed to access favorites from friends, making it the first smartphone app to leverage social and mobile technologies to unlock favorite global eating experiences. Bestaurant users create and share their personal Gold Lists of favorite restaurants in a city, nominating one restaurant per cuisine to declare their pick of the best place for  . Bestaurant covers over 50 major cuisines and over 500 major cities.</p><p>Our simple insight was that peoples best restaurant experiences mostly come from friends personal recommendations  not review sites, guidebooks, or other media. Yet, amazingly, before Bestaurant there was no smartphone app that made the recommendation process among friends easy and efficient. Bestaurant combines social and mobile technology to make the world a more happy place by filtering for only top picks of great meals, said Dominic Penaloza, Founder of Bestaurant. </p><p>The dozens of major, user-driven review sites and apps, editorial-driven review sites and apps, and restaurant-focused blogs and forums all missed the mobile/social/local boat. Most peoples best dining experiences still tend to happen by way of recommendations by people they know and with whom they share common tastes in dining and lifestyle. Restaurant reviews from strangers simply do not fit well enough and by the time you find out the hard way, its already too late. At the same time, people have a huge passion for sharing food photos on mobile social networks, but this is not an efficient way to discover the right restaurants when you need them. Our innovation enables you to easily tap into your friends fondest memories, whenever you need it, so that you can spend more time enjoying the best meals and avoiding the mediocre.</p><p>Bestaurant is also a great tool for in-the-know foodies to archive their lists and share them quickly. There are countless times Ive been solicited by friends for recommendations in different cities, says Dominic. Each time, Ive had to type my recommendations by memory into an e-mail and if I was feeling particularly charitable, Id look up the addresses for each. This process has taken me up to 45 minutes of researching and writing. With Bestaurant, I finally have a platform to build and store my Gold Lists with addresses, maps, telephone numbers and opening hours automatically built in, making it a fantastic reference source for friends as well as myself.</p><p>Bestaurant is organized around each users Gold Lists, first by city and then by cuisine. Users recommend one restaurant for each cuisine, ensuring that Bestaurant remains uniquely focused on top favorites. Users can include photos and add comments and tips. They are encouraged to share their Gold Lists with existing friends and can also follow other users to access their Gold Lists. A location-based map view is useful for finding restaurants nearby, especially when traveling in a new city. Users can also easily fulfill specific cravings by filtering by cuisine, or by city and friends.</p><p>{screenshot showing a Gold List for Los Angeles}</p><p>{screenshot showing one restaurant page, with gorgeous photo of dish}</p><p>Dedicated to building an indispensable tool for food lovers, features of Bestaurant include:</p><ul>  <li><b>Bestaurant</b>, meaning best restaurant, is the users top      pick of each cuisine or situation; when you Bestaurant a place it means youre      saying it is the #1 place for that kind of cuisine or situation</li>  <li><b>Gold      Lists</b> created by each Bestaurant user featuring the      users Bestaurants, a useful repository of food experiences that makes it      easy to share recommendations when your friend asks you: Wheres the best      sushi in Shanghai? </li>  <li><b>Comprehensive      Restaurant Profiles</b> with beautiful photos and accurate      information, your friends reviews, and community reviews including top      restaurant experts and professionals</li>  <li><b>Directly      Call Restaurants </b>simply by tapping      the phone number on the Restaurant Profile</li>  <li><b>Explorable      Food Map</b> that helps users discover great new food      experiences in their own neighborhood or when traveling in new cities</li>  <li><b>Private      Sharing </b>of Bestaurants and      Gold Lists between friends, everything in Bestaurant is privately shared      between friends and there is no public sharing of any user content </li> </ul><p>Bestaurant is optimized for the user who wants to find a great restaurant, not just any restaurant. For example, its helpful when I want to arrange a business dinner in a new city or when I travel, since a huge part of the travel experience for me is actually the food, said William Bao Bean, Partner at SOSventures and a member of Bestaurants advisory board. I derive no value from knowing that there are one hundred restaurants all around me; I derive huge value from easily seeing which restaurants around me are highly rated by my friends.</p><p>Each Bestaurant is worth more than a review. In this era of oversharing, scarcity is meaning. Bestaurant is pioneering efficient curation for the mobile era. Each Bestaurant is like my personal seal of approval, said [ expert ].</p><p><b>About Bestaurant<br> </b>Bestaurant is a social tool that helps users find the best restaurants by enabling friends to share lists of favorite restaurants. &nbsp;Bestaurant users recommend only one top choice per category per city so their friends know each place is great.&nbsp; Guided by the core principle that friends recommendations are the most efficient way to find great restaurants, Bestaurant aims to be a game changer in the restaurant and travel discovery market.&nbsp; The Bestaurant team is comprised of veteran entrepreneurs, technologists, designers, and food lovers building social technology to innovate in the multi-billion dollar restaurant and travel industry. &nbsp;For more information, visit <a href="http://www.bestaurant.co">http://www.bestaurant.co</a></p><p>                                                  </p><p><img width="3" alt="Description httprtprnewswirecomrtgifNewsItemIdSF67255Transmission_Id201308210800PR_NEWS_USPR_____SF67255DateId20130821" src="file://localhost/Users/dominic/Library/Caches/TemporaryItems/msoclip/0/clip_image002.png" height="3"></p>
<p>For the majority of people it is common place to have accounts with multiple social media platforms at any one time. The concept of social media has grown into a necessity, rather than an exciting or novel thought for internet users. Whopple is the creative work of an entrepreneur who saw earning potential with the amount of time spent on social media daily<b>. Whopple is the revolutionary concept of a social media form that literally pays its members.</b> Whopple has launched its Indiegogo campaign to transform this innovative idea into a reality.</p><p>Visit <a href="http://igg.me/at/whopple/x/11871144">http://igg.me/at/whopple/x/11871144</a>&nbsp;</p><p>Social media hype began long before the internet and even before computers became an everyday household item. It is now an integral part of modern society, with general social networks and special interest niche sites available. There are sites to share photos, videos and thoughts, as well as internet dating websites and even sites to connect family history or catch up with old class mates. The existence of social media sites is not only for personal socialising, but business connections such as Linked In. Big and small business utilise social media to collect information and utilize this information to target specific audiences with advertising schemes. Social media is now one of the biggest mediums for advertisements since television. Imagine a social media site that not only connected hundreds and thousands of like-minded members, but also rewarded them with payment for sharing one anothers pages.</p><p>Whopple creator and visionary, Jeff Baugh Jr. has a detailed plan for the structure of Whopple and how it will benefit its members. The average person spends up to 2.5 hours a day on social media, and Jeff would like to see that time both used productively and rewarded, instead of wasted. Whopple will consist of members who can share and connect like any other social media site, but can also sponsor other sites and receive payment through a multi-tiered structure. Members can create sub-sites and membership packages are available to suit any need or requirement.</p><p>Jeff has a clear goal for Whopple to begin its creative journey, and has provided details of this on the Indiegogo campaign website. This revolutionary membership based social share site will target 18-35 year olds who would like to earn an income online, while sharing their favourite websites, media and thoughts that they believe are deserving.&nbsp;</p><p>     </p><p>Visit Indiegogo today at <a href="http://igg.me/at/whopple/x/11871144">http://igg.me/at/whopple/x/11871144</a>&nbsp;</p>

(NYSE:  AN), America's largest automotive retailer, today&nbsp;announced that it reported&nbsp;to automotive manufacturers, based on their respective sales transaction reporting standards, retail sales of 29,046 new vehicles in September 2015, an increase of 21% as compared to September 2014. September 2015 reported retail new vehicle unit sales for AutoNation's operating segments were as follows:<br><br> 					  					 			   		  	 		  			    for Domestic, up 27% versus September 2014, <br>13,593 for Import, up 17% versus September 2014, and <br>6,147 for Premium Luxury, up 20% versus September 2014.<br> 											 			   		  	 		  			     &nbsp;<br><br><br> 					  					 			   		  	 		  			     On a same-store basis, reported retail new vehicle unit sales in September 2015 increased 18% as compared to September 2014. As previously announced, the Labor Day holiday weekend was reported in September sales in 2015 versus August sales in 2014. Industry reporting for September 2015 includes one more selling day than for September 2014.<br><br> 					  					 			   		  	 		  			     Reported retail new vehicle unit sales in the third quarter of 2015 were 89,953, an increase of 7% as compared to the third quarter of 2014. Third quarter 2015 reported retail new vehicle unit sales for AutoNation's operating segments were as follows: <br><br> 					  					 			   		  	 		  			    for Domestic, up 13% versus third quarter of 2014, <br>42,668 for Import, up 1% versus third quarter of 2014, and <br>18,083 for Premium Luxury, up 14% versus third quarter of 2014.<br> 											 			   		  	 		  			     On a same-store basis, reported retail new vehicle unit sales in the third quarter of 2015 increased 5% as compared to the third quarter of 2014. <br><br> 					  					 			   		  	 		  			     AutoNation expects to report October 2015 retail new vehicle unit sales on Wednesday, November 4, 2015.<br><br> 					  					 			   		  	 		  			     The information provided in this news release is based on unaudited sales reports provided by our stores to the applicable automotive manufacturers (excluding units sold by the stores that we acquired from Valley Motors Auto Group in September 2015, which units will be included in the Company's reported retail new vehicle unit sales news releases beginning with the release for the month of October 2015). These reports are prepared based on the sales transaction reporting standards established by the applicable automotive manufacturers, which differ from revenue recognition and other requirements under generally accepted accounting principles ("GAAP"). For example, the classification of certain transactions under the standards established by certain such manufacturers differs under GAAP. Transactions reported as retail sales include vehicles placed into certain manufacturer-approved demonstrator vehicle and service loaner programs, which vehicles may be sold by our stores to retail customers as new or used vehicles under GAAP in subsequent periods. Manufacturers sometimes provide marketing incentives to place vehicles into such programs during particular periods. In addition, the sales reports are based on the time periods set by the automotive manufacturers for reporting monthly sales, which generally differ from the calendar month and may be modified by particular manufacturers from time to time. As a result, our operating results calculated and presented in accordance with GAAP, including our new vehicle unit sales, may differ materially from any results expressed or implied by the information provided in our monthly sales reports and summarized in this news release and future news releases. In addition, reported retail sales are subject to seasonal trends. Consequently, reported retail sales for a particular month are not necessarily indicative of results to be expected for a full quarter or year. Please refer to our public filings with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, including without limitation our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2014 and our subsequent Quarterly Reports on Form 10-Q and Current Reports on Form 8-K, for additional information regarding our business. Investors should not assume that our disclosure of the information in this news release means that we have determined that such information is material to the Company. <br><br> 					  					 			   		  	 		  			     About AutoNation, Inc.AutoNation is transforming the automotive retail industry through bold leadership.&nbsp; We deliver a peerless automotive retail experience through our customer-focused sales and service processes. <p><b>ATLANTA, October 7, 2015</b>  With financial services and inventory financing representing vital business solutions that drive dealer growth, Cox Automotive has named Brian Geitner as president of Financial Services and NextGear Capital. This move creates one of the industrys leading financial services companies, servicing more than 22,000 dealers throughout North America, the United Kingdom and Ireland. Effective immediately, Geitner will report to Sandy Schwartz, president of Cox Automotive, a leading provider of digital marketing, wholesale and e-commerce solutions across the automotive industry. </p><p>Brians thought leadership, deep expertise within the financing arena and proven success in integrating Dealer Services Corporation and Manheim Financial Services to form NextGear Capital, made him the ideal choice to lead this critical arm of our business, said Schwartz. He helped us become the worlds most comprehensive provider of floor planning products and services in the remarketing industry, and now we will tap his talent to further help our customers thrive in the marketplace.</p><p>Previously Geitner served as president of NextGear Capital, directing the companys strategic planning, operations and growing customer base. In his new role, he will continue to lead NextGear Capitals U.S. operations and international growth to create more efficient ways for dealers to access cash. He will also collaborate with Go Financial, a thriving subprime finance company, to influence both organizations teams and technology to provide simpler ways for dealers to finance their subprime customers. Go Financial is a joint venture owned in part by Cox Automotive.</p><p>I am excited to join the Cox Automotive senior leadership team and further develop products that anticipate dealers financial and inventory needs, said Geitner. What we do really matters to our customers profitability.</p><p>Geitner joined Cox in 2012 as chief executive officer of Dealer Services Corporation, a used-vehicle floor plan company for independent dealers, before becoming president of NextGear Capital. Prior to that, he co-founded Dealer Services Corporation as chief operating officer and later became president of the company.</p><p><b>About Cox Automotive<br></b>Cox Automotive, Inc. is transforming the way the world buys, sells and owns cars with industry-leading digital marketing, software, financial, wholesale and e-commerce solutions for consumers, dealers, manufacturers and the overall automotive ecosystem worldwide. Committed to open choice and dedicated to strong partnerships, the Cox Automotive family includes Manheim®, Autotrader®, Kelley Blue Book®, Dealertrack®, vAuto®, Xtime®, NextGear Capital® and a host of other brands. The global company has nearly 30,000 team members in more than 200 locations and is partner to more than 40,000 auto dealers, as well as most major automobile manufacturers, while engaging U.S. consumer car buyers with the most recognized media brands in the industry. &nbsp;Cox Automotive is a subsidiary of Cox Enterprises, Inc., an Atlanta-based company with revenues of $17 billion and approximately 50,000 employees. Cox Enterprises other major operating subsidiaries include Cox Communications and Cox Media Group. For more information about Cox Automotive, visit <a href="http://www.coxautoinc.com/">www.coxautoinc.com</a>.</p>
<p><i>October 28, 2015 (New York, New York)<b>&nbsp;</b></i>&nbsp; Just days around World Food Day and International Chefs Day, <a href="http://thekitchenconnection.org/">KitchenConnection.org</a>&nbsp;launches the second version of its foodie social network where both lay and professional cooks can share pictures, blog posts, and recipes, as well as participate in the platforms signature connections where users can host live video sessions to cook or share tips about food with other users anywhere in the world. Currently, there are representatives from over 100 different countries on the platform, from Fiji to North Korea. </p><p>Users can choose to host these connections for free or paid, and if paid, can donate some or all of the money to Kitchen Connections partner charity, Action Against Hunger, supporting the sites mission: <i>Im eating  youre eating and because were eating together,</i><i> someone else is eating too</i></p><p>Just a year ago, Kitchen Connection launched its invite-only beta version after a pre-launch event in New York City where the Kitchen Connection team showcased a live cooking experience with a French Master Chef from the prestigious chefs association, Maîtres Cuisiniers de France and foodies in Paris.</p><p>The site, which urges members to create a profile where his cooking credentials, languages spoken and interests can all be showcased, is also a place to distinguish users who are members of the prestigious World Chefs organization, which has partnered with Kitchen Connection. Past supporters of the platform include Whole Foods Market Bowery, which sponsored their launch in the past.</p><p>Founder, Earlene Cruz, thought of the venture while studying abroad on a ship through the program Semester at Sea. Right before porting in Ghana, she lost her wallet with all of her money. Her plans to CouchSurf there led her to a home-stay with a family that graciously housed her and fed her for the week that she was in Ghana. Eating the delicious red-red stew with her hands on their living room floor led her to want to virtually recreate the experience, hence the premise for Kitchen Connection. </p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><a></a>Here is the sites promotional video: <a href="https://youtu.be/m4TqVE14OMc">https://youtu.be/m4TqVE14OMc</a></p><div><br></div><p>ABOUT Kitchen Connection</p><p><a href="http://www.KitchenConnection.org">www.KitchenConnection.org</a></p><p>Where Food Links the World"</p><p>The mission of Kitchen Connection is to alleviate global hunger by creating a hub for recipe exchange, education, and global connection through food. The aim is to connect global foodies through a virtually interactive platform that allows them not only to meet, interact with, and learn from fellow members but also to work together to create meals, sit down together, and ultimately contribute to their global family through the revenue generatedwithout even leaving their homes. Food  its preparation, consumption, and distribution - is the most ubiquitous human experience, which is at the core of the alleviation of global hunger.</p><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><p></p><p></p><p><i>Im eating  youre eating </i></p><p></p><p></p></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><p></p><p></p><p><i>and because were eating together,</i></p><p></p><p></p></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><p></p><p></p><p><i>someone else is eating too</i></p><p></p><p></p></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><blockquote><p></p><p></p><p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ###</p><p></p><p></p></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote><p><i></i></p><p><i></i></p><p>                                                       </p><p>&nbsp;</p>
<h5>Oct. 16 Is National Mammography Day<br></h5><p><b>ADDISON, TEXAS (Oct. 7, 2015) </b>Solis Mammography reminds women that its time to schedule their annual mammogram. And this year, Oct. 16, National Mammography Day, is the perfect day to do it!</p><p>Typically observed on the third Friday every October, President Bill Clinton proclaimed the first National Mammography Day in 1993.</p><p>Mammograms are all about taking charge of a healthy life, says Connie Oliver, Solis vice president of marketing and client relations. Octobers intense focus on breast cancer actually creates anxiety for many women that sadly keeps them away from mammography centers for fear theyll get a bad result. We want to remind women that the majority of our patients wont get breast cancer in their lifetime; but if something uncharacteristic does appear, the earlier we find it, the easier their treatment options will be.</p><p>Solis also wants women to know that all mammography providers are not the same. In other words, a mammogram is not just a mammogram.</p><p>Solis believes knowledge is power, and educated women are empowered women. Here are three things that most women dont even know to ask about:<br></p><p><b>Choice:</b> Women get to choose where they have their mammograms. Its smart to put as much thought into the choice of your mammography provider as you do when choosing your doctor.<br></p><p><b>Technology:</b> Ask if a center has <a href="http://newsroom.solismammo.com/2015/10/01/3d-mammography-fact-sheet/">three-dimensional (3D) technology</a>  not all centers do. Also known as tomosynthesis, 3D is the newest medical technology in the quest for earlier detection. Whats the difference? Imagine a book with clear covers and pages. With 2D digital mammography, the radiologist must peer through the cover and all the pages at once, looking for a single word that does not have the same characteristics as all the other words. With 3D mammography images of the breast are taken in discreet 1mm slices, so the radiologist has the ability to look for that irregular word one page at a time. Research shows these increased views lead to a 37 percent reduction in unnecessary callbacks, saving time, money, and most importantly, anxiety.<br></p><p><b>Who reads the mammogram: </b>Ask if a center has <a href="http://newsroom.solismammo.com/2015/10/01/breast-imaging-specialist-fact-sheet/">breast imaging specialists</a> reading their screenings. These specialists are radiologists who spend more than 90 percent of their time reading breast images and read more than 5,000 mammography images per year. All of Solis breast-dedicated radiologists read between 7,000 and 10,000 screening and diagnostic mammograms each year.</p><p>There is a lot more to the annual screening than simply showing up at a center where your doctor tells you to go and hoping for the best, says Oliver. Thats why Solis wants women to reclaim the month of October and <a href="http://newsroom.solismammo.com/2015/10/01/what-is-rethink-p-i-n-k/">Rethink P.I.N.K.</a> Instead of focusing on breast cancer awareness, the company urges women to think about October as breast <b><i>health</i></b> awareness, celebrating women with a positive message of empowerment.<br></p><p>The American Cancer Society recommends that women age 40 and older should have a mammogram every year and continue to do so for as long as they are in good health. Other organizations cite every other year as the optimal time to get checked. Solis Mammography encourages women to talk to their doctor, explain their unique health history, and make the choice thats right for them. When they are ready, however, Solis is there to offer an exceptional experience  eliminating stress and anxiety in every way possible.<br></p><p>My annual mammogram revealed something different from the previous year  something that couldn't be felt by monthly breast checks, says Solis patient Patty Hill. Two small surgeries later, I was a survivor with no need for radiation or chemo. Due to early detection by Solis, my only treatment is anti-estrogen tablets. I am one of the lucky ones. Will I continue with annual mammograms? You had better believe it!<br></p><p><b>About Solis Mammography</b><br></p><p>Solis Mammography is a specialized healthcare provider focused exclusively on providing women an exceptional mammography experience. Headquartered in Addison, Texas, Solis currently operates 31 centers across four states  Texas, Arizona, Ohio and North Carolina. The company operates both wholly owned centers and multiple successful joint ventures with hospital partners. Solis provides a complete range of highly specialized breast health services including screening and diagnostic mammography (2D and 3D), computer-aided detection, breast ultrasound, stereotactic biopsy and ultrasound-guided biopsy. For more information, visit <a href="http://www.solismammo.com/">www.SolisMammo.com</a>, like them on <a href="https://www.facebook.com/SolisMammo">Facebook</a>, follow them on <a href="https://www.pinterest.com/solismammo/">Pinterest</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/SolisMammo">Twitter</a>, or subscribe to their <a href="https://www.youtube.com/user/solishealth">YouTube</a> channel.</p><p><b>About Rethink P.I.N.K.</b></p><p>Solis Mammography created the <a href="http://newsroom.solismammo.com/2015/10/01/what-is-rethink-p-i-n-k/">Rethink P.I.N.K.</a> campaign in 2015 to coincide with Octobers National Breast Cancer Awareness Month and to shift the focus of pink messaging to issues around womens breast health: P = Peace of Mind, I = Incredible Service, N = Not What You Think, and K = Knowledge Is Power.</p><p># #  #<br></p><p>For more information, contact Karen Carrera, TrizCom, 972-207-1935, <a href="mailto:karen@trizcom.com">karen@trizcom.com</a> or @kjcarrera.<br></p>

NEW YORK, Oct. 6, 2015 -- BERRICLE, a reputable lifestyle jewelry brand, introduced its promise ring collection. The collection includes an exquisite array of rings in both contemporary and classic designs. In anticipation of the holiday season, promise rings are expected to be an ideal gift option for couples.<br><br> 					 			   		  	 		  			     A promise ring is a symbolic gift of commitment, often considered as a precursor to an engagement to pledge a couple's love for each other. Given that it is not intended as a marriage commitment, a promise ring is usually inexpensive and presented in a less culturally significant way.<br><br> 					 			   		  	 		  			     BERRICLE's Promise Ring Collection embraces figural, gemstone and non-traditional styles that will beautifully complement the uniqueness of each relationship. With the popularity of the promise ring trend, BERRICLE has woven in a wide variety of styles for a truly versatile collection. From claddagh silhouettes to art deco flairs, the collection celebrates exquisite rings of enduring design elements. <br><br> 					 			   		  	 		  			     With the numerous options available, it may seem overwhelming. How to pick out the perfect ring? Base it on her personality. If she is polished and mellow, an emerald or canary color will be an ideal fit for her sophistication. If she is flamboyant and glamorous, a princess-cut or radiant-cut will most likely swoon her. If she is edgy and unconventional, then a marquee-cut or bezel-set will bring out the unique qualities in her.<br><br> 					 			   		  	 		  			     Claddagh rings are anticipated to be very trendy in the upcoming festive season, as the design depicts two clasped hands holding a heart. The sign of bonding love will serve as a touching reminder of constant love. <br><br> 					 			   		  	 		  			     "Promise rings are such a great addition to our repertoire. Now we are able to provide beautiful and meaningful choices for couples at different stages in their relationships," said Kevin Chen, President of BERRICLE.<br><br> 					 			   		  	 		  			     The best timing of gifting a promise ring depends on the specific situation of each couple. Typically, a promise ring makes a romantic anniversary or birthday gift, thanks to the pure promises attached to the symbolic sparkler. Holiday season also tends to be a desirable occasion to declare your devotion entwined into a beautifully crafted ring. <br><br> 					 			   		  	 		  			     The nature of the promise ring extends beyond partnerships. A promise ring is often gifted between friends as a symbol of unbreakable friendship. The styles for a friendship promise ring usually range from plain bands to claddagh designs. <br><br> 					 			   		  	 		  			     With this latest addition, BERRICLE has further solidified itself as a coveted online jewelry destination. Customers have been engaging with the passionate brand through its #MyBerricle photo contest, showing off their favorite styles.<br><br> 					 			   		  	 		  			     For more details on the promise ring collection, please visit  <br><br> 					 			   		  	 		  			     <b>About BERRICLE: </b><br><br> 					 			   		  	 		  			     Founded in 2011, BERRICLE is a lifestyle jewelry brand dedicated to creating attainable luxury with classic and contemporary designs. With an extensive collection of over 3,000 designs from engagement rings and wedding bands to colorful gemstone pendants and earrings, BERRICLE offers a wide variety of styles to suit each customer's taste.<br><br> 					 			   		  	 		  			     Our quality and craftsmanship is key. Every piece is carefully inspected, and only those that meet BERRICLE's discerning standards receive a "BERRICLE" or "BE" imprint, a mark that assures customers their purchase is of exceptional craftsmanship. Our popular cubic zirconia designs feature the highest quality stones. While other companies source average stones, the superb quality of BERRICLE's cubic zirconia allows our pieces to best mirror the color, cut, clarity, and brilliance of real diamonds. To this end, our jewelry is perfect for customers seeking guilt-free elegance. For more information, visit <a href="http://www.BERRICLE.com">http://www.BERRICLE.com</a>.<br><br><br>
<p></p><h2>Get home-delivered, hand-dipped, caramel, candy and chocolate apples now at <a href="http://www.tasteeapple.com">www.tasteeapple.com</a></h2><p><img title="Image https3amazonawscomrobin8-productionrobin8-production6a8a9343-94ad-442a-815e-75bd4a2ea896tasteeheroimage2300x95jpg" src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/robin8-production/robin8-production/6a8a9343-94ad-442a-815e-75bd4a2ea896/tasteeheroimage2300x95.jpg" alt=""><br></p><div><a href="http://www.tasteeapple.com"></a>   <div>Newcomerstown, OH  October 19, 2015  Today, Tastee Apple, Inc. announced that their delicious and healthy caramel apples, candy apples and hand-dipped chocolate-covered apples are now available at <a href="http://www.tasteeapple.com">www.tasteeapple.com</a> for home delivery year-round.</div>  <div>&nbsp;</div>  <div>Due to a huge demand, we are now offering our homemade caramel apples, chocolate-dipped apples and jelly or candy apples online in addition to local stores so you can get them delivered directly to your doorstep, states Greg Hackenbracht, Tastee Apple, Inc. Founder and CEO. Caramel apples are fun, eat-on-a-stick treats that offer a safe, healthy alternative to candy and have no saturated fat or cholesterol.</div>  <div>&nbsp;</div>  <div><b>7 Healthy and Delicious Reasons to Eat Tastees Caramel, Candy and Chocolate-Dipped Apples All Year</b></div>  <div><b>&nbsp;</b></div>  <div>1.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Enjoy fun, eat-on-a-stick caramel apples that have protein, very little total fat and only 160 calories or less in a three-ounce serving.</div>  <div>&nbsp;</div>  <div>2.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Fight the damaging effects of bad cholesterol with antioxidant phytonutrients. According to the <a href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC442131/">National Center for Biotechnology Information, U.S. National Library of Medicine</a>, epidemiological studies have linked the consumption of apples with reduced risk of some cancers, cardiovascular disease, asthma, and diabetes.</div>  <div>&nbsp;</div>  <div>3.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Get one-fifth of the recommended daily intake of fiber with one Tastee caramel apple.<br> <br> </div>  <div>4.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Help keep energy levels high and reduce calcium loss with boron, an essential trace-element found in apples. </div>  <div>&nbsp;</div>  <div>5.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Energize with a longer, more even boost from the complex carbohydrates found in caramel apples.</div>  <div>&nbsp;</div>  <div>6.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Relax knowing that Tastee Apple, Inc. is the <b>only company in the industry certified by the Safe Quality Food Institute.</b> All of their apples go through a unique, seven-step rating process to guarantee the quality and freshness of the fruit.</div>  <div>&nbsp;</div>  <div>7.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Bite into mouthwatering varieties including: Plain or Caramel with Nuts, Jelly/Candy, Turtle, Fantasy Gourmet Chocolate Peanut, Double Chocolate, and Chocolate Pecan, Super Premium Chocolate Pecan Obsession, Triple Chocolate Sensation or White Chocolate Pretzel. </div>  <div>&nbsp;</div>  <div>Now anyone can enjoy our healthy, safe and delicious caramel, chocolate and candy apples all year, states Hackenbracht. Made by hand in our Newcomerstown, Ohio factory using 40-plus year-old family recipes, the apples bring back fond childhood memories, make great gifts and are fun to share with friends and family at any time.</div>  <div>&nbsp;</div>  <div><b>To enjoy Tastees fresh, safe and delicious, candy, caramel and chocolate apples now, visit </b><a href="http://www.tasteeapple.com"><b>www.tasteeapple.com</b></a><b>. </b></div>  <div>&nbsp;</div>  <div><b>About Taste Apple, Inc. </b></div>  <div>Family-owned and operated since 1974 in the historic Village of Newcomerstown, Ohio, Tastee Apple, Inc. has sold over 250,000,000 apples with candy, chocolate, caramel, and other toppings. The only company in the industry certified by the Safe Quality Food Institute, all of the apples go through a unique, seven-step rating process to guarantee the quality and freshness of the fruit. Perfectly-ripe apples are sticked in made-from-scratch, small-batch, kettle-cooked caramel or a candy coating. After the apples cool, they are rolled in gooey toppings like milk, dark or white chocolate and then rolled in fresh peanuts, pecans, cookies, or pretzels. The candy and caramel apples are then carefully packaged, stored and shipped to stores throughout the country. For more information on Tastees apples and fundraising program, visit <a href="http://www.tasteeapple.com">www.tasteeapple.com</a> or call 740-498-8316.</div>  <div>&nbsp;</div>  <div># # #</div>  <div>&nbsp;</div>  <div>Media Contact: Melanie Rembrandt, Rembrandt Communications®, <a href="mailto:media@tasteeapple.com">media@tasteeapple.com</a>, 800-771-0116</div>  </div>

<p><b>NCAA Athletic Recruiting: LemonAid Is the App for That </b></p><p><i>LemonAid  an app that connects college-bound swimmers and university recruiters  launches on Android and iOS</i></p><p><b><i>Ashburn, Virginia  October 5, 2015</i>  </b>For high school swimmers and university coaches, the recruiting process can feel like treading water. Its an endless whirlwind of emails, phone calls, campus visits and paperwork. LemonAid  a newly launched iOS and Android app, co-founded by former American Record holder <a href="https://vimeo.com/141073391" title="Link: https://vimeo.com/141073391">Eric Knight</a>  offers a fast, convenient solution. </p><p>Swimmers and coaches create profiles in LemonAid based on their academic, social and athletic preferences. LemonAid then matches compatible athletes and coaches. To connect, users swipe right or left, and ultimately, matches can message directly in the app. &nbsp;Think Tinder meets LinkedIn for NCAA athletic recruiting. </p><p>For high school athletes, LemonAid eliminates the stress of selecting a college swim program. Athletes build a profile that contains relevant information like GPA, competition times, and their events. Completed profiles, in turn, help showcase their talent and get them in front of recruiters. For coaches, LemonAid offers a friendly, quick introduction to talented swimmers and makes future interactions all the more powerful. </p><p>LemonAid (<a href="http://lemonaidapp.co" target="_blank">lemonaid</a>app.co) is FREE for athletes and coaches, with paid features (upload performance video and right swipe preview) available. &nbsp;To download the app, visit</p><p>&nbsp;<a href="https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/lemonaid/id990585674?ls=1&amp;mt=8" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/robin8-production/robin8-production/24aeb4c7-89c4-42ad-be1d-d2eaf97399fe/AppstoreBadge.png" title="Image https3amazonawscomrobin8-productionrobin8-production24aeb4c7-89c4-42ad-be1d-d2eaf97399feAppstoreBadgepng"></a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.elitecrest.lemonaid&amp;hl=en" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/robin8-production/robin8-production/c89a4319-3ab6-4ac5-af66-9eb4d9b45590/playstorebadge.png" title="Image https3amazonawscomrobin8-productionrobin8-productionc89a4319-3ab6-4ac5-af66-9eb4d9b45590playstorebadgepng"></a><br></p><p><b>LemonAid: Co-Created By Former NCAA Student-Athlete Eric Knight</b></p><p>In high school, LemonAid co-founder <a href="https://vimeo.com/141073391">Eric Knight</a> had dreams of swimming in college. The problem: Eric was a lemon. He wasnt a great swimmer, but he was determined. </p><div><iframe frameborder="0" src="//player.vimeo.com/video/141073391?title=0&amp;byline=0&amp;portrait=0&amp;badge=0" width="560" height="315"></iframe></div>Ultimately, Eric walked on to the swim team at George Mason University.&nbsp; It was a transformative experience. By the time he graduated, Eric had earned 10 team and three conference records. But if he had given up when no schools showed interest, it would have never happened. <p></p><p>LemonAid was born out of Erics experiences with NCAA athletic recruiting. Finding a team was daunting, especially for a lemon like Eric. He co-created the app to help all student-athletes  and especially lemons like him  connect with coaches, find a team and take advantage of the transformative experience of NCAA athletics. &nbsp;</p><p><b>For more information about </b><a href="http://lemonaidapp.co" target="_blank"><b>LemonAid</b></a><b>, or to schedule an interview, contact:</b></p><p><b>Nate Boyle, CEO &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Eric Knight, Co-Founder</b></p><p>Phone: 703.727.0241 &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Phone: 703.963.5031</p><p>Email: nate@lemonaid.cc &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Email:&nbsp; eric@lemonaid.cc</p><p>Twitter: @nate_boyle &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Twitter: @eric_the_knight</p><p>                                  </p><p>LinkedIn: nateboyle &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;LinkedIn: ericknight2</p>
<p>What Data Tells You about KOL Marketing?</p><p>5 indicators on why KOL marketing is the next big thing 5</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>What is KOL Marketing?</p><p>As the world has shifted to social media, consumers look at fellow consumers to inform&nbsp;their&nbsp;purchasing decisions. Instead of using traditional media outlets, as they did in the past, they now look at each other and at their favorite personalities, who are consolidating massive followings on Twitter, Facebook,&nbsp;Weibo,&nbsp;Wechat&nbsp;or other social networks.</p><p>They are subject-matter experts, personal&nbsp;brands,&nbsp;bloggers who are customers themselves and have already earned trust of your potential customers. Why dont you let them lead your marketing campaigns?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Here we found 5 indicators on why KOL marketing is the next big thing.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>1. Its Powerful</p><p>There are few things that drive a sale more effectively than a warm word-of-mouth recommendation. A study by McKinsey found that marketing-induced consumer-to-consumer word of mouth generates more than twice the sales of paid advertising. And of those that were acquired through word-of-mouth had a 37 percent higher retention rate.</p><p>KOL marketing presents a glaring opportunity for brands to leverage the power of word-of-mouth at scale through personalities that consumers already follow and admire.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>2. Its Social</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>A new report from&nbsp;Salesforce&nbsp;found that 70 percent of brands are increasing their social media spend this coming year.</p><p>Traditionally, consumers made purchasing decisions based on the advertisements that they saw or heard. Today, its easier to connect with other consumers via social media and make better purchasing decisions by learning about their experiences with a product or service.</p><p>People expect brands to talk&nbsp;with&nbsp;them rather than&nbsp;at&nbsp;them. Brands can strategically partner with the right personalities to spark organic conversations and seduce their followers.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>3. Its An Arbitrage</p><p>An arbitrage exists when something is selling for cheaper than it is actually worth. The difference between the goods market price and real value is your profit. In short, it is an opportunity to make big profits with a small effort.</p><p>Arbitrages are common in advertising. For instance, when Facebook first launched its ad network, early adopters reaped record returns on investments (ROIs) because nobody else was competing for the ad-space. However, as Facebook became more popular, more marketers started bidding for ad-space, driving the prices up by more than 335 percent in 2014 and evaporating everybodys ROI.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>4. It Helps Your SEO</p><p>On top of building your brand and improving your sales numbers, KOL marketing also helps your search engine ranking. According to The Social Media Revolution, user generated social posts account for 25 percent of search results for the worlds top 20 brands. The more people mention your brand on social media, the more popular and relevant you will be on Google.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>5. Consumers Are Tired of Paid Ads</p><p>According to research firm&nbsp;Yankelovich,&nbsp;the average American is exposed to 5,000 advertisements a day. Whether or not that number is scientifically proven, it gets the point across: we are exposed to A LOT of ads.</p><p>In fact, we see so many that were unconsciously tuning them out, a phenomenon called banner blindness.&nbsp;Infolinks&nbsp;found that only 14 percent of their respondents could remember the last ad they saw and identify what was being promoted. With all of the advertising interrupting them, its no surprise that people love products like&nbsp;AdBlock, Netflix, and&nbsp;Spotify&nbsp;Premium that take ads out of traditionally ad-saturated media experiences.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><a href="http://www.robin8.com" title="Link: http://www.robin8.com">www.robin8.com</a></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><br></p>
<p>Legacy ER &amp; Urgent Care opened locations in Coppell, Frisco, Keller, McKinney and North Richland Hills this week, making it the nations largest stand-alone provider to offer both urgent care and emergency room services under one roof. Headquartered in Plano, Legacy ER &amp; Urgent Care has an additional location in Frisco and one Allen.</p><p>Our hybrid model is unique to Texas  there are no stand-alone ER-urgent care hybrids in other states. There are only three here in Texas, and we are by far the largest in terms of locations, employees and patients, said Keith Miller, president of Legacy ER &amp; Urgent Care.</p><p>Under the hybrid model, Legacy ER &amp; Urgent Care patients only pay emergency room prices when its truly an emergency, but they still have access to board-certified physicians and state-of-the-art equipment that is not usually available in stand-alone urgent care centers.</p><p>Stand-alone urgent care centers arent required to have a doctor on site and typically dont have the same kind of treatment and diagnostic equipment available. Thats why so many of them get a Doc in the Box reputation, said Dr. Jay Woody, Legacy ER &amp; Urgent Cares founder and chief medical officer. However, if you go to an ER, youre charged ER prices even though about 70 percent of ER visits arent truly an emergency. Legacy ER &amp; Urgent Care is different. We give patients a better option.</p><p>In celebration of the new locations, Legacy ER &amp; Urgent Care is offering $10 flu shots in all the communities it serves. Flu shots are usually covered under health insurance, and we can check that for you when you come in. If youre covered, then the shot is free; but if you dont have insurance or your insurance doesnt cover you 100 percent, then this may be a good option for you, Miller explained.</p><p>                    </p><p>Urgent care and ER hours will be the same in all locations. Urgent care is available from 7:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. daily, and ER services are accessible 24-7, 365 days a year. Online check-in is available at legacyer.com, and walk-ins are welcomed.</p>

<div><div>As we continue sending prayers for Lamar Odom and his loved ones, lets take a moment to understand the estate planning issue presented.</div><div><br></div><div>In most states, including Illinois where I am a lawyer, in an emergency, a persons spouse can make healthcare decisions for their incapacitated spouse. &nbsp;If a married person wants to have someone other than their spouse be responsible for making their emergency healthcare decisions, then that married person needs to complete a healthcare power of attorney to designate someone else. &nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>This 'spousal power' to make healthcare decisions typically terminates upon divorce. &nbsp; However, absent a healthcare power of attorney being completed, a soon-to-be-ex-spouse may remain the healthcare agent until the day the divorce is final.</div><div><br></div><div>Yes, I know, thats a terrifying thought. </div><div><br></div><div>From media reports, Khloe Kardashian and Lamar Odom had signed the divorce papers, and likely, considered themselves divorced. &nbsp;However, until the divorce papers have been entered into the court, a divorce may not be final. &nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>Since the divorce is not final, Khloe was thrusted into the uneviable position of having to make life or death decisions for the husband she's divorcing. &nbsp;My hat's off to her, Khloe is doing a phenomenal job handling one of the toughest roles on the planet. &nbsp;However, she may not have had to endure this role if Lamar had completed a healthcare power of attorney. &nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>So, while we continue to send the Odom and Kardashian families prayers of health and strength, take a moment to take control of your own healthcare. &nbsp; Complete a healthcare power of attorney to appoint someone to make healthcare decisions for you, if you are unable to make them yourself. &nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>Click here for a link to download a <a href="https://legacycompanies.leadpages.co/health-care-poa/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">healthcare power of attorney,</a>&nbsp;FREE! &nbsp; Or, better yet, contact an estate planning attorney to create your entire estate plan. &nbsp;</div><div>--------------------</div><div>Kimberly Jean Brown is a licensed attorney in Illinois. &nbsp;Attorney Brown is on hiatus from her law firm to help launch the startup&nbsp;an online living trust platform that brings cost-conscious consumers together with skilled attorneys to create customized living trusts. &nbsp; LegacyComplete.com launches in November 2015. &nbsp;Kimberly can be reached at (773) 249-4400 x 700, Kimberly@LegacyComplete.com</div><div>----------------------</div><div><i>Legal disclaimer: &nbsp;Although I am an attorney, I am not your attorney. &nbsp;I am not giving you legal advice. &nbsp;Therefore, no attorney-client relationship has been created. &nbsp; &nbsp;Attorney Advertisement.</i></div></div>
