  <p>Collage studies may be continued through taking out loans, even if student will not have a clean history of creating payments before. The truth is that poor credit student loans are a lot easier to avail as compared to other people who have damaged payment history. However, the loan needs to be availed just after evaluating your situation nicely.</p>    <p>First simpler source which you need to search is National loans, which don't need at all the student's poor credit or no credit as an issue. Acceptance of the national loans comes without enquiries about your previous history of payments. Such loans get as Stafford and Perkins loans in subsidized or unsubsidized forms. Furthermore, the student does not have any weight of repayment as it may be produced just after completing the collage studies. Plus loans also are readily available for such borrowers to empower their parent to borrow the loan on behalf of the son or daughter.</p>    <p>However, the issue with national loans is that just those students are eligible who have a successful economic history. Therefore, in case your parents bring in nicely and possess an excellent financial position, you've got little choice than to choose poor credit student loans from private lenders. They are able to provide you with a personal loan in secured or unsecured choice.</p>  <p>&nbsp;</p>  <p>But as you do not have a valued property of your own, you are going to borrow the private loans together with assistance from your parents. They're going to take the loan for you personally. The guaranteed loan is of low interest rate on greater borrowed sum ranging from 5000 to 75000, plus it may be paid back in 5 to 30 years. The unsecured loan is of higher rate of interest, with just smaller number of 3000 to 25000 approved for its repayment in 5 to ten years.</p>    <p>It is best to choose poor credit student loans using a cosigner that has an excellent credit history. This type of cosigner empowers in borrowing the cash at low interest rate. Therefore, it is possible to borrow such loans relating to your own situation.</p><p>Alina Jackson<br>Marketing Advertiser at E Promotional Code UK<br>Dillas Eve ring road New Castle<br>United Kingdom<br>Tel 0041663387323<br>contact@thecollegestudentgiftregistry.com<br><a href="http://www.thecollegestudentgiftregistry.com">http://www.thecollegestudentgiftregistry.com</a><br><br></p>  <br><br><br><br>
<p><b><u>FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE</u></b></p><p><br></p><p><b>A New Theory of How an Equitable World Economy Works &nbsp;</b></p><p><b>&nbsp;</b></p><p><b>MASERU, LESOTHO-December 19, 2015</b></p><p><b><img alt="" src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/robin8-production/robin8-production/bee25706-0f5b-48e4-8c64-012a52e3d423/NewFutureCoverArt.jpg" title="Image httpwwwucarecdncombee25706-0f5b-48e4-8c64-012a52e3d423"><br></b></p><p><b>&nbsp;</b></p><p>An independent researcher Ssemakula Peter Luyima announced today that his new book <i>The New Future of Money</i> published by FeedARead in United Kingdom is now available on Amazon and on different global books sales channels. Ssemakula Peter Luyima studied various world economy/political economy theories and concepts, and now introduces his own theory called MuRatopian Intersection Economy that could salvage the current world economy.</p><p>Ideas have power. Thought precedes action. Changing the economic policies and behaviors that are generating high levels of poverty, widening inequality and bankrupting Nature is not possible without first changing the erroneous economic concepts and theories on which the world economy is currently functioning. A Change in thinking can lead to new foundations of economics. This is the rationale for the new book on New Economic Theory (MuRatopian Intersection Economics) a revised concept initiated by Professor Karou Yamaguchi integrated with Kelsonian two factor market economics and new structural laws of supply and demand to provide the correct formal foundations of theoretical economics. MuRatopian structural axiom set is new in theoretical economics and replaces conventional approaches.<br></p><p>Regarding his new book Ssemakula stated <i>There is an urgent need today to understand why old theories were created, where and why they fail now and then propose a feasible, more efficient alternative. This is the rationale and justification for a re-evaluation of the fundamental concepts and premises of traditional economic theory with the goal of developing a new theory to achieve equitable economic development of the continents of the Earth</i>.<br></p><p>The objective is to harness both public money system and binary market reform with structural axiomatic economics approach to have a new theory of how an equitable world economy works. MuRatopian Intersection Economics is about how an equitable world economy works and practices to create a coherent and comprehensive monetary and unified structurial market system framework for equitable-approach, sustainable world economy and one that incorporates Creativity Machine Paradigm, advocates for democratic capital acquisition with earnings of income to poor and middle class people and to provide compelling educational and communication tools with the power to challenge conventional wisdom and alter university level education, public policy, business decisions, media coverage and general public opinion regarding how the world economy should and can work for the betterment of all humanity.<br></p><p><b>About Ssemakula Peter Luyima</b><br></p><p>Ssemakula Peter Luyima provides a new concept for World Economy in the 21st century, by producing a revised concept of MuRatopian Economy; 30 years after Professor Kaoru Yamaguchi presented a synthesized analysis of the Neoclassical, Keynesian and Marxian with his own public money economic model.<br></p><p>It is this authors intention not only to provide an integrative concept for reconstruction of the World Economy, but to present an equitable economic strategy in the context of Louis Orth Kelsos important two factor economics at the same time. This book is an introduction to a new upcoming theory MuRatopian Intersection Economy.<br></p><p>Ssemakula Peter Luyima was born in Arua, Uganda in East Africa. He is an independent researcher, studying various concepts and theories on world economy, developing a new theory to achieve equitable economic development of the continents of the Earth.<br></p><p><b>The New Future of Money book can now be purchased directly at the authors Amazon page </b><a href="https://www.amazon.com/gp/r.html?C=Z9SQXHR9LXA4&amp;R=K801PWCP5X5T&amp;T=C&amp;U=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fauthor%2Fssemakulaluyima%3Fref_%3Dpe_1724030_132998060&amp;A=FKYN9VAMJQK4Z0R5MAEHC3C0LSYA&amp;H=NCDRD5WPQWJBKLYKPJIH3KHQDMIA&amp;ref_=pe_1724030_132998060" target="_blank">https://www.amazon.com/author/ssemakulaluyima</a><b> and his website can be found at &nbsp;<a href="http://www.muratopianeconomy.tk/">www.muratopianeconomy.tk</a>. The book is also available for purchased at Barnes and Nobel, Apple, Kobo, Scribd, Inktera, 24 Symbols, and Tolino.</b></p><p><b>&nbsp;</b><b>Contact information:</b></p><p><b>&nbsp;</b>Telephone: +26657754830</p><p><b>&nbsp;</b>Email address:<b> <a href="mailto:muratopianeconomy@gmail.com">muratopianeconomy@gmail.com</a></b></p><p>                                                          </p><p><b>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></p>
<p><b><u>FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE</u></b></p><p><b>New Book for a New Economic Theory Features Alternative Monetary and Reform Market System from Traditional Economic Model!</b></p><p><b>MASERU, LESOTHO-December 25th, 2015</b><br></p><p><b><img alt="" src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/robin8-production/robin8-production/8d3e4906-9bf1-4c53-b91a-0b6acbaff3b5/CoverArt.jpg" title="Image httpwwwucarecdncom8d3e4906-9bf1-4c53-b91a-0b6acbaff3b5"><br></b></p><p>Efforts to reform current debt economic system and market system are invariably opposed by both an intellectual orthodoxy and vested economic interests. They draw on the traditional economic system of prevailing macroeconomic theory to support prevailing policies. They argue that given the laws of economy and current circumstances, we are living in the best possible world. This is simply not true. The multidimensional challenges confronting humanity today are human-made and can be changed by a change in thought and action. Theoretical limitations and one factor free market system are a primary root cause of persistent poverty, rapid and rising levels of unemployment, inequality, and calamitous environmental threats. That concern is investigated by <i>The New Future of Money</i> (FeedARead Publishing Press <a href="http://www.feedaread.com/books/The-New-Future-of-Money.aspx">http://www.feedaread.com/books/The-New-Future-of-Money.aspx</a>, which demonstrates that poor and middle class people can leverage both <i>public money system </i>for debt free economies<i> </i>and <i>Kelsonian binary model</i> that places great importance on  democratizing the process of democratic capital acquisition as a means of promoting widespread prosperity and economic justice for all people other than Full employment alone, while reducing or eliminating their vulnerability to macroeconomic model. </p><p>Ssemakula Peter Luyima, the author, is an independent researcher (<a href="http://www.muratopianeconomy.tk/">http://www.muratopianeconomy.tk/</a>) formerly with Science and Engineering Research Centre Nairobi Kenya, whose scientific research background-under different mentorship guidance of Kenyan Professor Madara Ogot and recently with Japanese Professor Kaoru Yamaguchi, Binary Economist Professor Robert Ashford advocating the legacy of Louis Orth Kelso, Germany Professor Egmont Kakarot and Dr Stephen Thaler pioneering Creativity Machine Paradigm-enabled him to identify the new MuRatopian Intersection Economics he describes. While most of the concepts arent usually thought of as important to form a new economic foundation, intersection of all the mentioned concepts is a key qualification for success in building a uniform world equitable economic foundation.</p><p>For example:</p><p></p><ul><li>Public Money Administration best practices in monetary system design would be a strong asset in monetary stability and financial stability.<br></li><li>Kelsonian binary model could become a Creativity Machine Paradigm partner for ownership broadening system of corporate finance, principal of objectivity of binary financing principles that demonstrate both labor and capital do work, and detailing the principles of a broader distribution of capital acquisition with the earnings of capital, binary economic growth, of sustainability function and requires no government distribution, borrowing, command, or other market intervention.<br></li><li>MuRatopian Intersection Economics analysis explains a new paradigm of how markets should function. When do market institutions fail? How do they behave when they fail? How markets should be designed to minimize failure, and what tradeoffs with market efficiency arise in doing so?<br></li><li>The new economy investigation begins analyzing some specific aspects of the current debt economic system and implementation need of the new integrated concepts of public money system, Kelsonian binary model, Creativity Machine Paradigm with new structural laws of demand and supply.<br></li></ul><p></p><p>Global readers may be motivated to become MuRatopian economists, or advocates specializing in MuRatopian Intersection Economics. Many of the multidisciplinary fields can be springboards for consulting practices-or new revenue streams for established consultancies.</p><p>As Ssemakula describes each concept in MuRatopian Intersection Economics, readers will:</p><p></p><ul><li>Understand why public money system can be a significant advantage to World Economy<br></li><li>Be able to imagine themselves in the new economy reading about how the typical equitable world economy works<br></li><li>Understand how the future objective free market economy that can allow the broad distribution of capital acquisition and income to working class and poor people around the world<br></li><li>Learn how Creativity Machine Paradigm is affecting employment, as well as what the future world brain will likely be<br></li></ul><p></p><p>Readers will learn how public money system communities tailored with how labor can broadly benefit as capital owners related to production and consumption: the entire living population of nations around the world, as well as future generations, within the future time horizon considered.</p><p>While there are many books describing economic inequalities, Ssemakulas gives new- and much broader- meaning to the term <i>MuRatopian Intersection Economics</i>, demonstrating that an equitable world economy constitutes precious new economic theory in a world dependent on globalization.</p><p><b>CONTACT</b>:</p><p>Ssemakula Peter Luyima</p><p>26657754830</p><p><a href="mailto:muratopianeconomy@gmail.com">muratopianeconomy@gmail.com</a> </p><p><b>About Ssemakula Peter Luyima</b><br></p><p>Ssemakula Peter Luyima provides a new concept for World Economy in the 21st century, by producing a revised concept of MuRatopian Economy; 30 years after Professor Kaoru Yamaguchi presented a synthesized analysis of the Neoclassical, Keynesian and Marxian with his own public money economic model.<br></p><p>It is this authors intention not only to provide an integrative concept for reconstruction of the World Economy, but to present an equitable economic strategy in the context of Louis Orth Kelsos important two factor economics at the same time. This book is an introduction to a new upcoming theory MuRatopian Intersection Economy.<br></p><p></p><p>Ssemakula Peter Luyima was born in Arua, Uganda in East Africa. He is an independent researcher, studying various concepts and theories on world economy, developing a new theory to achieve equitable economic development of the continents of the Earth.</p><p><b>The New Future of Money book can now be purchased directly at the authors Amazon page</b><b>&nbsp;</b><a href="https://www.amazon.com/gp/r.html?C=Z9SQXHR9LXA4&amp;R=K801PWCP5X5T&amp;T=C&amp;U=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fauthor%2Fssemakulaluyima%3Fref_%3Dpe_1724030_132998060&amp;A=FKYN9VAMJQK4Z0R5MAEHC3C0LSYA&amp;H=NCDRD5WPQWJBKLYKPJIH3KHQDMIA&amp;ref_=pe_1724030_132998060" target="_blank">https://www.amazon.com/author/ssemakulaluyima</a><b>&nbsp;</b><b>and his website can be found at &nbsp;</b><a href="http://www.muratopianeconomy.tk/"><b>www.muratopianeconomy.tk</b></a><b>. The book is also available for purchased at Barnes and Nobel, Apple, Kobo, Scribd, Inktera, 24 Symbols, and Tolino.</b></p><p>### &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<br></p>

<p></p><blockquote><p>GrowthGrader Available for Free Access For Limited Time<br></p><p>New Rochelle, United States - December 15, 2015 /MarketersMedia/&nbsp; An up-and-coming business consultant has created the first interactive online tool for entrepreneurs to help them grow their businesses.</p><p>GrowthGrader, created by rising Armenian entrepreneur and consultant Levon Arakelyan, is a new online tool that will help entrepreneurs and small business owners create actionable growth plans for their businesses. The service will be offered for free for a limited time at&nbsp;<a href="http://www.levonarakelyan.com/growth-grader/" target="_blank">www.levonarakelyan.com/growth-grader</a>.</p><p>GrowthGrader is based on a formula Arakelyan created for his upcoming program called The Authentic Business Academy. It was designed to provide small business owners with insights into their business and the ways to improve it.</p><p>GrowthGrader produces an action plan for your business in the form of a beautiful PDF infographic that will give you a birds eye view on different important areas of your business that you need to focus on, Arakelyan said. I am very pleased to offer entrepreneurs an affordable way to learn how to grow their businesses exponentially by inviting them to beta test the program for free for a limited time.</p><p>In addition to creating GrowthGrader, Arakelyan is developing many more interactive tools for small businesses and entrepreneurs. His grand plan is to make business development consulting easily accessible to anyone who might need it.</p><p>Arakelyans upcoming course The Authentic Business Academy will teach business owners, both online and offline, how to quickly become their own consultant, without having to pay enormous amounts of money to others to handle the simple things they can do themselves.</p><p>With more and more individuals starting their own businesses, the need for business consulting is now increasing like never before, Arakelyan said. However, the services provided by consultants are out of reach for most of the entrepreneurs. I aim to change this by providing comprehensive, user-friendly and affordable services that empower entrepreneurs to grow their own businesses.</p><p>Starting today, Arakelyan is providing one-on-one sessions to determined entrepreneurs completely free of charge, helping them to improve their results dramatically without having to spend a dime on consulting.</p><p>For more information about the sessions, email Arakelyan at levon@theresonant.net.</p><p>About Levon Arakelyan</p><p>Levon Arakelyan is an entrepreneur and consultant based in Armenia and United States who works with companies and entrepreneurs around the world. After studying law for five years, he left college to pursue entrepreneurship. He has since created several successful software-as-a-service businesses for the internet marketing community. Having a background in a wide range of fields, including design, branding, web development, internet marketing and entrepreneurship, Arakelyan has now put his experience in the service of like-minded entrepreneurs who need help achieving success.</p><p># # #</p><p>For more information about us, please visit&nbsp;<a href="http://www.levonarakelyan.com/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">http://www.levonarakelyan.com/</a></p><p>Contact Info:<br>Name: Levon Arakelyan<br>Organization: THERESONANT, LLC<br>Address: 1 RADISSON PLAZA, STE #800, NEW ROCHELLE, NY, 10801, UNITED STATES<br>Phone: +1 (917) 8183340</p></blockquote><p></p>
<b></b><p>                   </p><p><i></i><i><b>The Star Wars inspired students have created a remarkable new skincare line using post-production principles they learned during film school at USC.</b></i><b>&nbsp;</b></p><p><b><i>Hollywood, CA- December 21, 2015</i>- &nbsp;</b>The social desire for beauty and perfection is at an all time high, being proven as millionsof-viewers tuned in around the world to watch the crowning of &nbsp;the next&nbsp;Miss Universe. With so many beauty and makeup lines on the market today, it is hard to stand out of the crowd, but a group of Star Wars loving film students have done just that.<br></p><p>Recently graduating from USCs film program, partially named after the <i>Star Wars</i> creator George Lucas, the group of students recently launched a remarkable&nbsp;new line of organic skincare. The creators of the new line <a href="http://www.ZzMineralMakeup.Com" target="_blank"></a><b><a href="http://www.ZzMineralMakeup.Com" target="_blank">Banish</a></b><a href="http://www.ZzMineralMakeup.Com" target="_blank"> by </a><i><b><a href="http://www.ZzMineralMakeup.Com" target="_blank">Zz Mineral</a></b></i>, used classic principles from post-production editing of film and photography, they said <i>Star Wars </i>was a pioneer in perfecting the art of color correcting. Its a process that uses certain parts of the color-wheel to balance out and even out noticeably incorrect colors on the film. We applied the same principles, figuring out how to color correct peoples skin-tone, while helping treat their skin problems fast and effectively.</p><p><b>Banish </b>by <i>Zz Mineral </i>is a highly innovative line of organic skincare products, helping to instantly heal and restore skin discoloration from breakouts, bruises, dark eye circles, age spots and other skin problems. The products use the same technique discovered by <i>Star Wars</i> editors to correct skin-tone instantly, helping to replace the use of makeup, by counter-balancing the colors around the targeted area.</p><p>For More Information, visit: <a href="http://www.ZzMineralMakeup.Com">www.ZzMineralMakeup.Com</a></p><p><br></p>

The company has since relocated its headquaters to Singapore in  2012 and has ambitions to expand into South East Asia. From  a wholesaler of essential oils in 2007, we have since expanded our  services to include white labelling, retailing under our own brand and  creating custom gifts for entities as well as individuals. <br></p>

<p>I can't believe the year is coming to an end!</p><p>This week Architectural Systems celebrated the Holiday Season with a fabulous luncheon in the ASI Showroom toasting to creativity, collaboration and success into the New Year. Everyone shared their top moments, products and projects of 2015!</p><p>So for the last blog of the year, I wanted to recap the highlights with all of you! On a personal note, my favorite part of the year was getting ENGAGED last month in the ASI Showroom! &nbsp;</p><p>My top product introduction of 2015 would be Quarto Stone Veneers; ASI will be officially launching this innovative product in January! I am excited to see how designers will incorporate this material into their projects. Where do you see using it?</p><p>As for projects, I adored working with Synergistic Designs on Thistle and Bee, Too! This was a new retail concept for a global wholesaler and a true modern interpretation of a jewelry store design integrating <a href="http://www.archsystems.com/en-US/Brands--Collections/Specialty/Cast-Stone-Dimensional-Panels/">Cast Stone Dimensional Panels</a>&nbsp;for the exterior facade and luxe <a href="http://www.archsystems.com/DSBUS109.aspx">quilted leather with </a><a href="http://www.archsystems.com/DSBUS109.aspx">crystals</a>, and <a href="http://www.archsystems.com/DSBUS032.aspx">metallic wood</a>&nbsp;for the interior. I sure wouldnt mind a gift from here this season!</p><div>Rachel Cooper, SVP of Sales (and my older sister) shared that her favorite ASI moment was mixing business and pleasure when we meet tennis superstar, interior design entrepreneur, and Boutique Design NYs keynote speaker, Venus Williams! <p><b>Vaccination, early detection and treatment play key role in controlling influenza epidemic</b></p><p>PLANO, TX (Dec. 21, 2015) Cold and flu (commonly referred to as the influenza) season are officially here, peaking in the U.S. between December and February. If you havent had a flu vaccination yet, its not too late to get one. But if you did get vaccinated, it doesnt guarantee you wont get the flu, notes Co-Founder and Chief Medical Officer Jay Woody, M.D., of <a href="http://www.legacyer.com/">Legacy ER &amp; Urgent Care</a>, one of the nations first hybrid health care models offering both urgent care and emergency room treatment options under one roof.</p><p>Even if youve had the flu vaccine this season, its possible to become ill with a strain of flu that isnt covered, Woody explains. But that shouldnt stop one from trying to protect themselves every year. The majority of people who get flu shots wont get the flu that season.</p><p>The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommends the flu vaccine annually for everyone six months and older. But thats just the first step. Take preventative steps such as staying away from people who are ill and washing your hands regularly. Touching doorknobs, faucet handles and other everyday objects we come in contact with, as well as shaking hands or eating and drinking after someone, are common ways to spread germs. Dont go to work if youre ill or send your children to school or day care.</p><p>Legacy ER &amp; Urgent Care still has the flu vaccine available and physicians are on staff to treat you if you become ill. People at high risk, especially, should seek treatment  children younger than two years, adults 65 and older, pregnant women and people with certain medical conditions. Influenza antiviral drugs are prescribed.</p><p>At other urgent care facilities, patients typically have a 2 to 3 hour wait time until they can see a doctor, even with call ahead scheduling. At Legacy ER &amp; Urgent Care, the average wait time is less than eight minutes, with most patients being seen, treated and released in less than one hour. This is particularly helpful when time is scarce for scheduling an appointment with your regular physician or youre trying to get the flu vaccine.</p><p>How do you know whether you have a cold or the flu? The onset of symptoms is the first clue. A cold comes on gradually, while the flu hits quickly. Fever  typically lasting 3-4 days, aches and chills are the primary symptoms of the flu, whereas a cold is marked by sneezing, stuffy nose and sore throat. You may experience chest discomfort and a cough with both, in varying severity. A headache and fatigue or weakness are common with the flu but rare with a cold.</p><p>At Legacy ER &amp; Urgent Care, were here when you need us, Woody said. Illness doesnt strike when its convenient, during a doctors office hours. We have board certified medical doctors on staff around the clock. There is no need to put off getting the flu vaccine.</p><p>Legacy ER &amp; Urgent Cares hybrid model (both a free standing emergency room and urgent care center), allows patients to only pay for the care they need. Billing is always based on whether a condition was an urgent care visit (more than 70 percent fall into this category) or an emergency. Patients wont be billed for an emergency, no matter what time of day, unless they actually receive emergency care.</p><p>Urgent care hours are from 7 a.m. to 9 p.m. daily, and emergency room services are accessible 24/7, 365 days a year. Online check-in is available and walk-ins are welcomed.</p><p><b>About Legacy ER &amp; Urgent Care:</b> Founded in 2008, Legacy ER &amp; Urgent Care is one of the nations first stand-alone health care models to offer both urgent care and emergency room treatment options under one roof. It has built an exceptional customer service program and rating by providing transparent billing, soothing environments and one-on-one service with board-certified, emergency-trained physicians. Patients have access to immediate, on-site emergency room equipment and only pay emergency care prices when it is truly an emergency. For more information, visit <a href="http://legacyer.com/">http://legacyer.com/</a>, <a href="https://www.facebook.com/LegacyERandUrgentCare">https://www.facebook.com/LegacyERandUrgentCare</a> or <a href="https://twitter.com/legacyertx">https://twitter.com/legacyertx</a>.</p><p>###</p><p><b>Media Contact:</b></p><p>Stephen Fashoro </p><p>TrizCom PR</p><p>Ph: 972.247.1369</p><p>Cell: 469.628.6471</p><p>                                                      </p><p><a href="mailto:Stephen@TrizCom.com">Stephen@TrizCom.com</a></p>

According to the report, the global <a title="Link: http://www.marketresearchstore.com/report/nurse-call-system-market-z40256" href="http://www.marketresearchstore.com/report/nurse-call-system-market-z40256">nurse call system market</a> was valued at around USD 600.0 million in 2014 and is expected to reach USD 1,600.0 million in 2020, growing at a CAGR of around 14.0% between 2015 and 2020.</p>  <p>Nurse call system (NCS) is a widely used innovative healthcare communication systems. Most of the healthcare institutions and hospitals aim to offer reliable communication facilities their patients. Installed near to a patients bed, a nurse call system helps patients to generate alert for hospital staff of nurse in case of emergency conditions. A nurse call system is of crucial importance in healthcare communication, which provides efficient and effective tool for communication between patient and hospital staff. Noiseless operation, automatic data logging, low voltage operations that avoid short circuit, pleasant annunciation and multiple call indications are some of the most important advantages of nurse call system. A nurse call system can be an audio or visual reminder via radio pagers, mobile phones or tablets.</p>  <p>Browse the full "<b><i>Nurse Call System Market by Equipment Type (Nurse Call Buttons, Nurse Call Intercoms, Nurse Call Mobile Systems, and Nurse Call Integrated Communication Systems) by Communication Technology (Wired Communication Equipment and Wireless Communication Equipment) for Hospitals, OPD Clinics, Assisted Living Centers, and Ambulatory Services: Global Industry Perspective, Comprehensive Analysis and Forecast, 2014  2020</i></b>" report at <a title="Link: http://www.marketresearchstore.com/report/nurse-call-system-market-z40256" target="_blank" href="http://www.marketresearchstore.com/report/nurse-call-system-market-z40256">http://www.marketresearchstore.com/report/nurse-call-system-market-z40256</a></p>  <p>Rising level of awareness among the hospital management regarding importance of advance technology has been resulted into growing demand for nurse call systems across the world. <p>   	 	 	 	<style>p { margin-bottom: 0.25cm; direction: ltr; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 120%; }p.western { font-family: "Liberation Serif","Times New Roman",serif; font-size: 12pt; }p.cjk { font-family: "Droid Sans Fallback"; font-size: 12pt; }p.ctl { font-family: "FreeSans"; font-size: 12pt; }</style>   </p><p>The scope of employment relationship is discussed in the convention collective gratuite. Convention collective is the agreement between employer and trade union. Achieving collective bargaining is the main goal of this agreement. Some of the things that are established in such agreements are like wages, hour of operations, promotions etc. To avoid any disputes basic employment terms are discusses.  </p> <p>Droit du travail is considered when drafting this agreement. Labor law is different in every country. Sometimes labor laws adopted by a company might be different. So it is very important to consider this fact while planning to draft such an agreement. Every workplace issues are different and so in order to address your issue aptly you need to create such agreement carefully. Thus it is vital to know the facts linked with the state Droit du travail.</p> <p>Understand one thing that convention collective gratuite cannot be used to give up rights that are imposed by law on either of the party. This agreement is not used in order to reduce the safety standards. State laws govern commercial contracts. Collective bargaining agreement is governed by the federal labor law. In such labor law, certain issues related to collective bargaining are discussed.</p> <p>Droit du travail basically clarifies obligations of business owners to employees. Such labor laws are taken into account while drafting collective bargaining agreement because it protects right of workers, improves safety of workers, prevents child labor etc. This type of law enhances bargaining power of employees in front of company owners. Happy employees work in efficient way. To keep employees satisfied you need to create convention collective agreement that is favorable.</p> <p>Employers can get chance to provide equal opportunities to workforce with such legal agreements. Whether it is small or large company, employers need to work without making collective bargaining agreement. Following labor law while creating this type of agreement can allow you to get appropriate basic structure of agreement. Employers can basically find it easy to take sound decision. When creating the convention collective agreement labor law is of great help.</p> <p>Labor law is followed so you avoid issues in sex, race, creed and the rest. Employers can get proper line of work without violating law. Labor law is designed in order to keep the employees from doing wrong. Thus it is vital to follow the rules as well as regulations in the law when creating legal collective bargaining agreement. Labor laws are different for adults and children. Consider this factor when making agreement. Labor union can help you in best possible way while drafting agreement between you and employers.</p> <p>Employees have the right to be safe and this agreement can help them get this. You can carry out research to know more about the legal terms with the collective bargaining agreement as well as labor law. <a target="_blank" href="http://www.legisocial.fr/conventions-collectives-nationales">Click here</a>.<br></p>  <br>

<p><b>More Than 270 Children across Texas Receive Holiday Gifts</b></p><p>DALLAS, TEXAS (Dec. 22, 2015)Christmas is just around the corner, but for 97 families across the state, the holiday cheer arrived much earlier this year. <a href="http://www.heroesforchildren.org/Default.aspx">Heroes for Children</a> (HFC)  a unique nonprofit that provides social and financial assistance to families whose children are battling cancer  hosted Holiday Heroes celebrations in Austin, Dallas, Houston and Fort Worth, providing an evening of holiday cheer for families facing a cancer diagnosis.</p><p>A cancer diagnosis can cause a strain on any familys income, which makes purchasing gifts for the holidays really difficult, says Larissa Linton, cofounder and executive director of Heroes for Children. To alleviate the financial burden and provide a sense of normalcy, each year we host Holiday Heroes to allow families to celebrate the season, despite their childs cancer diagnosis.<br></p><p>This year more than 97 families  which included 272 children from Austin, Dallas, Houston and Fort Worth  participated in Holiday Heroes celebrations, the most families served since the program began. For the first time ever the program was brought to Austin to serve children who are being treated at Dell Childrens Hospital. This is also the first year that the program was solely funded by the support of local businesses, organizations and families  including UnitedHealthcare, McKesson, Bank of America in Dallas, Riveron Consulting in Houston, and Keller Williams South in Austin.</p><p>Holiday Heroes offers full holiday joy to the families, which it serves throughout the year. Each holiday season, social workers choose families in need from hospitals across the state of Texas served by Heroes for Children. Families selected for the program are adopted and benefit from individual, corporate and community sponsors. These sponsors can contribute pure financial support, or they can get more involved on a personal level. Sponsors that choose to be more involved will go out into the community and shop, wrap and donate gifts to HFC families. To find out how to help with next years Holiday Heroes event, please visit <a href="http://www.heroesforchildren.org">http://www.heroesforchildren.org</a>.</p><p><b>About Heroes for Children</b></p><p>Heroes for Children is a unique nonprofit organization that provides social and financial assistance to families whose child has cancer. Since 2005, Heroes for Children has helped alleviate families worries, giving them comfort and a brief respite from the everyday challenges of fighting cancer and care giving. Since its inception, more than $5 million has been given to 4,200 families in need. To learn more about Heroes for Children, please visit <a href="http://www.heroesforchildren.org">http://www.heroesforchildren.org</a>.</p><p>###</p><p><b>Media Contact</b></p><p>Katie Mudd</p><p>TrizCom PR</p><p>Office: 972-247-1369</p><p>                                                          </p><p>Cell: 214-676-4254</p>

<p>Joseph DAntonis new spy thriller thrusts readers into a bold espionage journey to stop an Argentine mobster from completing his horrific biological experiments to weaponize children. The adventure begins when Wades handler and lover Megan Winslow disappears only to be found deep undercover as a lab technician in a mob controlled medical facility where orphan children are being injected to become the mobsters instruments of destructions. Facing the overwhelming odds of a well-armed private army, Wade Hanna has little time to apply his unique skills as a black ops specialist to save Megan and the children. </p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>While the science fiction genre has long been a staple of the literary world, readers and critics alike often cry out for narratives based on true science that dont succumb to unreal assumptions and grandiose imagination. Thankfully, Joseph DAntoni applies his forty-five years of experience as a forensic expert and extensive researcher to bring us this market gripping fourth novel in his covert intelligent series. </p><p>Shadow Cell is a fiction book based in the 1980s on real medical experiments previously conducted by the Nazis during WWII. It takes us on a journey of what those experiments might have produced with todays technology. The author makes the believable account of what would happen if such secret research found its way to unscrupulous world powers unfriendly to America. </p><p>Synopsis:</p><p>Based on the evidence, Wade Hanna had reason to believe Megan was dead. With dogged determination and tracking skills learned in his Louisiana swamp Wade discovers Megan is not dead but on her own dangerous undercover mission for Army intelligence. Her medical training which made her cover story believable to the terrorist has now become life threatening. She faces likely discovery and torture if she doesnt apply her biomedical talents to the will of her mobster boss. </p><p>Wades single focus to save her soon becomes a suicide mission as Megan faces choices between the childrens lives and her own. Even with the help of Wades black ops European mentor Leopold, Wade has to cleverly think through every small step of his own survival to rescue her. He relies mostly on instincts to disguise himself among the friendly people he so desperately needs to help.</p><p>Shadow Cell is not a story about a sleeper terrorist cell waiting to come alive within our shores. Its about real cells in our body and how through technology they can and may in the future be manipulated. Children are particularly vulnerable in this story because they were exploited for their cell generating capacity as well as being ideal targets against weaknesses and loopholes in Americas adoption and immigration system.</p><p>If there is a secondary message for readers of Shadow Cell it is to urge them to become more vigilant. Question, understand and close weaknesses in our borders, internet and electronic systems we depend on and hold dear to our way of life but can be exploited by our enemies.</p><p>DAntoni will soon start working on the fifth novel in this series which is scheduled for release in 2016. Shadow Cell is available now on Amazon. You can follow the author on social media through his website. He has appeared on numerous syndicated shows and is available for interviews </p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>About the Author:</p><p>Joseph DAntoni was born in Louisiana and went to school in both Louisiana and California where he obtained advanced degrees including his doctorate from the University of Southern California. He has served in the military and on the faculty of three major universities. He now lives and works in California where his continues his successful practice as a court testifying forensic economist. His clients have included the FBI, The Justice Department, Intelligence Agencies and major law firms throughout the country. &nbsp;</p><p>                          </p><p>Aside from writing and consulting Joseph is an acclaimed fine art photographer and artist having exhibited in his own and numerous artist shows. He has received distinguished awards for both his writing and art.&nbsp;</p>

The concept of world domination used to be relegated to science fiction movies however Amazon may yet become one of the first to make it a reality.<br><br>Their recent addition of the Streaming Partners program could be the start of Amazon as the worlds first global OTT (over the top) programming provider.<br><br>With 83.5% of Facebook users and 79% of Twitter users coming from outside the US, companies today must be globally focused to truly compete and grow.<br><br>Comcast business is limited to the US.&nbsp; With cable systems passing about 44% of all US homes and 22 million subscribers it has a strong presence but only in the US.<br><br>Amazon is a global company; According to Mark Mahaney, analyst at RBC Capital Markets, 37% of its 80 million Prime subscribers are from outside the US and is growing quickly.<br><br>Amazons foray into OTT is the precursor to the separation of the programming platform from the wired cable.&nbsp; I believe that sometime in the next 3 to 5 years most cable companies will sell broadband access only and the program offerings will be spun off into separate companies which will have lots of competition from OTT providers like Amazon. &nbsp;Much like what happened with the separation of local and long distance telephone service.<br><br>The acquisition of Comcast would thrust Amazon into becoming a leading OTT service with a major share of the new on demand marketplace as well as the existing cable net universe.<br><br>With Comcast Amazon would obtain major US direct to home distribution, a major movie studio, 16 major cable nets, including Bravo, USA Network, E Entertainment, CNBC, MSNBC, Golf Channel, Syfy and more as well as acquire the management and capabilities of a programming powerhouse with NBC.<br><br>The other businesses of Comcast such as the Universal Studios theme parks could be a great place to promote all of Amazons products and businesses.&nbsp; The Comcast Spectacor and Ventures segments could be kept or spun off.<br><br>With the recent announcement of the expansion of its Prime Video service with the addition of the Streaming Partners program Amazon is quickly becoming like a new type of cable operator as they will offer cable nets, on demand and a la carte pay tv.<br><br>This is one of the first non-related party deals where major cable nets will be sold by an OTT provider. Amazon will be selling its Prime customers Showtime, Starz, A+E Network, AMC, Ring TV Boxing and others.&nbsp; Showtime and Starz will each sell for only $8.99 per month (less than on most cable systems).&nbsp; The other services will be priced accordingly.<br><br>Until streaming media cable operators totally controlled what you could watch in your home.&nbsp; They had such a strong hold on the distribution that, as far back as the 1980s the program services began selling the operators equity stakes to assure distribution.&nbsp; Most recently the BBC sold 50% of their US TV network to AMC to substantially improve their ability to obtain cable access and receive favorable affiliate fees.<br><br>You may recall the dispute Comcast had with Netflix a few years ago which was resolved by Netflix paying Comcast a fee to assure that Netflix customers would have access to quality streaming pictures.&nbsp; While a major premise of Net Neutrality is to eliminate the chance that cable operators could pick and choose what subscribers can access from the internet, it is uncertain as to whether it will become law.<br><br>In order to guarantee distribution of a product many companies choose to control the entire distribution from factory to consumer.&nbsp;&nbsp; Retailers like Coach own stores to assure control over their distribution and sales.<br><br>The only way Amazon can guarantee the ability to distribute its video programming direct to consumers, without the possibility of cable operator control and compensation, is to own the cable operator.<br><br>In addition to obtaining direct broadband access to consumers, Amazon would obtain all the behavior information of its users and all the agreements with the program providers. The cable consumer behavior database for 18% of US households would be valuable to increasing the sales for the retailing side of Amazon.<br><br>As the largest cable operator Comcast most likely has the best rates and terms for the cable programming networks.&nbsp; In addition Comcast most likely has most favored nations clauses in their agreements.&nbsp; MFNs guarantee that if a programmer gives a better deal to another cable company then Comcast has to get the same deal.<br><br>Owning the largest cable operator would also provide substantial leverage for Amazon to extract beneficial terms from the program networks to expand Amazons OTT platform globally as well as for their wired customer offerings.<br><br>Owning some of the top cable networks and a major movie studio would enable Amazon to become the dominant force in on demand subscription based programming as well as to become a formidable competitor to Netflix, the current dominant player.<br><br>As a global company Amazon has a worldwide customer base and relationships in many countries.&nbsp; 30 million of Amazons Prime customers are outside the US.&nbsp; &nbsp;Digital subscriptions can be sold worldwide provided the seller owns the rights.&nbsp; Owning a movie studio and many major cable networks could help with the rights issues and adding all of Comcasts owned cable networks into the OTT offering could provide a formidable package to market worldwide.<br><br>The ability to grow Comcasts TV business globally is substantial for Amazon.&nbsp; Bottom line is Amazon can afford to pay a lot more for Comcast than most others.<br><br>Comcast has 23 million customers and passes 54 million homes (potential customers).&nbsp; 54 million homes represents 44% of all homes in the US.&nbsp;&nbsp; While we do not know how many of those homes already buy from Amazon surely there are lots that do not.<br><br>But even better is the golden handcuffs deals Amazon could offer existing Prime subscribers to add Comcast broadband.&nbsp; This could be a higher level of Prime.&nbsp; In any case the ability to bundle and package broadband access with the buying of products could create advantage for Amazon in competitive market.&nbsp; Watch out Walmart.<br><br>Now is the time for Amazon to buy Comcast as they are still effectively a minor player in video.&nbsp; An acquisition of Comcast would most likely not be challenged by the FTC or the Justice Department.<br><br>A simple stock merger could be a goldmine for Comcast shareholders.&nbsp; As for Amazon shareholders they would benefit from becoming the market leader in the future of television globally.<br><br>Amazon stock has grown over 355% in the last almost 4 years. Compare that to Comcasts 252% growth.&nbsp; Trading Comcast for Amazon could put lots more value in Comcast shareholders pockets sooner.<br><br>Amazon has traditionally been a builder and not a buyer.&nbsp; However at some point they may realize that its more profitable to acquire success then to build it from the ground up. Further it would be almost impossible to build an entertainment asset base that Comcast has from scratch.&nbsp; Further the new OTT, on demand, market is changing and growing quickly and it would take far too long to even create a fraction of Comcasts assets even if Amazon only focused on the video portion.<br><br>Im not an investment banker so I wont get into the financial deal strategies.&nbsp; However I will note that Amazon, in addition to all the strategic benefits cited in this article, could truly benefit from adding Comcasts $17 Billion cash flow.&nbsp; As for the deal structure Ill leave that to the experts.<br><br>The acquisition of Comcast by Amazon would bring Amazon a whole host of benefits from a very strong entertainment powerhouse, many cable nets thereby creating a very robust OTT offering, vertical integration for the OTT service, $17 billion in cash flow and much more.&nbsp; Also at this stage there should not be antitrust issues. Wait too long and the deal could be stopped.<br><br>@jeffbezos what are you waiting for?

<p>First of all, we have steel. Steel is the oldest material used for bike frames. Lately, this material has known an immense technological progress, the density not being as high as it used to be. Thus, the frame also weighs less than before. The bike frames made from steel are a bit more difficult to manufacture than the ones made from aluminium, which also makes them more expensive. These frames are well-known for their shock resistance as well as for their weight resistance. The joints are also more resistant than with the aluminium frames. The joints are one of the specific features of these bike frames, the pipes also being thinner than with the aluminium ones.</p><p>The steel frames are the heaviest of all the bike frames on the market and there are very high chances that they get rusty if they are not properly treated. For instance, they get rusty if you leave them out in the rain, if you drop paint on them and so on. They can be hit, the worst case scenario being that they bend a little. These frames are also less rigid than the aluminium ones and they also protect the rider's back better than these ones.</p><p><a href="http://www.hulkbike.com/carbon-rims-c-41/">carbon mtb rim</a></p><p><a href="http://www.hulkbike.com/carbon-rims-c-41/">carbon bicycle rim</a></p><p>        </p><p><a href="http://www.hulkbike.com/carbon-rims-c-41/">carbon mountain bike rim</a></p>

Dedicated and passionate coaches now have the opportunity of streamlining their coaching practice on the virtual platform. The coaching management software offered by QML24 is here to offer them utmost convenience in executing a gamut range of operations. From client care and coaching to payments and billing, This particular platform helps coaches with every little nuance of imparting perfect training. <br><br>With the help of this unique platform, coaches get the opportunity of bundling multiple offerings in a single package. Moreover, they also receive perfect Scheduling and Tracking of clients. As the most desired consequence of its comprehensive marketing, trainers get to deliver highly professional and smooth enrollment experience to clients. Additionally, its capacity to offer proper client management helps it qualify as a quality management system. Coaches and trainers can now put personalized training programs on offer and also build and maintain client profiles. <br><br>To quote one of the spokesperson of QML24, As one of the leading coaching management platforms, QML24 is designed and destined to meet the expectations of passionate coaches and  trainers. Rather, we claim to be that comprehensive platform, which provides you the golden opportunity of impressing your valued clients. We not only help coaches customize their training programs but also render useful assistance in preparing client questionnaires. <br><br>Reaching the targeted goal happens to be the prime objective of QML24. And with the platform almost 100+ clients manage to secession. Additionally, the platform offers coaching business software, cognitive coaching and life coaching software programs. With comprehensive client follow-up and group session management, QML24 offers you the best-in-class coaching management software. <br><br>Robust security is another crucial aspect of the platform. With the SSL encryption and password protection, QML24 helps your clients self-manage their agreements and schedules. Also to this, they have the opportunity of updating their profiles and gain access to billing history. Coaches and trainers can also collect client interviews, right at the time they need it. In a nutshell, the platform ensures umpteen benefits for both trainers and their clients.<br><br>For more information on the platform and its several highlights, please do visit <a title="Link: https://www.qml24.com/" href="https://www.qml24.com/">https://www.qml24.com/</a><br></p><br>
<p>FORE IMMEDIATE RELEASE</p><p>Tomy Laksamana</p><p>Contact Address: Jl. Pembangunan No.28 Pekanbaru</p><p>Contact E-mail:&nbsp;<a href="mailto:tomylaksamana@gmail.com" target="_blank">tomylaksamana@gmail.com</a></p><p>Phone Number:&nbsp;<a target="_blank">+6285274782102</a></p><p><br></p><p>By Tomy Laksamana</p><p>December 22, 2015</p><p>Pekanbaru, Riau, Indonesia  Travel and tourism website, Morningheart had released a list of the best and popular tourist attractions or in Malang, East Java. Malang was developing further as tourism destination.&nbsp;Tempat wisata di Malangattracted even more visitors year by year. It continued to become the perfect tourism destination for the whole family.</p><p>Quoted from the websites featured article, Morningheart, five tourist attractions in Malang were mentioned as best and popular. Starting the list of popular&nbsp;tempat wisata di Malang&nbsp;was Angkut Museum (Transport Museum) and Movie Star Studio. This tourism spot offered unique non-Indonesian atmosphere and wonderful background for photo shots. Visitors could check a variety of transportation modes (vehicles) or roaming around a variety of zones such as Broadway Street or Las Vegas Zone.</p><p>Coming out to the outskirt of Malang precisely in Batu, a zoo stood proudly. Being a part of Jatim Park 2, the zoo was built with modern style and looked colorful. Visitors might enjoy the collection of faunas from Asia and Africa those could be seen within close range. Standing closely to Batu Secret Zoo was Wildlife Museum where the preserved animals and the bones - including the gigantic dinosaurs - could be found.</p><p>Batu Night Spectacular was another popular&nbsp;tempat wisata di Malang. It opened from afternoon all the way to the night welcoming visitors with sparkling lights and lanterns. Last but not least was Malang Town Square. Similar to Batu Night spectacular, the town square was best visited during afternoon and night. At these times, visitors could enjoy the sparkling lights, tasty and cheap foods or enjoying the view of Malang from a Ferris wheel.</p><p></p><p>About Morningheart: Morningheart is an organization and website focused on tourism and travel of Indonesia. It is built as a way to appreciate the culture and nature of Indonesia.</p>
<p>   	 	 	 	<style>p { margin-bottom: 0.25cm; direction: ltr; line-height: 120%; text-align: left; widows: 2; orphans: 2; }a:link { color: rgb(0, 0, 255); }</style>   </p><p><a></a> December 24, 2015 Los Angeles, California  Every piece of information that is 100% Malibu California can be found in Malibu Living directory. From real estate listings to Malibu events to things that can be done in Malibu to local info  everything is covered under their directory. Currently, Malibu Living is amongst the top directory service providers and is trusted for its exhaustive listings that cover every aspect related to Malibu.  </p> <p> Malibu, an affluent beach city built along 21 miles of pristine California Pacific Coast is a popular location for surfers, adventure lovers, holidaying families, food lovers and shopaholics. Malibu Living, through its updated directory and listings, is always helping these people find relevant Malibu information they have been looking for. Their directory services provide complete listings and information on best surfing spots, restaurants and eateries, best hotels and luxury lodgings, biking, horseback riding, rock climbing, hiking trails, whale watching, shopping centers, community events, and much more.  </p> <p> People interested in Malibu real estate for investments can find all latest listings of beachfront as well as landside properties in Malibu Living website. They can view complete details including price, number of bedrooms and baths, facilities, lot size, time on market, price drop percentage, home size, and Walk Score for each listed property. Malibu Living real estate listings cover every property type  condos, single family homes, properties and manufactured homes. Several images/photos of the property and location info captured through Google Maps and Google Satellite Image are included in each property listing. Realtors and brokers info is also provided in order to help interested buyers move a step further than just browsing through real estate listings.    </p> <p> Malibu Living is a rich source when it comes to local information about Malibu. People visiting Malibu may be aware of its beaches, popular attractions, and real estate, but local information is also essential for having 100% experience of living in Malibu. So, detailed listings of grocery stores, dry cleaners, fitness centers, medical services, pet services, movie theaters, salons and spas, campgrounds, evening entertainment and so on are provided by Malibu Living.        </p> <p> About Malibu Living</p> <p> Malibu Living is a premier Malibu real estate agency that provides real estate as well as local information and details about every other thing that is a part of Malibu community and living. With its office located at Heathercliff Road, Malibu, California, Malibu Living is a one-stop source for obtaining every single information related to Malibu  lodgings and hotels, real estate, Malibu arts and culture, local events and attractions, movie theaters, schools &amp; tutors, medical shops, beaches, best surfing spots, local eating joints, retail shops, libraries, places of worship and much more. Information about everything under the Malibu sun is covered under <a target="_blank" href="http://malibuliving.org">Malibu Living</a>s official website and directory services.   </p>  <br>
<p>Nearly 90 percent of Americans who make New Years resolutions will fail. (<a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/to-your-health/wp/2015/01/07/its-january-7-and-a-quarter-of-us-have-already-abandoned-our-new-years-resolutions/" title="Link: https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/to-your-health/wp/2015/01/07/its-january-7-and-a-quarter-of-us-have-already-abandoned-our-new-years-resolutions/">Washington Post</a>) As a leader in womens health and wellness, <a title="Link: null">Solis Mammography</a> took a look at five of the biggest New Years resolution fails, with suggestions for ways to overcome bars set a bit too high.</p><p>For example, weight loss tops out the list. The problem is that, like men, women pledge dramatic changes instead of gradual habits that will stick. For instance, someone will fail with a month-long juice fast, where they might succeed if they cut back on dessert.<br></p><p>Health and wellness resolutions are really about making important changes that affect your physical, mental and social well-being, says Connie Oliver, vice president of marketing and client relations for Solis Mammography. Its not so much about shedding the muffin top, as it is cutting back on the muffins for breakfast and deciding oatmeal will fuel your day better. Its about making long-term adjustments to how we live, so we can get more out of life.</p><p>But people tend to set unreasonable goals and make absolute statements to motivate themselves, which has the opposite affect when you, say, break open a bag of chips when your resolution was NO CHIPS (<a href="http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2014/12/31/new-years-resolutions_n_6396324.html">Huffington Post</a>). Here are five epic health and wellness resolution fails, and how you can stick to your resolutions:<br></p><p><b>1.&nbsp; &nbsp; </b><b>Fitting into your skinny jeans.</b> According to <a href="http://www.statisticbrain.com/new-years-resolution-statistics/">statisicbrain.com</a>, 38 percent of all New Years resolutions focus on weight loss. Unfortunately, women tend to unrealistically restrict themselves, quickly falling off the horse.<br></p><p>Instead, make healthier food choices; substitute water for soda, and start using a calorie counting program like Weight Watchers or My Fitness Pal to better understand the calories you are actually consuming. Many women underestimate the calories they put in their mouths.<br></p><p><b>2.&nbsp; &nbsp; </b><b>Run a half-marathon. </b>Fitness goals are good, but unless youve successfully run a 10K, focusing on a half-marathon probably isnt the best place to start.<br></p><p>Instead, work up to exercise. The <a href="http://www.cdc.gov/features/healthynewyear/">Centers for Disease Control and Prevention</a> (CDC) recommends activity for at least 2.5 hours a week. Many women think gym, but starting with a walk outdoors is usually a good first step. Recruit a buddy who will hold you accountable. Take the stairs instead of the elevator. And make sure you talk to your doctor before starting anything strenuous.&nbsp;</p><p><b>3.&nbsp; &nbsp; </b><b>Conquering your to-do list by sacrificing sleep. </b>Many women try to accomplish more with late nights and early mornings. But insufficient sleep is associated with a number of chronic diseases and conditions (<a href="http://www.cdc.gov/features/sleep/index.html">CDC</a>).</p><p>Instead, remove TVs and gadgets from your bedroom, create a quiet relaxing environment, and try to schedule your sleep. Adults need 7-8 hours. And remember  sleep is a necessity, not a luxury.<br></p><p><b>4.&nbsp; &nbsp; </b><b>Stop drinking. </b>For some, the need to stop drinking is life or death. Others realize they overindulge and decide to quit cold turkey. Youll need to inventory your lifestyle, and talk to your doctor to decide which category youre in. Studies show that if you can consistently drink two drinks without needing anymore alcohol, you are in a safe zone. But if two drinks consistently trigger the need for more, you might have a problem.<br></p><p>Instead of going it alone, if you fall into the latter category, get help. Alcohol is a real addiction, and a resolution to abruptly stop isnt going to work. There are a lot of organizations to help.<br></p><p><b>5.&nbsp; &nbsp; </b><b>An apple a day keeps the doctor away</b>.<b> </b>Only go to the doctor when you spike a fever? No news is good news, right? Wrong!<br></p><p>Instead, keeping up with regular doctor visits and tests can help you live longer and healthier (<a href="http://www.webmd.com/women/features/health-resolutions-for-women?page=5">WebMD</a>). For example, twice a year dental visits, annual pap smears, vaccines, blood pressure, mammograms starting at 40 and colonoscopies starting at 50 are examples of things you should schedule regularly.<br></p><p>Screenings are important for early detection, so if an issue is discovered, treatment is easier, says Oliver. And with technology constantly advancing, many screenings are much more accurate and sometimes easier than they used to be. For example, 2D mammograms are the standard, but newer 3D mammograms  also known as tomosynthesis  take a much more detailed view of the breast and have been shown to significantly reduce the number of false positives and recalls for additional testing.<br></p><p><b>About Solis Mammography</b><br></p><p>Solis Mammography is a specialized health care provider focused exclusively on providing women an exceptional mammography experience. Headquartered in Addison, Texas, Solis currently operates centers across four states  Texas, Arizona, Ohio and North Carolina. The company operates both wholly owned centers and multiple successful joint ventures with hospital partners. Solis provides a complete range of highly specialized breast health services including screening and diagnostic mammography (2D and 3D), computer-aided detection, breast ultrasound, stereotactic biopsy and ultrasound-guided biopsy. For more information, visit <a href="http://www.solismammo.com/">www.SolisMammo.com</a>, like them on <a href="https://www.facebook.com/SolisMammo">Facebook</a>, follow them on <a href="https://www.pinterest.com/solismammo/" title="Link: https://www.pinterest.com/solismammo/">Pinterest</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/SolisMammo">Twitter</a>, or subscribe to their <a href="https://www.youtube.com/user/solishealth" title="Link: https://www.youtube.com/user/solishealth">YouTube</a> channel.</p><blockquote style="margin: 0 0 0 40px; border: none; padding: 0px;"><blockquote style="margin: 0 0 0 40px; border: none; padding: 0px;"><blockquote style="margin: 0 0 0 40px; border: none; padding: 0px;"><blockquote style="margin: 0 0 0 40px; border: none; padding: 0px;"><blockquote style="margin: 0 0 0 40px; border: none; padding: 0px;"><blockquote style="margin: 0 0 0 40px; border: none; padding: 0px;"><blockquote style="margin: 0 0 0 40px; border: none; padding: 0px;"><blockquote style="margin: 0 0 0 40px; border: none; padding: 0px;"><blockquote style="margin: 0 0 0 40px; border: none; padding: 0px;"><p># #&nbsp; #</p></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote></blockquote><p>For more information, contact Karen Carrera, TrizCom, 972-207-1935, <a href="mailto:karen@trizcom.com">karen@trizcom.com</a> or @kjcarrera.<br></p>
<p>On the heels of a $30 million Series A funding, <a href="http://cymax.com/" rel="nofollow" title="Link: http://cymax.com/">Cymax</a>, a technology focused furniture e-tailer, today announced three major appointments to its marketing and technology teams. Two new vice presidents and a senior director will strengthen Cymax's position as a leader in online furniture sales and play a vital role in its evolution from a data driven e-tailer to an integrated ecommerce technology company.</p><p>Rizwan Somji joins Cymax as vice president of technology, bringing 15 years of experience leading high performance, agile and globally-diverse technology teams. As the former co-founder and VP of engineering for ResponseTek Networks, Somji brings a track record of building highly scalable, hosted SaaS applications to Cymax's growing development team.</p><p>On the retail side, Grant McTaggart joins Cymax as vice president of merchandising and marketing. McTaggart brings over 25 years of experience, most recently as a VP at Best Buy Canada. With deep knowledge of merchandising and consumer behavior, McTaggart will expand and diversify the company's furniture e-tail business with an increased focus on customer experience.</p><p>Cymax is also adding to its data team with the appointment of Nathaniel Payne as senior director of data analytics. Payne was most recently with Cardinal Path where he led data science, engineering and product development. Payne's 15 years of experience in cloud computing and analytics will deliver new insights from Cymax's data to advance its technology and growth.</p><p>"The calibre of talent we've attracted to Cymax's growing leadership team is a strong testament to the market opportunity in front of us," said Arash Fasihi, founder and CEO of Cymax. "The proven track record of these three outstanding individuals will help lead our teams through a time of rapid expansion and scale, and be vital to Cymax in the coming months."</p><p>Cymax has seen 71 per cent growth over the past five years. In October, the multi-brand retailer announced it would utilize its Series A funding to build out an end-to-end ecommerce solution for furniture retailers and develop new technology for shipping and logistics. For more information visit&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cymax.com/" rel="nofollow">www.cymax.com</a>.</p><p>About Cymax:<br>Cymax Stores Inc. is a privately held Canadian online retailer headquartered in Burnaby, British Columbia, Canada. Founded in 2004 by Arash Fasihi, Cymax focuses on home and office furniture and primarily services the United States. With over 75,000 SKUS, Cymax offers one of the largest selections of online items for home and office. Cymax currently showcases the products of more than 300 North American manufacturers including Stanley and Hooker Furniture and does 97 per cent of its sales in the US.</p>

The new animated Christmas music video, Picking Up Santa Claus, answers this challenging question, musically, and makes it sound like child's play! Hear it, in the sweetest of tones, straight from the mouth of babes: 8-year-old singing, twin reindeer sisters? There is something very human about this pair of reindeer, and their singing friends as well. They have the warmest voices. They happen to be my daughters, but everyone seems to agree. I can't sing -- but they surely can!<br> <br> The vocalists include 8-year-old twin sisters, Amy and Nicole Salerno, who have been singing for "many years". When they were in China, at four-and-a-half, the Chinese TV station followed them around trying to get them to perform in their Beijing TV Children's holiday specials. Now, accompanied by Fifth Dimension singer, Leonard Tucker, and without trying to sound even a little bit like an adult, Amy and Nicole make this original Christmas song takes flight. And flight is the keyword here, specially every Christmas Eve, when reindeer suddenly, and mysteriously start to fly!<br> <br> So if you, or yours, have been perplexed for some time contemplating and trying to unravel the mysteries of Santa and his flying reindeer, head over to Youtube.com and watch the new Christmas music video Picking Up Santa Claus <a href="https://youtu.be/7DlJQRgvn9I">https://youtu.be/7DlJQRgvn9I</a>  and have a bunch of cute reindeer, a snowman and a monster or two, sing you some nice sounding answers!<br> <br> JS Enterprises creates animated and interactive presentations and educational material, these days, mostly for children.</p>  <p># # #</p>      <br>
<p><i>The worlds leading millionaire dating app cuts to the good-looking chase with a global meet and greet. Stellar city hopping through NYC, LA, London and Brazil, the luxury app will put the opulent 1% center stage, starting in the Big Apple. </i></p><p><b></b><br></p><p>Known for its audacity and ruthless vetting process, Millionaire Dating app Luxy is holding its first singles nights. To be held in New York, LA, London and Brazil, this exclusive event will be giving elite singles the most glamorous evening of 2016. But so what? Singles nights are happening all the time all over town. Thats true, but not like this.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Despite dates not being revealed yet, Luxy will be flying their extra special guests in on private helicopters. Although a fairly new Silicon Valley startup, Luxy has its own access to luxury choppers, giving their high flying users a VIP entrance to match their VIP membership.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>From the very beginning, Luxy has promised nothing but high quality - from user experience to user profiles - they dont just let anyone on the app, and Luxy does not intend to let its standards slip at the events either.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>At the party where being single doesn't guarantee you an invitation, just like the apps vetting process Luxy will only allow attractive people into their party and wont apologise for turning people away. And if the singles are not attractive, theyll need their tax return form to prove that they earn north of $200k.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>The party is not solely for Luxy users. So if youre not attractive and you cant prove that youre on $200k minimum, youre not getting in. There is no point, no one will speak to you, says Luxy spokesman, going by the name of Andrew M, Luxy doesnt want to waste their users time.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>So private jets and an only-attractive-and-wealthy-people-allowed-rule, Luxy has been known for more audacious things and are keen to maintain their exclusive status.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>But Luxys party is not the first singles event to be held for the successful. The League, deemed Tinder for the elites held numerous events earlier this year. Andrew M said, The League events were described as being a party for elite white people, where attendees talk about nothing but themselves and show nude pictures of girls to people they just met. This does not sound like very good party, Luxy will do better.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Unlike other dating apps, Luxy prizes itself purely on class, professional calibre and attractiveness. Andrew M said, Just because you went to an Ivy League University and made a few LinkedIn connections, it doesnt mean youre worth getting to know by default. Luxy just wants to know the person you are today, many of the best entrepreneurs dropped out of college. We ensure that we have people worth knowing. Thats why we can promise a fantastic party.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Luxy will soon be confirming party dates.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>For more information visit <a href="http://www.onluxy.com">www.onluxy.com</a>.</p><p><br></p><p><b>About Luxy Inc.:</b></p><p>Luxy® is rated the fastest-growing luxury online millionaires club in the matchmaker marketplace.&nbsp; Among numerous others the luxury dating site has been featured on CNN, ABC, CNBC, CBS, The Huffington Post, Business Insider and The New York Times. <p>David Disraeli, a 29 year veteran of financial and estate planning has developed a novel approach to help adult children of seniors and the older family members themselves plan for the inevitable. &nbsp;Aging is not optional, planning for it is. &nbsp;It is unfortunate that many seniors and their caregivers do not have a solid plan for a potential decline in health, finances and functionality. &nbsp;His book, and the accompanying videos outline the six step process every family must go through. &nbsp;Many of life's most important decisions are made in the waiting instead of the living room. &nbsp;This new road map creates a step by step plan to avoid unnecessary problems should a crises arise and even addresses potential conflicts among family members.&nbsp;</p><p>For more information you can purchase the book on Amazon.com or visit <a href="http://www.agingparents.net">www.agingparents.net</a></p>
<p></p><p>  </p>  <p>A crane truck is a vehicle designed using a machine to lift, lower or go filled stuff horizontally or vertically. This simple yet highly useful machine can perform jobs well beyond a person's standard capacity.</p>    <p>These vehicles are extremely practical to be used in a variety of sectors. In the transport sector, they're useful for loading and unloading of payloads. In the construction industry, the trucks are accustomed to lift, lower, or transfer construction materials.</p>    <p>There are several kinds of crane-kind vehicles now on the commercial marketplace: truck-mounted, knuckle boom, rough-terrain, and all terrain.</p>    <p>Truck mounted cranes</p>    <p>It is a kind of vehicle which is mounted using a hydraulically controlled crane or boom. This machine has a unique engine and is mounted on a rubber-wheeled chassis. It may use as a crane and yet can be readily transferred from one place to a different even when taking a load. The truck-mounted kinds are suitable as they are able to move over roads and highways; they additionally offer flexibility in freight and load-managing within an efficient manner.</p>  <p>&nbsp;</p>  <p>When working on work website in a fixed capacity, this vehicle has outriggers which are leg-sort legs that extend horizontally and vertically in the bottom of the truck. It will help prevent a tip-around when transferring a load from one place to another. Loads which are dangled in front with little or no motion are comparatively safe as the weight of the chassis as well as the boom functions as a counterweight to the load.</p>    <p>Knuckle boom/loader/joint cranes</p>    <p>The versatility and efficacy of the piece of gear has raised its popularity over the more conventional rigid-boom kinds. The knuckle boom truck has the ability to load and unload stuff in the car. It could fold down into a tiny size and yet expand to get a long distance, giving it the edge of a heightened payload, increased command and versatility, as well as a reduced profile. The joint of the knuckle boom causes it to be quite useful on narrower roads or smaller spaces.</p>  <p></p><p>Alina Jackson<br>Marketing Advertiser at E Promotional Code UK<br>Dillas Eve ring road New Castle<br>United Kingdom<br>Tel 0041663387323<br>contact@cranetraderonline.com<br><a href="http://www.cranetraderonline.com/2m2/all-cranes/carry-deck-industrial-cranes.html">http://www.cranetraderonline.com/2m2/all-cranes/carry-deck-industrial-cranes.html</a><br><br>  </p><br><br><br><br>
<p>La cultura china descubrió un montón de cosas, y una de ellas es Ganoderma Lucidum. Se reconoce como "El Rey de las Hierbas" y tiene más de cinco mil años de antigüedad. De hecho, este hongo fue tomado por los antiguos emperadores japoneses y chinos y era conocido como el elixir de la juventud. </p><p>Ellos mezclan los champiñones en el té y lo utilizan para tener una mejor vitalidad y una vida más larga.</p><h2>El poder del Ganoderma</h2><p>El propio hongo Ganoderma contiene triterpenos y polisacáridos que ayudan a estimular el sistema inmunológico del cuerpo. También son conocidos para curar toda una serie de enfermedades tales como la diabetes, alergias e incluso cáncer. </p><p>Es por estos poderes curativos increíbles que Ganoderma Lucidum se ha convertido en una opción muy popular en los últimos tiempos, tanto en la medicina oriental y la occidental. Para ver y conocer detalles técnicos del Ganoderma visita <b><a href="http://www.esganoderma.net/">www.esganoderma.net</a></b></p><h3>La comercialización de los productos</h3><p>Hay muchos tipos diferentes de Ganoderma en todo el mundo, pero hay dos empresas en particular, que venden la mejor calidad. Estas dos empresas se llaman Gano Excel y Organo Gold. Estas dos organizaciones de mercadeo en red utilizan métodos de venta directa para distribuir sus productos y ofrecen una gama similar. Ellos han optado por esta forma de distribución, ya que premia a los agentes para el trabajo que hacen, y puede ser una manera mucho más eficaz para hacer crecer un negocio en comparación con los medios tradicionales de publicidad.</p><p>Ambos tienen variedades de café y té que tienen Ganoderma en su interior.</p><h3>Tipos de setas</h3><p>Excel también tiene sus setas en cápsulas que los clientes pueden tomar fácilmente si quieren. Tienen una de las variedades más potentes en el mercado e incluso han patentado la receta. Ellos son a la vez se basan en el concepto de salud y riqueza.</p><p>¿Por qué no ponerse en forma y ganar más dinero al mismo tiempo? Ambos son empresas sólidas que ofrecen un nuevo y buen producto para el mercado. También han desarrollado muchos agentes en su negocio que son financieramente libres debido a la estructura de compensación y el modelo de su negocio.</p><p>                      </p><p>Pero, es importante saber que el éxito en esta industria, es todo acerca de la comercialización. Además, el uso de herramientas como la Web para aprovechar su tiempo y llegar a una audiencia global que te distinguirá. Todas las fortunas son hechas por personas que entienden que no es lo que pones, pero comercializar es lo que hace la diferencia.</p>
