<p><i>The U.S government contacted the young entrepreneur&nbsp;to share his story, after he thanked the infamous Westboro church for a raise in sales.&nbsp;</i></p><p><a href="http://www.queerty.com/westboros-plan-to-hurt-gay-business-backfires-sales-go-through-the-roof-20151222" target="_blank">Making quite a splash within the LGBT community last week</a>, Ryan Zamo the 26-year-old openly gay CEO of Z Skin Cosmetics, thanked Westboro Church after creating a social media frenzy over his company. </p><p>&nbsp;The anti-gay group found a picture of him kissing his fiancé near the grounds of the church, tagging church members in it, and causing the picture to become trending on social media. Zamo said we thanked them by sending them a package of our products, after all they did increase sales for us, its the least we could do. <a href="http://www.gaystarnews.com/article/westboro-baptist-church-inadvertently-helps-gay-ceos-online-business-by-sharing-this-adorable-photo/#gs._wDCJxg" target="_blank" title="Link: http://www.gaystarnews.com/article/westboro-baptist-church-inadvertently-helps-gay-ceos-online-business-by-sharing-this-adorable-photo/#gs._wDCJxg">After hitting news headlines within LGBT news sources</a>, the young CEO was contacted from a news talk show for the U.S Government to share his story.</p><p><a href="http://www.voicesinamericamedia.com" target="_blank">&nbsp;Hosted by movie star James Earl Jones, the show covers controversial topics in America</a>, the young entrepreneur said Im glad I am being given the opportunity to show people that retaliation isnt the answer, we didnt pay any attention to it, and in the long run it actually helped us out a lot. And actually, the producers told me that what I did was a prime example of what we can do in America to help merge different views, and it would be a great example for them to follow.</p><p>&nbsp;More About Z Skin Cosmetics:&nbsp;</p><p>Z Skin Cosmetics specializes in affordable, luxury, organic cosmetics products. Starting in a young entrepreneurs kitchen, the products were created for personal use, and have now become an internationally selling brand.</p><p>Z Skin Cosmetics incorporates multiple exotic remedies from cultures around the world, the young entrepreneur used his mothers experience as a plant biologist mixed wit his fathers knowledge from growing up in Budapest, Hungary to create one of the top selling organic cosmetics brands on the market. </p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>                                               </p><p>For more information, visit: <a href="http://www.ZskinCosmetics.com">www.ZskinCosmetics.com</a></p>

Aspirants can download their Hall Ticket from official site for the upcoming OSSC written exam. Odisha Staff Selection Commission is going to conduct written exam to select most qualified applicant for the post of Junior Clerk and Junior Assistant. Online application is completed and there was huge number of candidates has applied against these vacancies. <a href="http://helpbase.in/admit-card/ossc-junior-clerk-admit-card-2015-odisha-ssc-jr-asst-hall-ticket-at-www-ossc-gov-in" target="_blank" title="Link: http://helpbase.in/admit-card/ossc-junior-clerk-admit-card-2015-odisha-ssc-jr-asst-hall-ticket-at-www-ossc-gov-in">Download OSSC Junior Clerk Admit Card 2015</a></p><p><img src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/robin8-production/robin8-production/2fa8a6b6-c3d7-4f73-85ba-3f4c8ecd94ec/OSSCJuniorClerkandAssistantAdmitCardDownload.png" title="Image: http://s3.amazonaws.com/robin8-production/robin8-production/2fa8a6b6-c3d7-4f73-85ba-3f4c8ecd94ec/OSSCJuniorClerkandAssistantAdmitCardDownload.png"><br></p><p>The Odisha Staff Selection Commission has recently released a recruitment notification to fill up vacant posts of Junior Clerk &amp; Junior Assistant under Sub-ordinate offices and Heads of Departments. There are about 427 vacancies according to the notification. Many candidates have applied to these posts in online mode. The Orissa SSC Jr Assistant &amp; Jr Clerk Exam will be held on 27th December 2015. Now candidates will be in a hurry searching for OSSC Jr. Assistant &amp; OSSC Jr. Clerk Admit Card which is not declared yet. According to the official information the OSSC will going to appoint candidates for offered posts on the basis of Preliminary Exam, Main Exam followed by skill test &amp; Interview. Candidates will be called for the skill test on the basis of the marks obtained in written test.</p><p>Details information is available at : <a href="http://helpbase.in/admit-card/ossc-junior-clerk-admit-card-2015-odisha-ssc-jr-asst-hall-ticket-at-www-ossc-gov-in" title="Link: http://helpbase.in/admit-card/ossc-junior-clerk-admit-card-2015-odisha-ssc-jr-asst-hall-ticket-at-www-ossc-gov-in">http://helpbase.in/admit-card/ossc-junior-clerk-admit-card-2015-odisha-ssc-jr-asst-hall-ticket-at-ww...</a></p>

<p><i>Hitting headlines last week within the LGBT community, the 'Anti-Gay' church continues to stir the social media pot against the 26-year-old gay CEO of Z Skin Cosmetics, driving massive sales for his company and growing more frustrated with no reaction from him.&nbsp;</i></p><p>Last week the Westboro Church created a spike in sales for the young gay CEO of<a href="http://zskincosmetics.com" target="_blank" title="Link: http://zskincosmetics.com"> Z Skin Cosmetics</a> using social media. And though it seems like they're seeking some sort of reaction from the gay-owned organic cosmetics company, Ryan Zamo just continues to whole-heartedly thank them, acknowledging them for helping to pull in revenue for his organic cosmetics company.&nbsp;</p><p>The social media frenzy started after &nbsp;the church members found a picture of him<a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/6vZiP2F7x6/" target="_blank"> kissing his finance</a> across the street from the church grounds, by tagging other church members, sharing and commenting on the photo they inadvertently caused it to start &nbsp;trending. Thanking them with a basket of their organic skincare products, it seems Zamo really ruffled their feathers even more, causing the church to <a href="https://twitter.com/RyanZamoMusic/status/681605517215584256" target="_blank">post and tag him in a 'better' edited version of his own photo</a>. Then, as the photo circulated with likes, comments and shares, it was officially named the anti-gay churches 'photo of the week' creating even more attention for Z Skin Cosmetics.&nbsp;</p><p>The postings by the church once again swirled the cycle&nbsp;around, creating a whole new social media frenzy, as even Zamo himself shared their photos and tweets to him, he said, 'I think it's absolutely hilarious. I mean honestly, my fiancé and I are comfortable enough with ourselves that this kind of stuff doesn't bother us, but I mean&nbsp;they're right...were gay; SURPRISE! But the way we see it, &nbsp;if it's still going on, we may as well embarrass it! The basket we sent them was returned to us with a note, I decided not to open it, and threw it away instead."&nbsp;</p><p>Embracing the moment is exactly what the young entrepreneur did, after being named the 'anti-gay' organizations photo of the week, the CEO of Z Skin Cosmetics created a sale in honor of his award, the promo reads 'They don't hate me cause I'm gay, they hate me cause Im fabulous! Save 15% off with promocode THNXWB:) "&nbsp;</p><p>Though it seems that Westboro's black feather are ruffled over Z Skin Cosmetics, the young gay entrepreneur seems to have his feathers perfectly in tact, minding no attention to the social media whirlwind they've created around him, his fiancé and his organic cosmetics company.&nbsp;<br></p><p>For more information on Z Skin Cosmetics; visit: <a href="http://www.ZskinCosmetics.Com" title="Link: http://www.ZskinCosmetics.Com">www.ZskinCosmetics.Com</a></p><p>About Z Skin Cosmetics:</p><p>Z Skin Cosmetics speaclizes in affordable, luxury, organic skincare, hair care and mineral makeup. The vegan friendly, cruelty free brand&nbsp;was started n a young entrepreneurs kitchen to help with his own acne and hair loss&nbsp;problems. Using knowledge from his mothers long respected career as a plant biologist and horticulturist, and his fathers childhood in Budapest, Hungary, the 25-year-old began creating his own products using exotic ingredients. Within months, the products had become an international sensation, and have since been named the # choice by&nbsp;multiple world leading&nbsp;magazines, on television and news shows, and was named' 'A True Inspiration' at the 2015 American Music Awards.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Contact:</p><p>Ryan Zamo</p><p>Ryan@zskincosmetics.com</p>

He traveled to Taiwan, Japan, Korea and other places, spent 16 months full-time dating with Asia's young ladies. Obviously?he didnt step into China. Why Chinese ladies suffered such unfair treatment? There seems to be a thick barrier between Chinese and foreigners. Besides the great wall and Chinese kungfu, they nearly know nothing about Chinese cultures and customs. As China is far across the Pacific, they mostly know by hearsay.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><b>So whats their favorite pastime?</b></p><p>&nbsp;  So whats Chinese students favorite pastime? No longer be a closed country, China has been rising on the world stage, and Chinese students now have wider view. Through some of Chinese social applications we can find, like United States, current Chinese students love to express themselves and be curios to foreign world. They present their life and mood by social applications. Above all, Coverly is a new star among applications focus on young people.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;  Coverly is an selfy-share application which focus on cover ones face to make fiends. All photos in the application have to use stickers before upload. Be deferent with image community like Instagram, Coverly do not directly display the picture, but attract users by "block face", then reuse "see" to get users interactions. From the "block face" to "see" , a unique way of interaction, there is no doubt that created a new world of the social game. Some users who are not enough confident or care much about privacy will choose to share in Coverly than other public media.&nbsp; <b></b></p><p><img width="152" alt="CUsershanlanDesktop5bafa40f4bfbfbed91fbb0837ef0f736aec31fafjpg5bafa40f4bfbfbed91fbb0837ef0f736aec31faf" src="file://localhost/Users/Elsamushroomgirl/Library/Caches/TemporaryItems/msoclip/0clip_image002.png" height="269"><img width="154" alt="CUsershanlanDesktop152490684038313457jpg152490684038313457" src="file://localhost/Users/Elsamushroomgirl/Library/Caches/TemporaryItems/msoclip/0clip_image004.png" height="272"></p><p><b>Try to communicate in a different way</b></p><p>&nbsp;  Because native psychology and the language barrier, the Chinese students abroad is still through the teaching material to better understand American culture, no mention the Chinese students separated by a Pacific. americans want to communicate with Chinese students face to face, and even into the circle of the Chinese people is almost impossible. But now seems to be more easy to communicate through social application.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;  In coverly, when the user interested in a picture, use fingers to touch the picture, the sticker will disappear, the user will be able to see the original picture, fingers left then the picture will be added to the stickers. The original picture may be a handsome boy or a lovely girl,even a wry face. Here, a like, a comment can easily allow users to find a sense of identity and sense of belonging. By covering the mechanism of interaction, want to communicate with a beautiful Chinese sister, is not a difficult task, is concerned about the threshold is much lower than the Instagram. There are some foreign students because in obstructs released fresh and interesting pictures, by many Chinese users praise, and even attracted a group of Chinese fans to follow, then become the stars of the community.</p><p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; <img width="148" alt="CUsershanlanDesktop792319504240226293jpg792319504240226293" src="file://localhost/Users/Elsamushroomgirl/Library/Caches/TemporaryItems/msoclip/0clip_image006.png" height="261">&nbsp;<img width="148" alt="CUsershanlanDesktop756464568504226149jpg756464568504226149" src="file://localhost/Users/Elsamushroomgirl/Library/Caches/TemporaryItems/msoclip/0clip_image008.png" height="261" title="Image: file://localhost/Users/Elsamushroomgirl/Library/Caches/TemporaryItems/msoclip/0clip_image008.png"></p><p><b>Say goodbye to depressing social relations </b></p><p>&nbsp;  The founder of United social media Twitter already had a similar product - weibo in China, relying on excellent commercial operation platform take a place on the global social market-weixin , also can't get away from the shadow of Instagram and WhatsApp . <p></p><p><i>  </i></p><p><i>The Cutting Creasing Rule is a device which helps to cut various objects in specific sizes as per the diverse requirements of the industry. Manufacturing of such rules has got an impetus with the growing technology to meet the supply of well finished products in global markets. </i></p><i>  </i><p><i>These high end products can be anything from foam, air filled bags, corrugated boxes, cartons, bubble wraps, thick sheets and many more used in the packaging industry. Having products cut in specific shape and sizes enables the quick and better way of packaging products for easy dispatch. This also helps to keep the stuffs organized in the warehouse, because uneven shape cartons and boxes cant be placed properly at a place. </i></p><i>  </i><p><i>Now, here are few components of <a target="_blank" href="http://www.printman.co.in/cutting-creasing-rule.html">cutting creasing rule</a> which helps in enhancing the performance of any industry.</i></p><i>  </i><p><i>&nbsp;</i><b><i>Center Bevel</i></b><i>  </i></p><p><b><i>&nbsp;</i></b><i>Its the kind of cutting edge geometry which is facilitated for giving desired creasing and cutting as perfect outcome for end use in the packaging industry. Bevel center means, the cutting edge is exactly in the middle of the rules thickness. </i><i>  </i></p><p><b><i>Side Bevel</i></b><i>  </i></p><p><i>Its available in 52o and 42o both</i><i>  </i></p><p><b><i>Center Bevel Long Edge</i></b><i>  </i></p><p><i>This is available both in 42o and 52o as top level bevel cutting angle. Its one of its kind bevel which is useful to cut material like cloth, leather, foam and few more. </i><i>  </i></p><p><b><i>Through Hardened Rules</i></b><i>  </i></p><p><i>When the hardened rules with an edge it has some hardness on the body. </i><i>  </i></p><p><b><i>Edge Hardened Rules</i></b></p><i>  </i><p><i>When the tip of a rule has hardened then best possible body with the rule is tender and soft to achieve dexterity and bend-ability for better mechanisms and suitable rules of length. </i><i>  </i></p><p><i><br><br><a target="_blank" href="http://www.printman.co.in/cutting-creasing-rule.html">Cutting Creasing Rule</a>  are manufactured to meet the international standard industry requirements for attaining efficiency and performance in any work undertaken. </i></p><i>  </i><p></p><br><br><br>
<p><i><b>The Star Wars inspired students have created a remarkable new skincare line using post-production principles they learned during film school at USC.</b></i><b>&nbsp;</b></p><p><b><i>Hollywood, CA- December 29, 2015</i>- &nbsp;</b>The social desire for beauty and perfection is at an all time high, being proven as millionsof-viewers tuned in around the world to watch the crowning of &nbsp;the next Miss Universe. With so many beauty and makeup lines on the market today, it is hard to stand out of the crowd, but a group of Star Wars loving film students have done just that.<br></p><p>Recently graduating from USCs film program, partially named after the&nbsp;<i>Star Wars</i>&nbsp;creator George Lucas, the group of students recently launched a remarkable new line of organic skincare. The creators of the new line&nbsp;<a href="http://www.zzmineralmakeup.com/" target="_blank"></a><b><a href="http://www.zzmineralmakeup.com/" target="_blank">Banish</a></b><a href="http://www.zzmineralmakeup.com/" target="_blank">&nbsp;by&nbsp;</a><i><b><a href="http://www.zzmineralmakeup.com/" target="_blank">Zz Mineral</a></b></i>, used classic principles from post-production editing of film and photography, they said <i>Star Wars&nbsp;</i>was a pioneer in perfecting the art of color correcting. Its a process that uses certain parts of the color-wheel to balance out and even out noticeably incorrect colors on the film. We applied the same principles, figuring out how to color correct peoples skin-tone, while helping treat their skin problems fast and effectively.</p><p><b>Banish&nbsp;</b>by&nbsp;<i><a href="http://www.zskincosmetics.com" target="_blank" title="Link: http://www.zskincosmetics.com">Zz Mineral&nbsp;</a></i>is a highly innovative line of organic skincare products, helping to instantly heal and restore skin discoloration from breakouts, bruises, dark eye circles, age spots and other skin problems. The products use the same technique discovered by&nbsp;<i>Star Wars</i>&nbsp;editors to correct skin-tone instantly, helping to replace the use of makeup, by counter-balancing the colors around the targeted area.</p><p>For More Information, visit:&nbsp;<a href="http://www.zskincosmetics.com" target="_blank">www.ZskinCosmetics.Com</a></p>
<p>Singapore, 28 December 2015 - Juyyo, a singapore startup focusing on building a discovery marketplace for promotions and coupons, has finally launched publicly in Singapore &amp; Philippines. </p><p>Since the beta launch on August 2015 in Singapore, Juyyo has curated more 3,000 promotions from 1,000+ online and brick-to-mortar retailers in Singapore. Retailers include leading shops in food, fashion, travel, entertainment, electronics and other niches.<br></p><p>With its upgraded promotions and couponing marketplace platform, Juyyo is venturing into the promotions and couponing market in both the Singapore and Philippines market. Users can benefit from the platform by discovering great deals and online coupons available in their respective countries. For example, users can use an online coupon code discovered in Juyyo for greater savings or find out which local retailer is having a warehouse sale for furniture. Users are able to use the platform to gain great shopping insights on different on-going promotions from different retailers. These shopping insights enables users to make smarter shopping decisions to save more money. Through its mobile coupon campaigns, Juyyo also offer exclusive promotions in partnership with several retailers. By flashing the mobile coupon in the retail shops, users can be entitled an exclusive discount or freebie.<br></p><p>Juyyos vision is Everyday, people uses Juyyo to discover new promotions, make smart shopping decisions and stay connected with retailers/brands. With the promising market potential and the growth of eCommerce in South East Asia, Juyyo expects its brand presence and user engagement to increase exponentially in the next few years.<br></p><p>Cofounders of Juyyo: Retailers are always looking to reach out and connect with more shoppers. Shoppers, on the other hand, are always looking for the best deal. In Juyyo, our team is committed to build the platform to bridge the gap between retailers and shoppers. Our focus is to help people discover promotions to make smarter shopping decisions. <a href="http://www.juyyo.com" target="_blank">Juyyo</a> is a shopping insights tool for every shopper.<br></p><p>Start becoming a smarter shopper by discovering promotions, coupons, discounts &amp; deals in Juyyo today! <p><i>Goodway Group Discusses the Future of Digital Marketing</i></p><p>PHILADELPHIA, PA  (Dec. 29, 2015) ¬ The 2015 digital marketing industry was dominated by native advertising, an increase in programmatic ad spending, hyper-segmentation and viewability. But as 2015 comes to a close, marketers are beginning to observe what digital marketing trends are going to arise in 2016.</p><p>Jay Friedman, chief operating officer of the programmatic ad tech firm Goodway Group, offers his predictions on what 2016 digital marketing trends are going to take hold and impact the industry:</p><p>	People-based Marketing  2016 will be the first year people-based marketing (rather than device-based or cookie-based for behaviors) really takes off. Facebook will launch their DSP and be the only player truly offering this option. This is a major game changer as advertisers will have a whole new understanding of the subject matter their audience will respond to in advertisements.</p><p>	Ad Blocking Leveling Out  Smart publishers will take control and start earning a fair price for their inventory. Theyll disallow ad blocking, and some will start to make 100 percent of their ad slots 100 percent viewable with infinite scroll ads. Publishers and consumers will be forced to find a happy medium between excessive ads and ad blockers, so both parties benefit in the end.</p><p>	Programmatic Specific Agencies  At least five major brands will select programmatic-specific agencies apart from their existing formal agency relationships in order to capitalize on advertisements. Conversely, many large regional or smaller national brands will still not be using their first-party data as of the first of the year.</p><p>	ROI  Market leaders will enable clear offline ROI tracking from online spend. This will allow them to analyze their process and content in order to make their digital campaigns even more effective while getting the best bang for their buck.</p><p>	ROI dislodges clutter metrics Those who are hyper-focused on viewability, fraud, ad blocking and all the other clutter will realize, it is all important, but its less important than measuring actual sales impact. While its important to pay attention to those clutter metrics, they should guide, not direct, as ROI is the ultimate stop.</p><p>For the first time, digital ad spending will surpass traditional television ad spending in the U.S. in 2016, indicating the ever-growing power of the digital marketing industry. Consequently, marketers are already preparing for next year to ensure advertising plans are effective and achieve top-notch results. &nbsp;</p><p>###</p><p><b>About Goodway Group</b></p><p>Goodway Group is a leading managed-services programmatic partner to local, regional and Fortune 500 brand agencies. Bootstrapped and 100 percent privately owned since 1929, Goodway moved into the programmatic digital media space in 2006 to continue its rich history of tackling complex local and regional campaign executions with data science-driven targeting and support services to make achieving success easy for agency clients. Its proprietary algorithms pair with a technology-agnostic approach to enable agencies and marketers to achieve their ultimate goal  better results while remaining lean and nimble.</p><p><b>Media Contact:</b></p><p>Jo Trizila</p><p>TrizCom PR</p><p>Office: 972-247-1369</p><p>jo@trizcom.com</p><div><br></div>
WASHINGTON, Dec. 29, 2015&nbsp; Members of the Advanced Television Systems Committee Inc. (ATSC) have elected five industry executives to serve on the ATSC Board of Directors for three-year terms beginning January 2016.<br><br>New to the board are Christopher Homer, Vice President, Operations &amp; Engineering, PBS, and Anne Schelle, Executive Director, Pearl TV. They will join re-elected board members Brett Jenkins, Media General; Richard Friedel, Fox Networks; and current board chairman Glenn Reitmeier, NBC Universal.<br><br>Other current directors whose terms continue in 2016 are: Lynn Claudy, National Association of Broadcasters; Mark Eyer, Sony Electronics; John Godfrey, Samsung Electronics; Brian Markwalter, Consumer Technology Association; Andy Scott, National Cable and Telecommunications Association; Dave Siegler, Cox Media Group; Peter Symes, Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers; John Taylor, LG Electronics USA; and Craig Todd, Dolby Laboratories. Representing the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers, Wayne Luplow, Zenith, succeeds Dr. Yiyan Wu, Communications Research Center Canada.<br><br>The Board will elect its chairman at its first meeting of the new year. The ATSC thanks board members whose terms expire at the end of 2015: Ira Goldstone, formerly of Univision, and Sam Matheny, formerly of Capitol Broadcasting.<br><br>Homer is responsible for the management of the PBS Network Operations Center, Media Operations Center, PBS Satellite Operations Center, and Engineering &amp; Maintenance. These facilities support distribution operations for the public television interconnection system, which serves more than 350 independently owned and operated public television stations across the country.<br><br>Schelle has been Executive Director of Pearl TV since June 2014. She represents Pearl TV on Sprockit, the startup program of National Association of Broadcasters. She served previously as senior advisor to the NAB and as Executive Director of the Open Mobile Video Coalition, where she led outreach efforts by broadcasters to introduce Mobile TV services. Pearl is a partnership of broadcast companies 170 member TV stations that reach two-thirds of the U.S. population.<br><br>The Advanced Television Systems Committee is defining the future of television with the ATSC 3.0 next-generation broadcast standard.&nbsp; &nbsp;ATSC is an international, non-profit organization developing voluntary standards for digital television. The ATSCs&nbsp;150-plus&nbsp;member organizations represent the broadcast, broadcast equipment, motion picture, consumer electronics, computer, cable, satellite, and semiconductor industries.&nbsp;For more information visit&nbsp;<a href="http://www.atsc.org">www.atsc.org</a>.
<p>Uparcel, the Singapore on-demand delivery network, has announced its official launch. uParcel deploys on-demand mobile technology using Global Positioning System (GPS) to boost efficiency in city logistics. Customers uses theuParcel mobile app to manage the entire delivery process. Special features of the mobile appare electronic signatures, GPS tracking and delivery status, direct contact with delivery agent and insurance protection for all deliveries.</p><p>Within 2 months of soft launch, 700 signed up to be uparcel delivery agents and uParcel has delivered hundreds of parcels.</p><p>I like uParcel a lot! Very convenient to request for delivery says Sally Park, online seller.</p><p>Opportunities abound</p><p>E-commerce is the primary driving force for courier deliveries. In the past, the only way to shop is to go to a retail shop. However, now items get delivered to customers. As more business go online, there will be more parcels to deliver. There is plenty of room for e-commerce market to grow.</p><p>In European countries such as Switerland, Austria and France, an average houshold receives about 13 parcels a year. Singaporean households, on the other hand, receive only about 3 parcels a year on average.</p><p>The tentent mix in malls is changing. It used to be majority retail but now it is majority services such as F&amp;B, saloons and even tuition centers. We want to be there to deliver as retailers shift online says William Ng, Uparcel Strategy Director.</p><p>Point to Point Delivery system</p><p>Straight to the point is what uParcel is about. Logistics has traditionally been defined by hub and spoke design. This requires centralized sorting and unnecessary detours for deliveries to reach their destinations. uParcel is built on a point-to-point logistical system that allows parcels to make their way directly to their destinations while picking up other deliveries along the way. Less resources and time are wasted through the point-to-point design.</p><p>There are many small online sellers doing business through Qoo10, Lazada, eBay or evenblogshops. They dont have huge volumes to use logistics companies or to justify their own in house deliveries. We want to be there to help the small retailers compete. &nbsp;says MabelineXie, Uparcel Business Development Director. </p><p>About</p><p>uParcel deploys crowdsourcing and on-demand mobile technology to boost efficiency in city logistics. uParcel is built on a point-to-point logistical system that allows parcels to make their way directly to their destinations while carefully vetted independent delivery agents pick up other deliveries along the way. Less resources and time are wasted through the point-to-point design. The next greener, more efficient delivery service is here. <a href="http://www.uparcel.sg/" title="Link: http://www.uparcel.sg/">www.uparcel.sg</a></p><p><br></p>
<div><div><i><b></b></i>EAST SETAUKET, N.Y., Dec. 30, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Lixte Biotechnology Holdings, Inc. (<a href="http://finance.yahoo.com/q?s=lixt">LIXT</a>) announced today that it has granted an exclusive license of its lead anti-cancer compound, LB-100, for treatment of hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) in Asia to Taipei Medical University (TMU). LB-100 is not currently approved for treatment of HCC. Under the license, Taipei Medical University will determine the effectiveness of LB-100 against HCC in clinical trials conducted in compliance with both Taiwanese and American regulatory requirements. TMU will pay milestone and royalty payments to Lixte. Both parties recognize that development of improved therapy for HCC has been very challenging and that success cannot be guaranteed.</div><div><div><div></div></div></div><div>John S. Kovach M.D., founder and president of Lixte, said "LB-100 is a novel small molecule that in preclinical studies has activity against a number of different cancer types alone and, most prominently, in combination with cytotoxic drugs, including some known to be active against hepatocellular carcinoma. We welcome an opportunity to work with an outstanding group of investigators in Taiwan to assess the value of LB-100 against this all-too-common and devastating cancer."</div><div>HCC is the fifth most common cancer and third most common cause of cancer deaths worldwide, with the majority of those deaths in Asia. The World Cancer Research Fund International reported that 782,000 new cases were diagnosed in 2012 worldwide. There are approximately 35,000 new cases and 24,000 deaths from HCC annually in the US according to the National Cancer Institute.</div><div>Taipei Medical University has nine colleges, thirteen undergraduate schools, fifteen graduate institutes, as well as three affiliated hospitals with approximately three thousand beds. TMU is one of the largest health care systems in Taipei, providing teaching, research and clinical services. In 2012 they established the Taipei Cancer Center, the first world-class cancer center in Taiwan, combining cancer research, training and clinical treatment, dedicated to providing the full spectrum of services for adult and pediatric oncology.</div><div>About Lixte Biotechnology Holdings, Inc.</div><div>Lixte is a drug discovery company that uses biomarker technology to identify enzyme targets associated with serious common diseases and then design novel compounds to attack those targets. Lixte's product pipeline encompasses two major categories of compounds at various stages of pre-clinical and clinical development that the Company believes have broad therapeutic potential not only for cancer but also for other debilitating and life-threatening diseases. Lixte's unique phosphatase inhibitor, LB-100, is in a Phase I clinical trial at two NCI designated Comprehensive Cancer Centers and three US Oncology Research sites (see ClinicalTrials.gov: Identifier NCTO1837667).</div></div><div><div></div><div><br></div></div><div><div><div><div><div><div><div><div><div><div><div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div>Forward-Looking Statements</div><div>This announcement contains certain forward-looking statements within the meaning of Section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933, and Section 21E of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934. For example, statements regarding the Company's financial position, business strategy and other plans and objectives for future operations, and assumptions and predictions about future product demand, supply, manufacturing, costs, marketing and pricing factors are all forward-looking statements. These statements are generally accompanied by words such as "intend," anticipate," "believe," "estimate," "potential(ly)," "continue," "forecast," "predict," "plan," "may," "will," "could," "would," "should," "expect" or the negative of such terms or other comparable terminology. The razors are used to remove the unwanted hairs on the  body. Razors are being used by the man since the old ages. The oldest  razor shaped object was created in 18000 B.C. There are many types of  razors now that are available in the market. These types include  straight razors, electric razors, and disposable razors. The straight  razors are long and have a straight body, they are used in manual  shaving methods. Disposable razors are used for shaving instantly. These  razors have a case in the upper part. While shaving you may put a new  razor in the case and after shave you might dispose of the razor.<br><br>Advantages of using Electric Razors <br><br>The  most common type of razors available nowadays in the market is the  electric razor. The electric razors are very useful in saving your time  and making the best type of facial shaves for the men. There are many  advantages of using the electric razors over the manual or disposable  razors. <br><br>Fast shave<br><br>The electric razors  perform a faster shave and save your precious time. You dont have to  roll over the same place for making a perfect shave. The electric razors  remove the hairs easily, because they roll up the skin and force the  hairs upwards so that they are removed easily. The shaving techniques  will help you getting rid of the extra hairs within no time. <br><br>Heavier in Weight<br><br>As  compared to the manual razors the electric shavers are a bit heavier.  Due to the batteries installed in the electric razors it. But at the  same time these are portable. They ca be easily used when you are going  to a picnic. You may take it while you are on a long journey. And can be  used anywhere where there is an electrical source. <br><br>No Grooming Items <br><br>While  shaving the grooming items include shaving cream, gels, soaps, water  and other related items. The electric razors dont use any of these  materials. You can use the electric razors where ever you want without  requiring any water, gel or soap. <br><br>Accurate Shave <br><br>The  electric razors give an accurate shape to your beard. <p>Johannesburg, South Africa, 31 October 2015: Nomad Africa magazine project implores African governments to learn from South Africas recent visa regulation blunder. Avoidance of similar crises in future will certainly boost the continents travel and tourism industries.<br><br>In the previous year the South African government had made changes to the visa regulations that required parents to produce un-abridged birth certificates for their accompanying children. The government had not carefully considered the impact the changes would have on the nearly one tenth of the countrys GDP.<br><br>The move was seen by the South African (as well as African) travel and tourism industry players as a huge mistake. International tourists visiting South Africa, usually connected with other regional destinations as well.<br><br>Tourist numbers to South Africa (and some other countries in the region) had been seriously reduced, because travellers with children encountered severe administrative challenges. Many travel and tourism industry businesses were affected, losing millions in revenue and many industry jobs were threatened.<br><br>On Thursday 22nOctober 2015 the travel requirements were reviewed, making it possible for children to travel without birth certificates when they are from outside the South Africa<br><br>From the onset, it was surprising that our government could put the economic survival of 7,700,000 South African citizens (those whose livelihood depends on the tourism industry) at risk, when the new visa regulations were made into law, said Frederick Erasmus, Feature Editor of Nomad Africa magazine.<br><br>The results were very unfortunate as a previously growing industry was squashed by nearly 25%, year on year in one year, the past year, as a direct result of the injudicious travel regulations.<br><br>Associate Editor, Dieter Gottert comments, A country, specifically in Africa, should closely re-examine tourism policies if it adversely affects the financial income in terms of inhibiting overseas tourists from entering a country.<br><br>The goal is to generate wealth and maximize a countrys potential growth on the African continent, not stifle it and fix things when the damage has already been done. Foresight and prevention are better than curing ill-conceived political decisions, continues Gottert.<br><br>It was a pity the South African government omitted one very important step, and reports say that Southern Africa Tourism Services Association (Satsa) CEO David Frost, requested to know why the South African governments Inter Ministerial Committee made the decision without industry participation.<br><br>Nomad Africa Magazine project welcomed the review of the regulations, supporting the tourism industry hopes that the review will help to recover some of the cancelled trips by thousands of would-be visitors to South Africa.<br><br>Nomad Africa magazine project offers Africa a new impact voice globally, and our approach to African news coverage brings with it much needed perception management.<br><br>Our mission is to tell positively, the stories of Africa, which previously were usually negatively reported by the international media. Nomad Africa Magazine project has taken the responsibility to retell these stories with pride, and from an African perspective.<br><br>The prototype magazine of Nomad Africa magazine project first hit the shelves in July 2012 and was very positively received in Africa and internationally. Digital copies of various editions of the magazine can be viewed on the website <a href="http://www.nomadafricamag.com" title="Link: http://www.nomadafricamag.com">www.nomadafricamag.com</a> .<br><br>Nomad Africa magazine in print distributes absolutely free as a souvenir at major tourist entry points in cities across the African continent with more than 65,000 subscribers around the globe. The publication constantly celebrates life on the African continent, promoting its vibrant pulse. It is published by the Johannesburg based 2414 Media Group.<br><br></p>
<p>Las Vegas, NV - January 4, 2016  Mushkin Enhanced MFG&nbsp; An industry-leading designer and manufacturer of high-performance and mission-critical computer products, today unveiled its new ICON CompactFlash (CF) 1066x memory card. The ICON CompactFlash 1066x supports up to UDMA mode 7 and offers data transfer speeds up to 160MB/s. </p><p>The new ICON CF memory cards are designed for professionals and are backed by a 2- Year limited warranty. The cards are durability tested, will operate in temperatures from 0-70°C, and are rated for a storage temperature range of -20-85°C. If paired with UDMA7-enabled cameras and readers, the 1066x speed allows for faster data transfers than the previous generations of cards.</p><p>"Mushkin has providing great value with storage solutions that enable users to not only take their devices to the next level of performance, but do it at an affordable price.&nbsp; The ICON CF Series is no different. &nbsp;We have designed our new ICON CompactFlash cards with professional photographers and videographers in mind," said Brian Flood, Director of Product Development at Mushkin Inc. &nbsp;"Cinema-quality video capture demands tremendous performance and capacity, which is exactly what we have delivered with the new ICON CompactFlash cards."</p><p>The Mushkin ICON CompactFlash will be available early Q1 2016 at leading retailers and e-tailers worldwide. </p><p>        </p><p>For more information about Mushkin products, visit <a href="http://www.poweredbymushkin.com">www.poweredbymushkin.com</a>&nbsp;</p>

One study has shown dyslexics improved their reading comprehension following sessions of games heavy on action. The reason, researchers believe, is that the games have constantly changed environments that require intense focus.</p><p>Dont sit too close to the television used to be a common parental refrain without a lot of science to back it up. Instead, scientists are discovering games in moderation may actually improvenot strainyour vision. In one study, 10 weeks of play were  associated with a greater ability to discern between different shades of grey. Another had participants try to play games using only their lazy eye, with the good one obscured. Those players showed significant, sometimes normalized improvement in the affected eye. </p><p>Because certain genres of games reward and encourage leadership traitsproviding for communities, securing their safety, etc...researchers have noted that players can display a correlating motivation in their real-world career goals. Improvising in a game can also translate into being faster on your feet when an office crisis crops up.</p><p><b>About Neon 2 Cars Racing Saga:</b></p><p>Welcome to the world of neon cars racing games! <p>                                                </p><div>             <p>&nbsp;As a physician, you can easily blunt the effects of a few bad reviews by proactively building a positive internet reputation for your practice. Although the Internet is held accountable for creating some serious obstacles to doctor-patient relationships, it has also given rise to amazing medical resources for patients and physicians. Your online reputation is regarded as one of these potential obstacles caused by the internet. Today, everyone has to be concerned about their online reputation unlike in the past where managing ones reputation in the internet was considered the concern of politicians, celebrities and other famous people. The main reason behind this is simply because nowadays, about 40 percent of internet searches are those of individual names. This is the case whereby patients want to know more about their physicians.             </p>             <p> How a patient selects a doctor depends on various factors including referrals from other physicians, recommendations from friends, and even word of mouth. Therefore, when it comes to doctor selection, you will find that the online reviews and social media play an increasingly important role. According to one study, it was found out that when choosing a doctor, 60 percent of patients consider <b>CAHPS Surveys</b> very important while 40 percent rely on Social media for physician rating. At least to potential new patients, a poor online reputation can damage the doctors training and education hence portraying a bad picture. As a matter of fact, while using the same one-to-five-star system, websites that were originally designed to rank restaurants or hotels are now being used to review medical professionals. Just the way a poor rating can deter a consumer from trying a new hotel or restaurant is the same way it might keep a prospective patient from selecting a physician, with similar financial results.             </p>             <p> On the other hand, a physicians practice can also be negatively affected by the absence of online ratings and reviews. A 2015 study on &nbsp;<b>medical online reputation management </b>showed that 70 percent of the patients who could find some positive reviews about their doctors online trusted them more as compared to doctors who lacked online reviews at all. Therefore, this means that when a physician has some information about them online, then they are more likely to be selected by the patients who viewed their profile. As a doctor, you have to make the well-being of your patients a priority because you devoted many years of training and education for your career.             </p>             <p> It can be damaging both professionally and personally to doctors when a patient writes them a negative online review. However, it is highly advisable that you take negative online reviews with care and do not panic hence you should avoid taking them personally. From time to time, many physicians have come to realize many ways in which they can handle or deal with their negative online reviews from various types of patients. You should also learn to monitor your online reviews since it is the critical step when it comes to managing your online reputation. All in all, never panic because the results could turn out to be surprising and often times it includes a combination of positive feedback, misinformation, and even negative reviews. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; </p><p>For More Information Please Visit : <a href="https://ormsurvey.com">https://ormsurvey.com</a></p>          </div>

As I was growing up, he would teach me what plants would help with certain conditions, of course at that age I really wasnt that interested.</p><p><a href="http://www.z-skin-cosmetics.com/z-hair-care" target="_blank">The miracle hair mask</a>&nbsp;helps restore life to dead hair and reverse hair loss by stimulating the scalp and promoting new hair growth. <div>Legacy Central to Receive $100 Million Renovation</div><p>&nbsp;PLANO, TEXAS - (Jan. 5, 2016) - Regent Properties (Regent), a Los Angeles-based real estate investment and development firm with more than $1 billion under management, has announced the transformation of Legacy Centralthe office and mixed-use campus located at Legacy Drive and Central Expressway in Plano, Texasinto a modern, collaborative and highly amenitized corporate destination. Regent acquired the property Dec. 17, 2015.</p><p>&nbsp;The campus renovation will accommodate office tenants ranging from 25,000 to 1,000,000 square-feet in four existing buildings on 84 acres. Those buildings will be retrofitted while prime, undeveloped land will be readied for complementary uses, such as restaurants, a hotel, and retail, as well as additional mid-rise office buildings in the future. The site is entitled for up to 3.7 million square-feet, allowing large office tenants unique expansion opportunities via additional office buildings on a build-to-suit basis. A ground breaking is planned for the second quarter of 2016.</p><p>The property was acquired from Texas Instruments (TI), which had owned the site since the 1980s and built the four office buildings and fitness center for its own use. TI will lease back two of the buildings through 2016, finalizing a phase-out from the campus.</p><p>Legacy Central is a dynamic, technology-oriented office and mixed-use project offering a prime strategic location; unparalleled, on-site amenity base; and forward-thinking design in a campus environment centered on engaging and intimate outdoor spaces, said Eric Fleiss, President of Regent Properties. Regent will be investing more than $100 million to transform the site into a cutting-edge, first-class, creative office campus. Common area improvements will include landscaping, hardscaping, roadwork, common area amenities, building facades, building lobbies, and signage.</p><p>&nbsp;Included in the renovations will be:</p><p></p><ul><li>A variety of indoor and outdoor conference rooms<br></li><li>150-seat auditorium<br></li><li>30,000-square-foot fitness center; yoga rooms; lap swimming pool; sand volleyball court; tennis court; rock climbing wall; and full-sized, indoor basketball court<br></li><li>1-mile jogging/biking trail<br></li><li>Coffee kiosks<br></li><li>Campus-wide Wi-Fi<br></li><li>4-acre park<br></li><li>Abundant structured and surface parking of up to 5.5 per thousand rentable square-feet<br></li></ul><p></p><p>&nbsp;Common area work will be done in two phases: Phase 1 in 2016 and Phase 2 in 2017 after TI vacates.</p><p>TI intentionally designed the campus to be oriented toward a side street, away from U.S. Route 75. Regent Properties is reorienting the project toward Central Expressway and utilizing the vacant land along the highway for various complementary uses, such as a hotel, restaurants and retail. &nbsp;</p><p>Fleiss explained, The existing infrastructure (including oversized fitness center, large floorplates, and up to 14-foot clear heights) is unique in the Dallas market, very impressive, and very relevant to tenant demands in todays marketplaceand that is before a $100 million investment in updated architecture and lush landscape and hardscape improvements. We will provide a cutting-edge campus environment that is centered upon engaging outdoor spaces for meeting, working, collaborating, dining and relaxing. Further, the size of the site allows for additional amenities, and the highway frontage allows for strong access, visibility and a corporate presence along Central Expressway.</p><p>Plano has become THE corporate campus destination in North Texas. Plano is always at the top of the list for large employers looking for space in the Dallas area, and our project will deliver a forward-thinking campus experience which will facilitate their ability to attract and retain talent.</p><p>Planosupported by strong demographics, a desirable and educated labor force, and a high-quality school districtis the ideal place to live, work and play, and large corporations globally are recognizing these benefits. Regent Properties is already in discussions with several large companies, many of which are moving in from out-of-state and/or expanding local DFW presences.</p><p>Mayor Harry LaRosiliere of the City of Plano said, The city is very excited that Regent Properties is moving forward with its transformation of the Texas Instruments Spring Creek campus into Legacy Central. This project is another great example of the ongoing economic development momentum across Plano. Its yet another indication that Plano is the place where people want to live, work and play.</p><p>Regent is not new to DFW, having invested in the region for more than 20 years. It developed the 1,000-acre master planned community known as Post Oaks in Frisco, Texas. More recently, in 2012, Regent acquired, renovated and successfully repositioned the eight-story Bent Tree Tower II in Addison, Texas, which was nearly vacant when acquired, and in 2014, purchased another eight-story office tower, One Panorama Center, in Las Colinas, Texas.</p><p><b>About Regent Properties</b></p><p>Headquartered in Los Angeles, Regent Properties was established in 1989. Over the past 25 successful years, principals Jeff Dinkin, Doug Brown and Eric Fleiss have transformed Regent from the real estate arm of the Kohl family office into a multifaceted, real estate investment and management platform. Regent and its principals have acquired, developed, financed and/or managed over $3 billion in real estate transactions nationally, encompassing more than 21 million square-feet of retail, commercial, residential and mixed-use projects, and 13,000 acres of master planned communities, representing 31,000 lots. Regents assets under management, as of Sept. 30, 2015, total greater than $1 billion.</p><p>For leasing information contact: Duane Henley, 214.446.4506, duane.henley@transwestern.com or Nathan Durham, 972.774.2503, Nathan.durham@transwestern.com. For more information about Regent Properties, please visit RegentProperties.com.</p><p># # #</p><p><b>Media contact:</b></p><p>Martin Stein  &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;  </p><p>TrizCom Inc./Pitch PR</p><p>972.247.1369</p><p>martin@pitchpr.co</p>
<p><b>For Immediate Release:&nbsp; January 4, 2016</b></p><p>  </p><p><b>Perspective: Africa  A new Quarterly Journal on all issues African</b></p><p>  <b>New York City</b>  MIPJ: Media, Information, International Relations, and Humanitarian Affairs (<a href="http://www.mipj.org/">http://www.mipj.org</a>) has partnered with Skambha Village to launch a quarterly journal to focus on issues impacting the continent of Africa. </p><p>  Perspective: Africa&nbsp;will consist of researched and peer-reviewed editorial content, photojournalism, art, interviews with thought leaders, content reviews and vox populi on a diverse range of subjects, including civil issues and political, economic, social, and environmental content. Also welcomed are essays, satire, film, book, and music reviews.</p><p> <i>Perspective: Africa</i>&nbsp;is a multimedia endeavor, with a print and digital journal, and with audio podcasts being introduced in 2016. Print content will be distributed by Ingram, the worlds largest and most trusted distributor of content, with over 38,000 retailers, libraries, educational institutions and other distribution partners, via its partnership with MIPJ.<br> <br> An annual full color, large Journal will be published featuring new content as well as offerings from some of the worlds finest photojournalists. There will also be provisions made to feature citizen/non-professional writers and photographers, and every effort will be made to assist budding journalists in getting their work published.<br> </p><p>Special introductory advertising rates, valid for the first 4 issues, are available and can be accessed through the Skambha Village website at <a href="http://www.skambha-village.org/perspective/">http://www.skambha-village.org/perspective/</a></p><p>  </p><p> The first Call for submissions ends January 15, 2016, with the inaugural release in March, 2016. </p><p>  </p><p>Contact Information:</p><p>  </p><p>Skambha Village</p><p>  </p><p>Skype: leigh.barrett.mipj</p><p>  </p><p><b>Email: info@skambha-village.org</b></p><p>  </p><p><b>Web: <a href="http://www.skambha-village.org/perspective/">http://www.skambha-village.org/perspective/</a><br> <br> </b></p><p>  </p><p><b>###</b><br></p>
By Darius Snieckus  Tuesday, January 05 2016 Updated: Tuesday, January 05 2016&nbsp;<div><br></div><div>In a land with the transformational renewable-energy aspirations of India, Ravi Kailas ambitions are proportionately impressive. The company he set up a little over five years ago, Mytrah Energy, goes into 2016 with a financial war chest arming it to build out its generating capacity past 1GW, with a wind and solar portfolio of 3.5GW waiting to be developed.&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>The Hyderabad-based independent power producers phenomenal growth  from a standing start in 2010 with $80m of equity  puts it on track to install some 200MW of wind a year for the near-term  then well see, Kailas tells Recharge.&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>Mytrah stands out in India because it is pioneering a one-stop-shop business model that gives it almost total control over projects  and is proving extremely fruitful, with its installed wind fleet having expanded steadily towards 750MW.&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>It is a self-determined approach that others might do well to emulate in one of the worlds biggest emerging renewables markets.&nbsp; </div><div><br></div><div>We do it all the way: from assessing the wind resource [it has 120 wind masts throughout the country] to developing the project to actually constructing it, owning and operating, and we do maintenance, asset management  everything except manufacturing our own turbines, he says. This is a unique business model in India.&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>Kailas approach to the nascent Indian renewable-energy market has necessarily been trailblazing. Mytrah has built up an asset base of ten wind farms in six states  Rajasthan, Gujarat, Maharashtra, Andhra Pradesh, Karnataka and Tamil Nadu  using a combination of turnkey contracts and in-house project development, with turbines bought from five OEMs.&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>The diversification of the portfolio we have developed is important. We could have built our first 500MW in one or two locations. That would have been easier.&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>Yet by making it hard for ourselves we have achieved a number of things: we have a geographic diversity of cash flow for the longer term  some years there is more wind in the north, other years from other regions; we have relationships with multiple counterparties, as each state has its own electricity board; and, crucially, we have a better understanding of different regions wind regimes and how to build in mountainous areas, deserts, by the sea and so on.&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>The advantage we have comes from the knowledge of our sites  we can go to an OEM and say what the best turbine is for this site, what the best commercial terms are for this project. It is a much different proposition than going to a vendor and saying, What size of turbine do you have?  This strategy, he explains, marks out Mytrah as the first utility-scale pure-play renewables company in India. Believers include Goldman Sachs, Merrill Lynch and Apollo Funds, purchasers of a $130m bond issue last year.  Even in a relatively low wind year in 2015, revenues for Q3 were up year on year by 10% to $32m  and that will be much improved once the year is out.&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>Mytrah currently sells 643MW of wind power to state grids through 13-25-year power-purchase agreements, as well as 100.5MW directly to private customers on long-term deals.  In India, there is 270GW of existing installed power capacity but the latent demand is ten times that, so there is no shortage of customers now or, prospectively, in the longer term, says Kailas, who has founded a number of start-ups including telecom service and software companies Zip Global Network and Xius Technologies.&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>Though Mytrah has, to date, been ploughing its furrow as a wind farmer, the companys name  which derives from the Sanskrit for sun  betrays its wider, far-horizon aspirations. It recently won a substantial portion of the 350MW solar power auction in the state of Telangana, and has a 50MW lead-off PV project in Punjab.  We chose to wait to join the solar sector until this year [2015], until it was effectively subsidy-free. Now we are at that stage. And this coincides with the Indian governments setting out a very ambitious nationwide solar policy [to bring on line 100GW by 2020].  It looks like solar and wind will have an equal size and stake in Indias energy policy over the next five or ten years at least. It will not be a binary choice for the country.&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>For us, that is a good balance to have.  The potential in India [compared to the forecast global renewable-energy build-out] is exponential. The need for power is so great. This is one of the most exciting energy markets now.<br></div><div><br></div><div>Courtesy <a href="http://www.rechargenews.com">www.rechargenews.com</a></div><div><br></div>

<p>jkjkjhkjdsas</p>
<p></p><p>The Internet of Things (IoT) is enriching our lives - transforming everyday experiences into an ecosystem of information via a network of digitally enabled objects. In the world of retail, IoT is a game changer  it allows companies to know their customer better and improve customer experiences and services. The IoT in the retail industry is rapidly growing  MarketsandMarkets forecasts that the IoT retail market will grow from US$ 14.4 Billion in 2015 to US$ 35.6 Billion in 2020.</p><div></div><div>IoT devices in retail  the role of beacons</div><div>There are several ways that IoT in retail is used  from advertising and mobile payments to managing inventory and tracking theft and loss, leading to enhanced customer experiences and increased revenue. By using various IoT devices such as point of sale, card readers, inventory management, scanners, cameras, sensors, beacons, digital signage and more, retailers will be able to increase revenue and boost customer experience. </div><div></div><div>Beacons are an intrinsic component of the IoT, and play an important role in the retail industry, benefiting both the customer and the retailer. Beacons such as <b>EKOOR</b> beacons are small wireless devices that constantly send out a low power Bluetooth signal to smart phones and smart devices in range, and can be used to provide personally addressed context relevant information. </div><div></div><div>How customers benefit from <b>EKOOR</b> beacons</div><div><img title="Image httpwwwucarecdncom98d76268-7847-45e8-a3da-33f20236b766" alt="" src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/robin8-production/robin8-production/98d76268-7847-45e8-a3da-33f20236b766/untitled.png"></div><div>Beacons enhance a customers experience by engaging shoppers and increasing interest. Beacons send out personalized greetings, on-going promotions, sale alerts and more to customers when they enter the store or are next to a specific product. In addition, customized coupons can be sent to customers upon entry based on previous shopping experiences. </div><div></div><div>Customers can also find out more about a product that interests them using beacon technology, where beacons can track customers close to a certain display and point them to the online store that displays product information and reviews. Beacons can also be programmed to be used as a method of payment and receive payment information from smart devices.  </div><div></div><div>How retailers benefit from EKOOR beacons</div><div></div><div>Beacons help improve efficiency of a business, and can be used to collect data on shopping habits of customers, providing useful analytics and insights to improve and customize customers experience. Information such as how frequently customers come to your store, how long they stay in certain areas, which routes they use etc can be used to plan out floor displays to maximize efficiency. Analytics can also pinpoint which products received the most attention and engagement. </div><div></div><div></div><div><b>EKOOR</b> is transforming the IOT market by making green friendly smart things. It is estimated that there would be billions of smart devices connecting to the internet in the coming years and a good majority of these devices send/receive data only for several times a day. Therefore the overall power consumption is low and make them ideal candidates to harness energy from alternative power sources. Light Powered Proximity Beacons are EKOORs first product while there are number of other initiatives underway to address different IOT verticals. EKOOR is also developing an IOT cloud platform to enable end-to-end connectivity and application development with any IOT device.   </div><div></div><div><b>EKOOR</b> is currently running a Kickstarter campaign to raise funds to help its Beacon production efforts and also lay the foundation for future Green IOT initiatives</div><div></div><p>Visit at : <a href="http://kck.st/1PKbhOe">http://kck.st/1PKbhOe</a><br></p><p></p>
<p>Do you believe that your idea is worth funding? Are you struggling to get capital for your startup? &nbsp;&nbsp;Then come to the international source of capital fund and gain ample support for your unique and creative idea. </p><p>The toughest part about starting a venture is finding a source of capital. Many people take out loans to make their dream or idea alive and spent their whole life to pay back these debts. Now the things have changed.&nbsp; The old loan and funding system has replaced by the new concept which is known as Crowdfunding, the micro financing of a project or ventures by a large number of funders in an online setting. Simply it can be said as the solicitation of funds from multiple investors through a web based platform or social networking sites for a specific project, business venture or social cause. Since the late 1990s, this new form of informal financing system has been emerging as one of the best tools and successfully built up a new standard of excellence in the capital marketing.</p><p>This mode of financing is not new. What is new in crowdfunding is that it uses the capabilities of social network and other features of internet which enables the large number of users. There arise the question, how this becomes so popular? &nbsp;Its because of its extensive scope and simplicity of function. The fiscal crisis of 2008 had paralyzed the whole financial market and traditional system based on banks and other business establishment failed to keep the economical balance. It is during that time Crowdfunding emerged and re-established a strong financial system and a global entrepreneurial environs. </p><p>Crowdfunding has become the most viable way to fund the creative ventures and startups. There are more than 600 crowdfunding platforms around the world. But still so many people are not aware of this flexible source of capital. Startups and creative project such as music, art, and films get more privileges through this platform. It also helps the early stage companies to move on to the next level. </p><p>The benefits of crowdfunding is two sided. Crowdfunding provides ample opportunities for investment in spite of all the geographical barrier. The unique feature of investment in a Crowdfunding is anyone who gets interested in the idea can make their investment. Even a single Dollar is valued. It can make someones dream alive.</p><p>Buckacapital.com, promoted by a UAE based business consultancy company is one of the leading Crowdfunding platform with a wide network of business experts, genuine and reliable investors. If you think that your idea is worth funding and you are able to describe your project and its goal, you can register and add your project in <a href="http://www.buckscapital.com">www.buckscapital.com</a>. &nbsp;It is a team of business experts who made their signature in the field of IT, investments and real estate and also are the eminent partners in the development of great Project on UAE. Their motto is a solid base for everlasting success in capital marketing.</p><p>&nbsp;All types of projects which seem unfit for the patterns and rules of traditional capital market can find adequate capital through this web based international platform of Buckscapital.com. And what is required is just need to fix a goal and budget for your project. If you can explain your plan with suitable image and video in <a href="http://www.buckscapital.com">www.buckscapital.com</a> you can successfully find outpourings of support from all over the world. Entrepreneurs must provide all the information regarding their project like </p><p>·&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;  How long will it take to complete the project?</p><p>·&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;  How much baking need to complete the project?</p><p>·&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;  How does the money be used and details about the reward.</p><p>They also need to keep in touch with the community during the development of project.</p><p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; The crucial aspect of crowdfunding is the question of compensation and reward for the investors. Though few will pledge money simply to provide support. But as per the rules of crowdfunding the donors to be given anything as reward for their support. &nbsp;This reward may be an immaterial acknowledgements ranging from a mere thank you mail, enhanced version s of the product, merchandise and souvenirs to making the contributor part of the product. </p><p>                        </p><p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Buckscapital is such a large international platform which help the upcoming entrepreneurs to connect to a global network of investors who are interested in the respected projects. The coming year is the year of Crowdfunding and it is the most vibrant and fruitful accomplishment to strengthen the global entrepreneurial environs. Said the CEO of Buckscapital. Once you register your project in <a href="http://www.buckscapital.com">www.buckscapital.com</a> you will get the direct access to the investors which facilitate to gain market validation and exposure of the project. Its a place where you can find risk free environment to make your idea alive which trigger rapid growth of the company.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Horsham, PA -- January 7, 2016 -- The 2015 Cottman $100,000 Sweepstakes ended without anyone claiming the grand prize. But Tracy Davis of Everett, Washington, had the closest match to win the bonus prize of $1000. </p><p>The Cottman $100,000 Sweepstakes began on October 1 to coincide with the start of National Car Care month, and ran till November 30. The object of the event was to focus attention on the importance of maintaining your car. </p><p>Heres how the sweepstakes worked: The Cottman technical department chose ten common vehicle maintenance services, which were placed in a specific order and then randomized. </p><p>Contestants accessed the random list from the sweepstakes web site, which was available through the many Cottman web sites and on Facebook. The object was to try to match the original order: Anyone who placed all ten in the correct order would win the $100,000. No one matched all ten, but Davis came closest, earning the bonus prize of $1000. </p><p>I ran into the contest on Facebook, says Davis. The graphics caught my attention, and it looked like itd be fun to give it a try. So I filled out the application, made my selections, and clicked enter. I dont know anything about cars  Im in pharmaceuticals  but I tried to think like a mechanic and chose what would be most important to them. </p><p>Looks like it was a good strategy. And, with the holidays right around the corner, the prize couldnt have come at a better time for Davis and her husband, Michael. According to Cottman Director of Advertising Sue Burg, people from all across the country took part in the sweepstakes. Id like to congratulate Tracy for winning the bonus prize and thank all those who participated in this years sweepstakes, she said. While Cottman is sorry no one won the grand prize, they were thrilled with the response to the sweepstakes and are planning to follow it up with another contest next year. </p><p>To learn more about Cottman Transmission and Total Auto Care, to watch for new Cottman sweepstakes, or to find a Cottman center near you, visit them on line at <a href="http://www.cottman.com">www.cottman.com</a>.<br></p><p><b>About Cottman Transmission and Total Auto Care: </b></p><p>With locations across the U.S., Cottman Transmission and Total Auto Care is a transmission and auto repair brand that services almost any make or model vehicle, foreign or domestic. Cottman Transmission and Total Auto Care centers specialize in complete transmission service, brakes, suspension, air conditioning service and much more. Cottmans headquarters is based in Horsham, Pennsylvania. For more information, please visit <a href="http://www.Cottman.com">www.Cottman.com</a> and <a href="http://www.TheCottmanManBlog.com">www.TheCottmanManBlog.com</a>. <br></p><p><img src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/robin8-production/robin8-production/10947fc5-df53-4b6b-a520-cfa3f2398504/sweepswinner.jpg" title="Image: http://s3.amazonaws.com/robin8-production/robin8-production/10947fc5-df53-4b6b-a520-cfa3f2398504/sweepswinner.jpg"><br></p><p>Media Contact:&nbsp;</p><p>Derik Beck <br>VP of Digital Marketing <br>Cottman Transmission and Total Auto Care <br>dbeck@cottman.com</p>

LAS VEGAS, Jan. 6, 2016  With its first live over-the-air broadcast of 4K Ultra HD TV with high dynamic range (HDR) using the new ATSC 3.0 Candidate Standard, digital television pioneer LG Electronics (LG) is ushering in the era of next-generation television broadcasting at CES® 2016.<br><br>The landmark broadcast, from Las Vegas station KHMP-TVs transmitter on Nevadas Black Mountain, is delivering pristine 4K HDR content, received for the first time on LGs new ATSC 3.0-enabled receivers at the Las Vegas Convention Center. The signal has stunning detail with four times the resolution of todays HDTV and offers the lifelike realism of HDRs enhanced contrast, brightness and shadow detail.<br><br>KHMP Channel 18, owned and operated by DNV Spectrum Holdings, a broadcast group that also owns other stations in the United States, is broadcasting in Las Vegas using the ATSC 3.0 Physical Layer Candidate Standard under an experimental broadcast license from the U.S. Federal Communications Commission. Core technologies developed by LG are included in the majority of the Physical Layer Candidate Standard.<br><br>The transmission field trial during CES exemplifies the very robust transmission and high bandwidth for 4K made possible for the first time using the ATSC 3.0 next-generation standard developed by the Advanced Television Systems Committee.<br><br>We are proud that LG technology is behind the majority of the elements of the Physical Layer transmission system, said Dr. Skott Ahn, president and chief technology officer, LG Electronics. ATSC 3.0 is a collaborative effort among many broadcast technology experts, and LG technology is part of at least 10 of the 15 building blocks of the new Candidate Standard.<br><br>Among the many LG contributions to ATSC 3.0, the companys technologies are included in the Physical Layer Candidate Standards scrambler, forward error correction, bit-interleaver, mapper, MIMO, time-interleaver, OFDM framer, frequency-interleaver, pilot and tone reserve, and guard interval.<br><br>Thanks in large part to LGs technology at the heart of the Physical Layer Candidate Standard, this robust system will bring a new level of flexibility for broadcasters and exciting new services for viewers. ATSC 3.0 promises to usher in the new Golden Age of broadcast television, Ahn added.<br><br>Expected to redefine TV broadcasting for decades to come, the ATSC 3.0 next-generation broadcast standard provides higher capacity to deliver 4K UHD services, robust reception on mobile devices and improved spectrum efficiency. The increased payload capacity of the physical layer combined with HEVC encoding will allow broadcasters many more options when planning their broadcast service offerings.<br><br>LG is leading the way in development and commercialization of ATSC 3.0 in the U.S. and in Korea, said Ahn, who explained that this weeks Las Vegas broadcast comes on the heels of other broadcast field trials conducted in the United States and South Korea over the past 18 months by LG Electronics, its U.S. R&amp;D Lab Zenith, and leading broadcast equipment provider GatesAir.<br><br>Those real-world field tests in Seoul, Cleveland, Ohio, and Madison, Wisconsin, represented key mileposts in LGs pioneering developments of core technologies behind the new ATSC 3.0 Standard, he said. The Las Vegas CES broadcast, with the approved ATSC Candidate Standard transmission system, again shows how we are partnering with broadcasters around the world to drive adoption of next-generation broadcasting technology.<br><br>Development of ATSC 3.0 technologies represents the latest collaboration among LG, Zenith and GatesAir, co-inventors of the transmission system behind the ATSC A/153 Mobile Digital TV Standard, adopted by the industry in 2009. Zenith invented the core transmission system at the heart of todays ATSC A/53 Digital Television Standard, approved by the Federal Communications Commission in 1996.<br><br>LG Electronics, Inc. (KSE: 066570.KS) is a global leader and technology innovator in consumer electronics, mobile communications and home appliances, employing 83,000 people working in 128 locations around the world. With 2014 global sales of USD 55.91 billion (KRW 59.04 trillion), LG comprises four business units ? Home Entertainment, Mobile Communications, Home Appliance &amp; Air Solution, and Vehicle Components ? and is one of the worlds leading producers of flat panel TVs, mobile devices, air conditioners, washing machines and refrigerators. LG Electronics is a 2015 ENERGY STAR Partner of the Year.<br><br>Named 4K Ultra HD Partner for CES® 2016, LG Electronics USA, Inc., based in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., is the North American subsidiary of LG Electronics, Inc., a $56 billion global force and technology leader in consumer electronics, home appliances and mobile communications. LG Electronics, a proud 2015 ENERGY STAR® Partner of the Year, sells a range of stylish and innovative home entertainment products, mobile phones, home appliances, commercial displays, air conditioning systems and solar energy solutions in the United States, all under LGs Life's Good marketing theme.<a href="http://www.lg.com">www.lg.com</a>.
