<p>DETROIT, MI- January 19, 2016- &nbsp;From April 2014 to October 2015, residents of Flint have been subject to bathing, drinking and cooking with contaminated water from Flint River. Virginia Tech researchers found the water was highly corrosive. A class-action lawsuit alleges the state Department of Environmental Quality didn't treat the water for corrosion, in accordance with federal law, and because so many service lines to Flint are made of lead, the noxious element leached into the water of the city's homes, according to <a href="http://cnn.com">CNN</a>.</p><p> </p><p><a href="http://swankaposh.com">Swank a Posh Boutique</a> not only believes in empowering women to stand out in fashion but to stand out in their communities as well. In the wake of this pressing and current issue in Flint, Michigan, Swank A Posh Boutique has designated its three locations as drop off points for bottled water. </p><p><b><br></b></p><p>Its sickening and its happening right in my backyard, says Swank A Posh Boutiques Owner, Ebony Swank. I have an obligation as a business owner to give back to the community that has supported me for years. I would not feel right if I did not do something about this. </p><p><b><br></b></p><p>Resident and customers are able to drop off bottled water at any of Swank A Posh Boutiques locations around the city and a delivery in Flint will be made by the end of the week. </p><p><b><br><br></b></p><p>###</p><p><b><br></b></p><p>Swank A Posh Boutique is the home of everything Fly, Funky and Posh in womens fashion. <p>Mr. Martin Stuvik, Managing Director of Dacon Inspection Services, Co., Ltd. announced that its board had selected Mrs. Mallika Kaekla as the organization's new Chief Executive Officer. Mrs. Mallika Kaekla takes the helm of the strongly expanding regional company at a critical time, while preparing for its IPO to list on the Stock Exchange of Thailand in 2016.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Mr. Martin Stuvik, Managing Director, said Mrs. Kaekla has for over 10 years been a key member of the management team that has overseen the companies rapid growth from a local service provider, to becoming an Asian regional leader to the Oil &amp; Gas and Energy industry. The board has full confidence that Mrs. Kaekla will be the right leader to take this company to the next stage, as a global service provider of advanced inspection services, provided from our base in Thailand.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>The results speak for themselves with the dynamic growth that Dacon has achieved under Mrs. Kaeklas stewardship. With the respect and admiration that she enjoys from her team and her balance of authority, collaborative approach and strategic thinking Dacons board of directors have full confidence that the company will continue its upward trajectory under Mrs Kaeklas leadership.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;I am honored and excited to lead Dacon on its mission to expand further and look forward to growing with the company. With now over 300 employees Dacon is expanding fast, and we strive to support business growth within the Asean Economic Community (AEC). I am committed to the mission, vision and culture of the company and look forward to leading the people of Dacon to mutual success said Ms Kaekla after accepting the new position. </p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><b>About Dacon</b></p><p>Dacon Inspection Services Co. Ltd. was founded in Norway in 1979 as a subsea inspection company. It since shifted its focus towards Asia, opening a head office in Rayong (Thailand) in 1996 as well as a regional offices in Singapore. Today Dacon provides <a href="http://www.dacon-inspection.com/services/pipeline-services" target="_blank">pipeline inspections</a>, asset integrity, training and all conventional and advanced NDT techniques to the mining, power generation, fabrication, heavy industry, downstream, midstream and upstream oil and gas industries. </p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>                      Due to very strong growth over the past years Dacon has grown to become one of the leading inspection companies in Asia. In the aftermath of the North American International Auto Show (NAIAS), Luxy reveals the first-date-car-of-choice as voted by the Millionaire crowd. And as always, men and women couldnt agree less.</p><p>Since launching in 2014, the Luxy dating app has witnessed more than 500K downloads in less than six months. During this time, thousands of people have identified their luxury brand preferences on their dating profiles  and Luxy has compiled and ranked those luxury brands preferred by our wealthy single members. Ahead of the Apple Watch 2 release, Luxy recently found a strong preference amongst the elite 1% for classic watches (read: Rolex) as opposed to Apples wearable toy.&nbsp;</p><p>For over a century, the first month of the year has played host to the worlds most prestigious auto show. The NAIAS introduces the coolest cars and dynamic designs for 2016. This year luxury car brands Lexus, BMW and Audi all reveal their newest E models, hoping to take a position in the high-end EV market. Luxury car manufacturers also showcased their new E-mobility at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) earlier this year.&nbsp;</p><p>To no surprise, Luxy finds that German brands come on top. Millionaires prefer BMW (45,874 votes) the most, followed by Audi (42,470) and Mercedes-Benz (36,216). Tesla scored 7,350, suggesting that the high-end EV market has some work to do when it comes to winning round the luxury market.</p><p>But what about cars and dating?</p><p>Men were asked, Which car are you most likely to drive when you pick up your lady on a first date?, where women were asked, which car would you prefer your man to drive on a first date?. Results conflicted.&nbsp;</p><p>Out of the four options available, BMW, Range Rover, Ferrari, Telsa, 64% of men thought that a BMW would secure them a second date, while Tesla scored just 7%, proving that green isnt always smarter. At 30%, it seems that women are less impressed with a Bimmer. Tesla won the race with 58%.&nbsp;</p><p>While men prefer the classic, strong, status of the BMW to showcase their worth, women are more impressed by new technology and eco alternatives. Women prefer Teslas because it shows that the man still has enough money in his pocket to treat her like a Queen but also has the sensitivity to care about the planet the source said, who wants to remain anonymous, even the rich women like a sensitive man.&nbsp;</p><p>More Brand Preference Surveys To Come</p><p>Luxy will be re-visiting these brand preferences on a regular basis and our next brand preference rankings will focus on fashion and travel. Heres a bit more about the Luxy app itself.</p><p><br></p><p>About Luxy:&nbsp;</p><p>It works just like Tinder, said the CEO of Luxy With one big exception: Our app is for wealthy people only. Its basically Tinder minus the poor people.</p><p><br></p><p>It was really just a matter of time. With Tinder, Grindr and others carving out a niche for themselves in the world of high-speed digital dating, Luxy has launched to work in the same way.</p><p><br></p><p>Its Tinder without low-income dating prospects. In fact, the average income of male users on Luxy is over $200k.</p><p><br></p><p>Like Tinder, based on the results of potential candidates, the app allows the user to anonymously like or pass them by swiping or tapping. If two users like each other then it results in a "Match" and Luxy introduces the two users and opens a chat.</p><p><br></p><p>Who doesnt want to date somebody both attractive and wealthy? Privately, we all know we prefer to have both of these things. One user said: Tinder was pretty awesome when it came out, but theres a lot of riff raff on there. [I] would rather know the guy has a couple bucks in his pocket.</p><p><br></p><p>With the rise of high-speed digital dating, its about time somebody introduced a filter to weed out low-income prospects by neighborhood, said the CEO of Luxy.</p><p><br></p><p>Another user wrote: Does this mean that were all going to flock to Beverly Hills on a Friday night to make a match? Maybe, thats not a bad idea!</p><p><br></p><p>For media inquiries, please contact: press@onluxy.com.</p><p><br></p><p>About Luxy</p><p>                                 </p><p>Luxy is the #1 luxury dating app which has been bringing together successful singles. There are many successful persons on the site, including CEOs, professional athletes, doctors, lawyers, investors, entrepreneurs, beauty queens, fitness models and Hollywood celebrities.</p><div><br></div>
<u></u><i></i><u></u><p>Industry Experts&nbsp;has unveiled the new market research report on activated carbon. The new report <a href="http://industry-experts.com/verticals/chemicals-and-materials/activated-carbon-a-global-market-overview">Activated Carbon  A Global Market Overview</a> reveals that the Water Treatment consumes the largest amounts of activated carbons among all other end-use sectors. Water Treatment is estimated to account for about 824 thousand metric tons in 2016 valued at US$1.3 billion. Air Purification projected to be the fastest growing end-use sector during the analysis period 2016-2022 with a CAGR of 10.4% and expected to touch 1.2 million metric tons valued at US$2.4 billion by 2022 while Water Treatment is witnessing slightly slower growth with a CAGR of 10.3% for the same analysis period.<br><br><br><b><u>Global demand for activated carbon</u></b>&nbsp;is on an upswing, with prospects for future growth looking quite healthy. Activated carbons outstanding capability in adsorbing a number of impurities from liquids and gases renders it to be used on an extensive basis in several applications concerning air and water purification. Additional application areas for the material include the automotive, food &amp; beverage and medical &amp; pharmaceutical industries, albeit on a limited basis. The future market for activated carbon is also likely to derive benefit from a continuous stream of openings from a number of industrial processes that employ adsorption technologies.<br><br>Regulations related to water and air pollution across the world have a major role to play in influencing demand for activated carbon. Several countries across the globe are confronting the challenge of depleting clean water resources due to growing population. Rising levels of contaminated groundwater need purification and activated carbon offers a potent solution for overcoming this hurdle. The Disinfectants and Disinfection Byproducts Rule in the United States that puts a cap on the allowable concentration of chemicals in drinking water is also likely to drive growth for activated carbon. The supply of raw material for activated carbon has been tight and producers have been compelled to increase prices of virgin activated carbon. This scenario has led to fueling demand for reactivated carbon in various areas, such as refineries for reducing VOCs in gas phase applications, groundwater remediation and wastewater treatment processes.<br><br>Worldwide market for&nbsp;<b><i><u>Activated Carbon</u></i></b>&nbsp;product segments explored in this study includes Granular Activated Carbon, Powdered Activated Carbon and Other Activated Carbons. The report also analyzes the key applications of Activated Carbon comprising Gas Phase applications and Liquid Phase applications while discussing the major end-use sector markets covering Air Purification, Automotive Canisters, Food &amp; Beverages, Medical &amp; Pharmaceutical, Water Treatment and Others. The global markets for the above mentioned product types, application areas and end-use sectors are analyzed in terms of both in metric tons and USD. Global market for activated carbon, estimated at US$2.7 billion in 2015, forecast at US$3 billion in 2016 and further expected to maintain a robust CAGR of 12.8% between 2016 and 2022 to reach a projected US$6.2 billion by 2022.<br><br>This report reviews, analyses and projects the activated carbon market for the period 2012-2022 globally and the regional markets including North America, Europe, Asia-Pacific, South America and Rest of World. The regional markets further analyzed for 15 independent countries across North America  The United States, Canada and Mexico; Europe  France, Germany, Italy, Spain, Russia and the United Kingdom; Asia-Pacific  China, India, Japan and South Korea; South America  Argentina and Brazil.</p><p><br></p><p>This 585 page global market research report includes 367 charts (includes a data table and graphical representation for each chart), supported with meaningful and easy to understand graphical presentation, of market numbers. This report profiles 49 key global players and 80 major players across North America  22; Europe  8; Asia-Pacific  49; and South America  1. The research also provides the listing of the companies engaged in manufacturing and supply of Activated Carbon. The global list of companies covers the address, contact numbers and the website addresses of 227 companies.</p><p><br></p><p>Hyderabad, India based Industry Experts is a multi industry focused business information provider.<br><br>For more details, please visit&nbsp;<a href="http://industry-experts.com/verticals/chemicals-and-materials/activated-carbon-a-global-market-overview" title="Link: http://industry-experts.com/verticals/chemicals-and-materials/activated-carbon-a-global-market-overview">http://industry-experts.com/verticals/chemicals-and-materials/activated-carbon-a-global-market-overview</a></p>

<p>                 </p><p><i>A partnership to advance the adoption of EIM systems within asset intensive industries </i></p>  <p><b>January 22, 2016 Woerden, The Netherlands</b>. Radial SG,<b><i> </i></b>a leading provider of information and collaboration solutions for complex process environments, today announces a partnership with Kinsmen Group. Under this agreement Kinsmen Group will resell Radials Viewport Solutions enhancing the EIM (Engineering Information Management) services and solutions Kinsmen Group provides globally to owner operators in asset intensive industries. </p>  <p>The Radial Viewport engine uses machine learning to turn big data into useable information. It integrates static and real-time data from multiple source systems and presents this information in an understandable, easy-to-use and concise format. By detecting equipment tags and other types of references automatically, Viewport allows users to easily navigate through all of the available data, highlights possible consistency issues and constantly improves data quality. This technology enables Kinsmen Groups document control specialists to provide even faster, more precise data quality checks across fragmented systems, allowing Kinsmen Group to provide customers with an enhanced level of service. </p>  <p>"We are excited to announce this partnership between Kinsmen Group and Radial SG," comments Mark van t Zet, CEO of Radial SG. "Our Viewport Solution simplifies the complex challenge of connecting diverse engineering information systems and consolidation of multiple data sources. Kinsmen Group has a highly experienced team of consultants with in-depth experience of delivering EIM solutions to owner operators across the globe. Viewport is an ideal fit with Kinsmens ongoing success story and we look forward to working with their team."</p>  <p>Adding Radial Viewport to our services and solutions portfolio enables us to deliver greater insight to our customers on the data and document integrity of their operational assets. Viewport is an exceptional product that enables us to provide a cost-effective solution that enhances a customers current technology and processes, and resolves some of the biggest challenges they experience today. Brian Sallade, CEO of Kinsmen Group.</p>  <p><b>About Radial SG </b></p>  <p>Radial SG is a leading developer of innovative software solutions for retrieving and publishing data from multiple sources. Radial SG's publishing platform, Viewport, is able to analyze multiple data sources, regardless of format or location. Using machine learning and smart shape and text recognition, Viewport automatically detects cross-references and transforms these into dynamic links. Viewport ensures that everyone has instant access to correct, up-to-date and reliable information, enhancing interoperability and delivering Information Excellence, for the entire organization. </p>  <p>To learn more, go to <a href="http://www.radialsg.com">http://www.radialsg.com</a>.<b></b></p>  <p><b>About Kinsmen Group</b></p>  <p>Operating globally from locations in the U.S. and the U.K. Kinsmen Group provides specialized and practical EIM (Engineering Information Management) services to help meet the compliance, safety, efficiency and business goals of owner operators in asset intensive industries.</p>  <p>Backed by over 100 years of combined hands on industry experience, our professional services offerings are designed to assess requirements, existing systems, processes, engineering documentation, data and business goals. Then, working closely with our customers and partners, design, select, integrate, migrate, configure, manage, implement, administer and support software solutions to meet those goals. And business management services enable customers to outsource document control to help meet peaks in demand throughout the lifecycle of a project.</p>  <p>It is the practical experience of engineering document and data solutions of our team that sets Kinsmen Group apart, delivering professional services to turn software applications into successful engineering information management solutions.</p>  <p>To learn more, go to <a href="http://www.kinsmengroup.com/">http://www.kinsmengroup.com</a>.</p>  <p>For more information contact:-</p>  <table>  <tbody><tr>   <td>   <p>Jessica   Blanchessi Kinsmen Group LLC</p>   </td>   <td>   <p>Mark van t Zet Radial SG </p>   </td>  </tr>  <tr>   <td>   <p>Email:-   jessica.blanchessi@kinsmengroup.com</p>   </td>   <td>   <p>Email: mark.vantzet@radialsg.com   </p>   </td>  </tr>  <tr>   <td>   <p>Telephone:-   +1 713-725-0143</p>   </td>   <td>   <p>Telephone: +31   6 24615716 </p>   </td>  </tr> </tbody></table>  <p></p>
<div>             <div>                 15                 Jan                 2016<br>- AFP - Agence France Presse <a href="http://www.afp.com/fr/professionnels/partenaires/newspress/artistes-francais-et-du-monde-entier-engages-dans-le-projet-international-surrealisme-now-2016">http://www.afp.com/fr/professionnels/partenaires/newspress/artistes-francais-et-du-monde-entier-engages-dans-le-projet-international-surrealisme-now-2016</a><br></div>         </div>                                   <img title="Image httpwwwucarecdncom2dbc62ed-8f23-4314-95fb-30a5a4374c19" src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/robin8-production/robin8-production/2dbc62ed-8f23-4314-95fb-30a5a4374c19/34kbArtists_blog.jpg" alt=""><br>l'édition 2016 de l'International Surréalisme Now 2016 se tiendra  dans plusieurs pays simultanément aux Etats Unis et en Europe.* Le  lancement de l'International Surréalisme Now aura lieu aux Etats Unis à  partir du 21 janvier jusqu'au au 19 février 2016. Elle sera suivie en  février des expositions de Coimbra et du musée Poros.  <br> <br>L' International Surrealism Now est un projet de Santiago  Ribeiro, peintre surréaliste portugais qui s'est entièrement consacré à  la promotion du Surréalisme contemporain grâce à de nombreuses  expositions réalisées qui se sont tenues dans de hauts lieux de la  culture dans le monde. Tour à tour de grandes villes comme Dallas et Los Angeles; Berlin et Paris, Moscou et Varsovie ont accueilli des expositions. En Italie, il faut citer Florence; en Espagne les villes de Madrid, et Barcelone, mais aussi en Europe Orientale Belgrade, le Monte Negro, la Roumanie. Enfin le Japon et le Brésil donnent une nouvelle dimension à cette grande manifestation.  <br> <br>Lisbonne a une place particulière. En effet, l'  International Surrealism Now est née à Coimbra au Portugal en 2010, avec  une grande exposition soutenue par la Fondation portugaise Bissaya  Barreto, une fondation majeure de ce pays et ce, sous le direction de  Santiago Ribeiro. Depuis, cet événement s'est tenu à Conímbriga, à  l'occasion du 50 ème anniversaire du Musée Monographique de Conímbriga  (le deuxième musée le plus visité au Portuga. Après une édition 2012 à Paris avec l'appui de la GAPP( Galerie d'Art Portugal Presente) et celui de Liba WS artiste franco/american établi à Paris la manifestation s'est déplacée à Madrid avec  l'appui de Yamal Din une artiste hispano / marocaine originaire de la  ville de Grenade et organisatrice de la FIARTE GRENADE. Dallas et Los Angeles ainsi  que le Mississippi accueilleront l' International Surrealism Now, avec  l'appui de l'artiste surréaliste nord-américaine Shahla Rosa. En 2013 c'est la capitale allemande qui est retenue avec la Gallérie Felliny Dernièrement  l'exposition est présentée au public au Portugal dans des lieux  marquants tels le Chateau médiéval du Paço da Ega, avec la participation  de la ville de Condeixa-a-Nova et la galerie Vieira Portuense, à Porto, la capitale du nord du Portugal.  <br> <br>L'International Surrealism Now, a rassemblé 70 artistes de 30 pays qui comptent dans l'art contemporain suivants:  Allemagne, Australie, Autriche, Azerbaïdjan, Belgique, Brésil, Canada,  Chili, Chine, Croatie, Espagne, EUA, Philippines, France, Hollande,  Indonésie, Angleterre, Iran, Islande, Italie, Japon, Mexique, Nouvelle  Zélande, Pologne, Portugal, Roumanie, Russie, Servie, Slovénie, Ukraine,  Vietnam.  <br> <br>Artistes:Agim Meta / Ana Neamu / Ana Pilar Morales /  Anna Plavinskaya / Andrew Artist Baines / Asier Guerrero Rico ( Dio ) /  Brigid Marlin / Bien Banez / Daila Lupo / Dan Neamu / Daniel Hanequand /  Daniele Gori / Domen Lo / Edgar Invoker/ Egill Ibsen / Erik Heyninck /  Ettore Aldo Del Vigo / Farhad Jafari / France Garrido / Francisco Urbano  / Gromyko Padilla Semper / Héctor Pineda / Hector Toro / Hugues Gillet / <p>"Enhancing Land, Enriching lives."  Who would not be captivated by that promise? Right? It is given that people wants to live in a place where they can call it a home. What we all want most in life is the ability to maintain a healthy and satisfying lifestyle. And a home is where we can find and have a safety, contentment and comfort in our lives. For some, investing in<b> </b><a href="http://www.avidaland.com/condominium">Avida Towers condominium</a><b> </b>would give them the satisfaction they want in life.&nbsp; But before anything else, some of you here might think why and what makes Avida Land liveable. Well for one reason, they don't just invest in the real estate itself, they also invest in people.</p><p>Over the years, Avida organization has seven units with a close to 200-strong workforce teaming up to perform excellently real estate developments for their clients. That includes the Office of the President, Finance, Supply Chain Management, Marketing and Sales, Project and Strategic Management, Technical Services and Human Resources and Customer Care. Without these pillars, coming up with excellent strategies on how they can make a property liveable for their clients may not be accomplished efficiently and successful. </p><p>Members of the Avida organization do not just do their duties and responsibilities; they also practice good values or traits that promote growth and development by providing an environment that creates creativity, productivity, and professionalism. Of course, having these traits would have better results, not just to their clients, but also to their working environment. Additionally, they also value integrity, quality, customer orientation, teamwork and their commitment to delivering excellent works for their clients. That means, real estate professionals, contractors, and other personnel undergo several training modules designed to enhance selling and entrepreneurial skills and aimed at increasing their personal economic potential in their respective field.</p><p>And as a real estate developer, they don't just build properties intended for their clients within the country; they also provide homes for overseas Filipinos who wish to have their home. In 2003, more representative offices were opened in Singapore and in Dubai in 2005. Moreover, their markets have extended in countries such as Australia, Hong Kong, Malaysia, among many other countries.&nbsp; Of course, the properties are not only intended for Filipino people but also, foreigners who also wish to avail can have a safe home in Avida land.</p><p>        </p><p>Through their well-designed features, more and more people have already achieved their desired dreams  to have their home. With that, they bring the joy that uplifts the lives of more Filipinos all throughout the countries.</p>
<p>Buying a property which you always dreamed of is never been easy since it's not just a house you have to buy, it's an investment for lifetime. Opting for property which is most suitable to you is one of the biggest decisions of your life and the most captious part towards your dream house. Moreover it will make a very big hole in your pocket and will take up most of your savings. Even if you are thinking to take a home loan, a bulk amount from your monthly salary will go into EMIs. Many variables drives the decision such as location,budget, Area per sqft along with some personal choices. Also some points are considered specific to the property type apart from affordability,location or luxury.</p><p><img width="525" alt="" src="https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/T-A7kaVfChvnv3_hkJW15UY98DFKrqgmwdXYWLC2_byFblHPd2UeD62Rih9yRsyXS_KATfmQG-7ZZHmlu6Vmv_br2rGe17JgVxvSDkVyjAZKdrGHFQwdLXmmvRN5eJFWr-jbEpA4" height="350" title="Image: https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/T-A7kaVfChvnv3_hkJW15UY98DFKrqgmwdXYWLC2_byFblHPd2UeD62Rih9yRsyXS_KATfmQG-7ZZHmlu6Vmv_br2rGe17JgVxvSDkVyjAZKdrGHFQwdLXmmvRN5eJFWr-jbEpA4"></p><p><br></p><p>First and the foremost thing which needs to be kept in mind is that it is always innocuous to buy a property <a href="https://www.realtycompass.com/property-view-shriram-chirpingwoods-by-shriram-properties-private-ltd-in-bangalore-east" target="_blank">Shriram Chirping Woods</a> which is legally approved. Buyer should always opt for the property for which government bodies have approved its map before entering into any kind of agreement or contract. Secondly one must always go by the track record of builder to ensure quality product and timely delivery of your valuable property. Generally all good builders keep a track record of their profile and the work done by them previously, so its always better to ask them for that to have an idea about their background. Thirdly project location should be chosen wisely keeping future perspective in mind. Though it is always a personal choice whether to buy your dream house on main road keeping location benefits in mind as compared to the ones which are inside. But remember one thing we are buying a house and not an office space, so your personal space plays a foremost role here and down the line you should not regret your decision of buying a property on main road due to sound and traffic pollution. Fourthly, you should have the knowledge of carpet area, built-up and super- built up areas and before making up your mind to buy a property just don't neglect to figure out the extra costs. Generally the builder charges for super- built up area and the buyer must understand all this calculation before signing into any kind of contract or agreement. &nbsp;Fifthly, never go by sample flats, many-a-times investors just end up getting ditched by the images of sample flats and later finds out that it does not look like the one which was shown to them. Freebies are just to attract buyers but in actual nothing is free and the cost is already included in the price of the apartment <a href="https://www.realtycompass.com/property-view-magnificia-by-sattva-group-in-bangalore-east" target="_blank">Salarpuria Sattva Magnificia</a> . Lastly, it all comes down to the price of your dream house. A buyer must do a complete survey about the prices in that location in which he is willing to take his house after keeping in mind various parameters such as amenities, &nbsp;quality of construction, possession date etc. Also negotiation is as much necessary as buying a grocery from builder because it might somehow save your hard earned money.</p>

The program helps people set clear and solid plans that are designed to deal with modern lifestyle hazards like sleep deprivation, lack of a balanced diet, stress and weight issues.</p><p>LifeUp Coaching has announced its exclusive new online fitness program New Year New You for people looking to lose 20 pounds or more. True to its name, the program is designed to kick start a completely personalized journey to adopting lifelong dedication to health and fitness. To be able to extract maximum benefits, Derek Opperman, the creator of this program, has limited the intake to just 10 people.<br></p><p> <br> </p><p> Every New Year witnesses people renewing their commitment to eating healthy and living an active and wholesome lifestyle. However, as it goes with resolutions, its easy to lose steam. Dereks integrative health coaching attacks the very core of this problem by delivering a solution personalized to the needs and lifestyle of each person.  </p><p> <br> </p><p> Anyone looking to get a fit and healthy lifestyle can avail a free consultation before they take the dive. The winner will be announced on June 9, 2016 in Vienna at the 7th World Beauty Innovation Summit and will receive worldwide media attention (<a href="http://www.innocossummit.com">www.innocossummit.com</a>).</p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p>Appropriate contributions include developing, enhancing and expanding  innovations in marketing, product and packaging initiatives that have  delivered business value. Our goal is to give these innovators more  recognition by introducing the Leader of the Year Awards. We have the  support of our jury, which consists of industry leaders, consultants and  academics who are very excited to choose the first winners in 2016,  says Irina Kremin, Managing Director of <a href="http://innocosevents.com/#innoCos%20events">innoCos events</a>.</p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p>The event is a high-profile international summit featuring case study  presentations by brands and retailers such as Amorepacific, Amway,  bellabox Australia, Erborian, Luxola, Modiface, P&amp;G, Unilever, Yves  Rocher, and many more. The conference program will benefit executives  who work in marketing, innovation, new products, research and  development, online marketing and social media branding, consumer  insights and market research, packaging and business development.</p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p>The nomination categories for <a target="_blank" href="http://innocossummit.com/awards/">Leader of the Year </a>are:  Marketing; Products; Packaging and Retail. Conference attendees are  invited to submit nominations for this Award via the application form at  <a href="http://www.leaderoftheyearaward.com">www.leaderoftheyearaward.com</a></p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p>***</p> <p>About innoCos events<br> The international innoCos events have not only set a goal to organize  exciting presentations, rousing speeches and inspiring workshops, but  also brings together leading professionals from the fields of  innovation, marketing, trends and consumer Insights, R&amp;D, packaging,  retail strategies and branding for the beauty industry promoting  networking to challenge and inspire. <p>Foreclosure is an evil thing to admit to. You admit your'e a bum, a cheat, a liar and broke. You admit to the world and your neighbors, that you are somehow not as good as everyone else. And you admit, you can't afford your home anymore. For a long while there, I probably shouldn't have felt so bad about it, it seems everyone I knew was facing some sort of financial downfall, but just the same, when they told me that my house was going into foreclosure, a sick feeling of despair set upon me and I knew I had been beaten.</p><p>The reason why I fell behind in my payments started several years before the actual paperwork and sheriffs order to vacate came. It started well before I even missed my first payment. It started when I became the sole breadwinner in my home, and I realized my job was not paying enough to carry the whole enchilada.</p><p>Truth be told I didn't really care to own the home. I lived on a boat year round, was quite happy to do my laundry at the laundromat and slept in 10 degree temps with my faithful pup cuddled up in my sleeping bag. I showered at the gym, ate dinner at the bar and only slept four hours a night anyway, so why did I need a home to do that?</p><p>Turns out, I needed a home not for me, but for my family- my two dogs and a my cat. And another family member that I wasn't so proud to admit I lived with, my Mom. I didn't really live with my Mom, but when my Dad died so many years back, it kind of fell to me to care for her, so it was a tentative balance that she lived in the house and I lived on the boat. And we all could be most self respectable that way. Unfortunately in 2012, a great recession, a job loss, a fight for boaters rights, a dog bite incident and a freak October snow fall hit and that tentative balance was thrown into chaos. A so my life would change and my home would slide into Foreclosure, despite my fiercest attempts to fight it.</p><p>It was early 2012, when I finally missed my first mortgage payment. That month, money was tight and I had been fighting with the bank to modify my mortgage payments since 2010. I couldn't pay my mortgage for the first time ever, but I had every intention of catching up the next month. The next month, it was same the deal, just not enough money. And then as the bills piled up, the job market slowed down and the dog managed to sneak out of the house and bite a bicyclist who wandered down the the dead end dirt road along my property line, the tide turned against me.</p><br>

<p>CHICAGO, Ill. (January 20, 2016)  The January 2016 issue of <i>Architectural Record</i> highlights the innovative design and educational functionality of GEMS World Academy  Chicagos vertical campus. The school, which combines a strong international curriculum with an emphasis on systems thinking and an innovative approach to technology, is featured alongside groundbreaking school buildings in Germany, England, Croatia, the Democratic Republic of Congo, Afghanistan, and Brazil. <br> <br> The profile recognizes the schools successful integration into Chicagos Lakeshore East neighborhood and the creation of a technology-enhanced, state-of-the-art learning environment.&nbsp; Teaching and collaborative spaces work together to maximize student-teacher engagement  allowing students and teachers to experience a one-to-one connection within the schools larger context. The school is seen as a dynamic, interactive learning hub where students and faculty gather, learn, and explore together. Along with GEMSs expert educators, uninterrupted views of Chicagos city center and museum campus inspire students each day. This sense of place is particularly important to GEMS because the school marries theory and practice via a world as our campus approach  students regularly engage with corporate, civic, and social leaders throughout the city on regular field explorations called Field Studies.&nbsp;</p><p>The 10-story GEMS World Academy  Chicago Lower School opened in 2014. The Chicago-based architecture firm, bKL, designed the building, which houses students from preschool to 8th grade. bKLs design for the GEMS school also received the International Interior Design Association Illinois Chapter 2014 Red Award for Educational PK-12 Project and the <i>Engineering News-Record</i>s Best Projects Award of Merit for K-12 Education, 2015.</p><p>This school was designed by bKL with the purpose of facilitating academic excellence, said Geoff Jones, GEMS World Academy-Chicagos head of school. The vertical design encourages older students to interact and become academic role models for our younger students, helping create a powerful preschool-to-12 education.</p><p>We are honored that Architectural Record has showcased GEMS World Academy-Chicago in the Schools of the 21st Century edition for 2016, stated bKL Architectures Education Practice Leader, Lynne Sorkin. Inclusion of the Lower School in this prestigious publication is a testament to the successful international collaboration between bKL and GEMS representatives. The resulting efficient mid-rise design optimizes natural light, enables flexibility, incorporates state-of-the-art learning spaces and creates a strong sense of place.</p><p><b><i>About Architectural Record:</i></b> <br>Founded in 1891, <i>Architectural Record</i>&nbsp;is a top source for news and information about architecture and design. Throughout its 125 years, the award-winning publication has fostered readership among architecture, engineering, and design professionals by covering noteworthy and innovative projects in the United States and across the globe. The magazine offers news, commentary, criticism, architecture technology stories, and continuing education articles, both in print and online. More at <a href="http://www.architecturalrecord.com">http://www.architecturalrecord.com</a>.</p><p><b><i>About GEMS World Academy  Chicago:</i></b> <br>Opened in fall 2014, GEMS World Academy  Chicago is a private preschool to eighth grade school located in Chicagos Lakeshore East neighborhood. With a focus on world studies, STEM, and world languages, the schools mission-driven International Baccalaureate curriculum prepares students to be successful leaders beyond the school years. The academy will grow to include a comprehensive upper school. GEMS World Academy  Chicago is the first North American academy from GEMS Education  a global network of schools serving more than 200,000 students on four continents. More at <a href="http://www.gemschicago.org">www.gemschicago.org</a>.&nbsp;</p><p><b><i>About bKL Architecture:<br></i></b>bKL Architecture LLC (bKL) is a Chicago-based firm that is committed to designing projects that only enhance the contexts in which it builds, responding to the needs of clients, users and surrounding communities, while anticipating future uses and desires. Founded by Thomas Kerwin in 2010 with the support of James Loewenberg, bKL is a team of passionate designers and practitioners with expertise in a variety of markets and project types. bKL designs sophisticated, inspiring spaces and structures that are timeless yet forward-thinking. bKLs open studio environment encourages a spirited exchange of ideas. Its culturally diverse team brings together a broad range of skills, experiences and backgrounds to create a vibrant atmosphere and design process. At the center of their process is a focus on in-depth analysis, intensive experimentation and collaboration. bKLs team designs projects that only enrich sites and cities around the world in which they build. More at <a href="http://www.bklarchitecture.com">http://www.bklarchitecture.com</a>.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>                                                   </p><p># # #</p>
<p>  </p><p><i>MIT Spinoff Brings 10 Years of Research and Software Development, <br> Plus Leadership in the First On-Demand Public Pilot</i></p><p>  </p><p>CAMBRIDGE, MA., January 26, 2016  nuTonomy Inc., developer of advanced software for autonomous vehicles, today announced it has closed a $3.6M seed funding round, with investments from Signal Ventures, Samsung Ventures, Fontinalis Partners and Dr. Steven LaValle. The funding will help support nuTonomys continued work in the U.S. as well as in Singapore, where industry and government are jointly piloting autonomous vehicle technology. nuTonomys software is currently being integrated and tested by automotive partners in both the U.S. and Europe, with the goal of deploying self-driving features within the next few years.</p><p>  </p><p>nuTonomys vision is to deliver the worlds smartest autonomous vehicle and be the software engine of automated cars, said Karl Iagnemma, CEO and co-founder of nuTonomy. By applying advanced techniques from the aerospace industry, were creating a self-driving car that is safe, confident and drives in a truly human-like manner.</p><p>  </p><p>nuTonomy is pioneering a new technique for decision-making based on methods that have been used in the development of spacecraft, airplanes and other complex automated vehicles. Other approaches to automated driving, which rely on cumbersome, rigid decision-making logic, result in vehicles that frequently drive in an overly cautious, jerky and uncertain manner. </p><p>  </p><p><a>We are impressed with nuTonomys technical acumen, especially their leadership in decision-making methods for vehicles, said Amit Garg, strategic investments, Samsung Global Innovation Center. Partnering across the spectrum in the industry will be essential to turning years of research into an everyday reality. </a></p><p>  </p><p>nuTonomys founders have been researching and creating autonomous vehicle technology since 2005. The MIT-based visionaries behind nuTonomy have developed robotic technology with funding from NASA and DARPA. The two have already built and tested dozens of autonomous vehicle prototypes over the past decade. </p><p>  </p><p>Co-founder and CTO Emilio Frazzoli previously directed the first open-to-the-public pilot of on-demand automated vehicles. The pilot, which took place in Singapore in 2014, enabled more than 500 Singaporean citizens to experience an Uber-like service to request driverless transportation throughout the Jurong Lake Gardens, a central public park. That experience, led by <a href="http://smart.mit.edu/research/future-urban-mobility/future-urban-mobility.html">SMART</a> (Singapore-MIT Alliance for Research and Technology), enabled the team to prove the demand for autonomous vehicle technology in Singapore. nuTonomy has built upon this experience to develop technology for city-wide management of autonomous vehicle fleets in urban settings. </p><p>  </p><p>Autonomous vehicle technology will disrupt and redefine the future of urban mobility and transportation, said Chris Thomas, a founder and partner of Fontinalis Partners, who will join the nuTomony Board. We feel strongly that nuTomonys robust approach to decision-making will position them to be a leading player in this disruption. </p><p>  </p><p>The seed round funding included investment from:</p><p>  </p><ul><li><p>Signal Ventures, an affiliate of Signal Ventures Ltd. (lead)-- founded by Ioannis Martinos in 2015, Signal Ventures focuses on early stage investments in robotics and autonomous technology.</p></li><li><p>Fontinalis Partners  a firm solely focused on investing in and scaling technology companies that are advancing next-generation mobility </p></li><li><p>Samsung Ventures  a division of Samsung that invests in early-stage software and services innovations</p></li><li><p>Dr. Steven M. LaValle  former Chief Scientist of Oculus VR, which was acquired by Facebook; Dr. LaValle also serves as an advisor to nuTonomy.</p></li></ul><p>        </p><p><b>About nuTonomy</b></p><p>  </p><p>nuTonomy develops state-of-the-art software to enable autonomous urban driving, for use in both privately-owned vehicles and mobility as a service (i.e., autonomous taxis). nuTonomy was founded by two leaders in the autonomous vehicle space, Drs. Karl Iagnemma and Emilio Frazzoli of MIT, and employs experts in perception, motion planning, and decision-making. With PhDs from MIT, Caltech, and other leading academic institutions, nuTonomys team has developed more than a dozen autonomous vehicle prototypes that have been tested in the U.S., Singapore, and Europe. The company has offices in Cambridge, Mass. and Singapore.</p><p>  </p><p>###</p><p>  </p>
<p>FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE</p><p><b>New Dance Fitness Studio Opens to Get Central Brooklyn Adults and Kids Moving!</b>&nbsp;BROOKLYN, NY (Jan. 22<a></a>, 2016) Central Brooklyns incidence rates of obesity, diabetes and chronic health related issues are among New York Citys highest. Fit4Dance, a new dance fitness studio in the heart of Crown Heights, is hoping to change that. </p><p>Elected officials, including Brooklyn Borough President Eric Adams and 36th district Council member Robert E. Cornegy, Jr. as well as representatives from the Brooklyn Chamber of Commerce will attend the ribbon cutting ceremony to inaugurate Fit4Dances first dedicated studio on Thursday, February 4th at 6:00 p.m. at 154 Utica Avenue.</p><p>This dream of opening my own fitness studio has been three years in the making, says owner and dance enthusiast Laci Chisholm who once struggled with her weight. I was stressed, eating poorly and hated the way I looked and felt. Next came the doctors orders for Chisholm to take medication to control her high blood pressure and cholesterol. Thats when she decided to take control of her health. Through the power of dance I was able to transform my body and overall well-being, she said. Today, the Rock Hill, South Carolina native turned New York transplants weight and other vitals are well under control without the use of prescriptions.</p><p>Chisholm is hoping her health journey will motivate members of Central Brooklyn to use dance as a preventative form of exercise. Weekly studio classes will include 45 to 90 minute sessions of Zumba, Haitian dance, Yoga, and Qoya.  I want to inspire and motivate people to take control of their health and have a blast doing it!, she says.</p><p>Fit4Dance will officially open for service on Saturday, February 6th with a special grand opening event. From 8 a.m. to 2 p.m., community members will be treated to free fitness classes, giveaways and special discounts on class packages.</p><p><b>About Fit4Dance</b></p><p>Fit4Dance is a fun and effective dance fitness studio dedicated to bringing affordable instruction to adults and children in Brooklyn. Led by dance fitness enthusiast and entrepreneur Laci Chisholm, Fit4Dance currently offers weekly classes for all experience levels in styles of Zumba, Haitian dance, Yoga, etc.&nbsp;</p><p>For more information about Fit4Dance, visit&nbsp;<u><a href="http://fit4dancenyc.com">http://fit4dancenyc.com</a></u></p><p>Press Contact:</p><p>Name: Laci Chisholm</p><p>Number: 347.921.2404  &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>E-Mail: info@fit4dancenyc.com</p><p></p><p>###</p>

If yes, then it is important for you to know certain tips that can make it easy for you to complete swimming, cycling and running activities. To participate in NY Tri Expo, it is important for you to stay healthy.</p> <p> Here are few rules which beginners should follow while planning to participate in Triathlon Expo NY:</p> <p> First rule: Eat properly</p> <p> When you are preparing for the race it is vital that you focus on your diet. Eat good food and stay fit! A day before the race, start giving your body good food. In nervousness, generally people eat less and sleep less. This can affect your body mechanism. So it is advisable to eat and drink water properly. This definitely does not mean that you are allowed to carry out over eating. Include protein in your diet. Beef, fish, turkey, beans, chicken are good source of protein. Ensure you do not include sweets and sugary drinks.</p> <p> Rule #2: Don't over drink</p> <p> Water is essential to satisfy your thirst before, during and after the race. It is important that you do not drink water during nervousness. Drink water 8 minutes before you start the race. Drink water depending on your sweating.</p> <p> Third rule: Get details about transition area</p> <p> It is important to get details about swimming entrance, bike out and run out area. You should know about the placement in NY Tri Expo. Even in Triathlon workshops NY, you can get suggestions related to saving time while carrying out transition from one game to another. Once you know what the order is then it can be simple to you to move forward.</p> <p> Fourth rule: Do warm up rather than simply standing</p> <p> Take yourself to the aerobic zone. Before half an hour of the race, you need to start with the warm up sessions. Don't just stand out of nervousness. It is vital for the beginner triathlete NY to know this. Wear gloves and hood if required while carrying out warm up session. Half an hour before the race you can do elephant walk, torso twist and other exercises.</p> <p> Fifth rule: Find out smart swim methods</p> <p> It is crucial to have a look at swim course properly. Know about the turns in advance so that you are not confused during swimming. Some people also make a note of the swimming area where sun directly affects your eye. After you start swimming, take deep breaths. Panicky breaths can make swimming difficult for you. In order to avoid vertigo problem after coming out of water, you need to stand up slowly maintaining proper stability. This makes it simple to transfer from one activity to another during the <a title="Link: http://nytriexpo.com/" target="_blank" href="http://nytriexpo.com/">NY Tri Expo</a>.</p> <p> Drink and eat smartly during the transition period.</p>  <br>

It protects the ownership of the tagline, logo, name or any mark that you use to identify a business's services and products. There are some reasons that you need to know to register mark when you créer sa marque in order to protect it.</b></p> <p> <b>#1 Notice</b></p> <p> <b>Get notice of ownership with registration of marque déposée. This is certainly not the most compelling reason to register the business mark. Third party cannot use your mark if you carry out registration process aptly. Thus this will put on notice that same or identical use of the mark can lead to infringement. Third party will be compelled to look out for some another trademark. Prevent conflicts by registering trademark.</b></p> <p> <b>#2 Social media</b></p> <p> <b>Social media is known to be a vital resource for a number of businesses. Clients search for the brand names on many social media websites such as Twitter, Facebook and the rest. In order to protect against improper activities each and every social media website adopts certain policies. Unluckily, the practice of an individual or people improperly using another firms name or even brand on the social medial for financial gain is certainly not uncommon. Majority of the time social media account may get suspended by carrying out such wrong practices.</b></p> <p> <b>It is important on your part to check out the policies drafted by social media websites. At the time you complain to the social media website about the wrongdoing and claim another person using the brand without your consent, then the administrator would ask you for the proof of the ownership of the mark when you créer sa marque. A mark registration provides compelling proof to the administrator for brand ownership.</b></p> <p> <b>#3 Brand loyalty</b></p> <p> <b>Show your brand commitment with registration of mark and let customers know about your work commitment. The goodwill can certainly be developed by such commitment and this invaluable to the business.</b></p> <p> <b>#4 Cyber squatting</b></p> <p> <b>Cyber squatting register domain names identical or even similar to the different parties' marks or even the brands having sole purpose to sell them for a higher fee. With Anti-cyber squatting Consumer Protection Act you can find it easy to protect your park and sue the third party.</b></p> <p> <b>Fifth point  Renewals of mark</b></p> <p> <b><a target="_blank" href="http://marques.expert/">recherche marque déposée</a> and registration can continue as long as you use the mark. Certain marks which are quiet old are already registered by certain companies. The mark registration might not be for every business when you créer sa marque. There are a number of reasons to protect the brand just when you protect the business asset. This mark is extremely important and it is your business brand, its identifier. It is very crucial to protect the business mark by registering it at the right time.</b></p>  <br><br><br>

<p>Novello Theatre London is situated at 5 Aldwych, London, WC2B 4LD and currently running the houseful shows of Mamma Mia! The venue is immensely popular amongst the theatre lovers, tourists and local visitors as some of the finest restaurants and bars are located here. Try Cellar Door, which is a cabaret bar located adjacent to the theatre is an immensely popular venue. Some other popular tourist spots are The National Portrait Gallery, National Gallery and Covent Garden.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>The magnificent <b><a href="http://novello.london-theatretickets.com/" title="Link: http://novello.london-theatretickets.com/">Novello Theatre</a></b> is positioned at an accessible location and can be commuted via various modes of transportation such as buses, tubes, cars and taxis. You can visit the theatre via bus route numbers 1, 4, 11, 13, 15, 68 and 98. The theatre has an occupancy of 1000 and spread across four levels as Stalls, Dress Circle, Grand Circle and Balcony.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>For those who are looking for best viewing seats must go for Stalls section. The stunning theatre is finely constructed in traditional Victorian style having classical façade. The theatre looks tall and thin and dates back to 1905. It was opened as Waldorf theatre and twin to Aldwych Theatre. For disabled patrons and carers, theatre offers discounted tickets. The auditorium has a Sennheiser infrared system in the auditorium.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>The Novello Theatre is currently running the blockbuster London show, Mamma Mia with packed houses. The juke box musical is regarded as one of the long runner shows of London West end and has been enjoyed by millions of fans across the globe. <b>FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE</b><br><br>Michael McDonald and David Sanborn join forces with producer/drummer Mike Mesey and guitarist Steve Scorfina for new version of "Johnny B. Goode," featuring original piano track by the late Johnnie Johnson<br><br>&nbsp;<br><br>ST. LOUIS, MO  New life has been breathed into one of the most iconic rock and roll songs of all time  Chuck Berry's "Johnny B. Goode"  featuring some serious star-power, including a previously unreleased piano track by the song's inspiration, Johnnie Johnson, as well as Grammy-winners Michael McDonald and David Sanborn.<br><br>The story of this new version of "Johnny B. Goode," recorded in New York, St. Louis and Los Angeles, goes back a few years to when drummer/producer Mike Mesey, who played and toured with Head East, Chuck Berry, and Johnson, asked Johnson to play piano on a recording of "Johnny B. Goode." Johnson was happy and excited to oblige, providing the only studio recording of him ever playing the song. Years after Johnson's death in 2005, Mesey heard a lap steel guitar performance by Steve Scorfina, formerly of Pavlov's Dog and REO Speedwagon, and immediately thought of Johnson's piano tracks. Scorfina recorded for the song on a 1934 Rickenbacker lap steel  regarded as the first electric guitar.<br><br>After recording his lap steel tracks, Scorfina suggested contacting his childhood friend and former Majestics band mate from Ferguson, Mo., five-time Grammy winner Michael McDonald, about recording a vocal track. McDonald, a fan of both Berry and Johnson, liked the project and obliged by recording amazing vocals. Another St. Louis native, saxophone legend David Sanborn, lent his talents to the recording as well; and Jimmy Vivino, longtime music director for the Conan O'Brien band agreed to record additional guitar tracks.<br><br>During discussions about how to proceed with the new "Johnny B. Goode" recording, the conversation shifted to using the song to help raise funds for a new rock documentary, "Johnnie Be Good," about Johnnie Johnson's life, produced by Art Holliday and including interviews with McDonald, Sanborn and Vivino, as well as a "who's who" of rock music including: Keith Richards, Eric Clapton, Bob Weir, the late Bo Diddley, Bonnie Raitt, John Sebastian, Joe Perry, Dr. John, Buddy Guy, film director Taylor Hackford, Bruce Hornsby, former Late Show band leader Paul Shaffer, Rolling Stones keyboardist Chuck Leavell, The Kentucky Headhunters, actor Malcolm<br>McDowell, Oscar-winner Lou Gossett, Jr., Eddie Money and Conan O'Brien band members Jimmy Mike Merritt, and James Wormworth.<br><br>The new version of "Johnny B. Goode" was officially released for download on October 18, 2015 in honor of Chuck Berry's birthday and is available on 25 websites including: <br><br> &nbsp; &nbsp;ITUNES: <a href="https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/johnny-b.-goode-feat.-michael/id1046734481">https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/johnny-b.-goode-feat.-michael/id1046734481</a><br> &nbsp; &nbsp;CD BABY: <a href="https://www.cdbaby.com/cd/meseyscorfinafeaturingmi">https://www.cdbaby.com/cd/meseyscorfinafeaturingmi</a><br> &nbsp; &nbsp;AMAZON: <a href="http://www.amazon.com/Michael--?McDonald--?%20Johnnie--?Johnson--?Sanborn/dp/B0168LQFX0.">http://www.amazon.com/Michael--?McDonald--?%20Johnnie--?Johnson--?Sanborn/dp/B0168LQFX0.</a><br><br>Preview song <a target="_blank" href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/dmusic/get_sample_url.html/ref=dm_dp_trk_B0168LQHC4?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B0168LQHC4&amp;DownloadLocation=WEBSITE">http://www.amazon.com/gp/dmusic/get_sample_url.html/ref=dm_dp_trk_B0168LQHC4?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B0168LQHC4&amp;DownloadLocation=WEBSITE</a>.<br><br>Track sales proceeds will help fund the release of the upcoming "Johnnie Be Good" documentary. The new "Johnny B. Goode" recording is written by Chuck Berry, produced by Michael Mesey, performed by Mesey/Scorfina, and features Michael McDonald (courtesy of Chonin Records ), Johnnie Johnson, and David Sanborn. Special guest artists include Jimmy Vivino, Dona Oxford (vocals), Leslie Craig (vocals), Greg Hulub (bass), and Dan Duncan (congas).<br><br>The film's anticipated release is scheduled to be announced this year. Links to the movie trailer can be found at <a href="http://JJTheMovie.com">http://JJTheMovie.com</a>.<br><br><br><b># # #</b><br><br><br>For more information, or to arrange an interview, please contact the following:<br><br>Amy Burger<br>Amy Burger Strategic Communications<br>314-265-1372<br>amy@amyburger.com<br><a href="http://www.amyburger.com">www.amyburger.com</a><br><br>Mike Mesey<br>michael@slikmusic.com<br><br>Rachel Matthews<br>MM Entertainment Publicity<br>800-891-3990 ext. 709<br>rmatthews@craytoncorp.com<br><a href="http://www.mmep.co.uk">www.mmep.co.uk</a><br>&nbsp;<br>Jessica Christman<br>825 Studios<br>816-561-1622<br>jchristman@craytoncorp.com<br><a href="http://www.825studios.com">www.825studios.com</a><br><br><br><div data-url="https://robin8.com/#releases" style="display:none;" id="link64_adl_tabid">700</div>

You can use this water for cooking, washing, bathing, cleaning vessels, floor and lot more. There are lots of things for which you can use it.<br><br>There are times when you take this for granted. But it is always essential that you look after these heaters. You will thus never have to take a cold shower or find a problem in cleaning the house. One of the way through which you can maintain is through investing in water heater repair service NJ.<br><br>How will you recognize when you will require plumber New Jersey services?<br>The foremost step for knowing when your system requires repair is to understand the working of the system. See that you do not have fluctuating energy bills. There should be no leakage in plumbing systems and the heater also. The system should not have any impact on the faucets or the appliance sin the house. At the time these things take place you need to know that you will require <a target="_blank" href="http://allweekplumbing.com/"><b>emergency plumber NJ</b></a>.<br><br><b>Should have consistent energy bills?</b> <br></p><p>At the time your water heater system is working in the proper condition it will be able to offer consistent bill of energy. If it is running continuously then some power will always be needed to make sure it runs effectively. The system might consume more power especially when it needs repairs. If you come across higher energy bills then be sure that it is because of the water heater. It is then you will have to look for the water heater repair service NJ.<br><br>If the water is flowing properly but then is not warm then it is certain that the heater needs repairs and has to be restored. To avoid all the many issues it is essential for you to know whether the water is getting heated or not. In case you notice this then you will have to call plumber New Jersey to help you for maintaining the system well.<br><br><b>One of the significant thing is that heater should not leak.</b></p><p> In case you have issue with leaky heater it can be a small or a serious issue. In this case you can assume that the water seals might have worn out and this can sometimes be dangerous. At the time you notice leak it is the sign that you need to call plumber North NJ.<br>In all such cases you can be sure that hiring water heater repair professionals or replacement technicians will be necessary. Only one thing that you need to make sure is that you hire a good repair services.<br></p><br><br><br><br><br><br>

WASHINGTON, Jan. 25, 2016&nbsp; The Advanced Television Systems Committee (ATSC) Board of Directors has elected industry veteran Richard Friedel of FOX Networks as ATSC Board Chairman for 2016.<br><br>Friedel is the Executive Vice President and General Manager for FOX Networks Engineering &amp; Operations. He oversees long-term technology strategy and day-to-day operations for the Fox Network Center in Los Angeles and the Fox Houston Technical Operations Center, home of Fox Sports regional networks, and provides technical support for 14 regional production centers. Before joining FOX, Friedel served in various positions at Capital Cities/ABC, NBC News and local television stations.<br><br>He is a fellow of the Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers and a member of the Audio Engineering Society, Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers, Society of Broadcast Engineers and Society of Cable Television Engineers. In addition to his ATSC responsibilities, he serves as President of the Video Services Forum and is a member of the North American Broadcasters Association Board of Directors.<br><br>Friedel was honored by the National Association of Broadcasters with the 2015 NAB Engineer-ing Achievement Award, bestowed to individuals nominated by their peers for significant contributions to advancing the state of the art in broadcast engineering.<br><br>Richard has been an active and insightful member of the ATSC board, and his leadership will be critical during this important year as the next-generation ATSC 3.0 broadcast standard is finalized, said ATSC President Mark Richer, who also thanked outgoing Board Chairman Glenn Reitmeier of NBC Universal for his service. Reitmeier, who has served three terms as ATSC Chairman, continues on the board.<br><br>The Advanced Television Systems Committee is defining the future of television with the ATSC 3.0 next-generation broadcast standard.&nbsp; &nbsp;ATSC is an international, non-profit organization developing voluntary standards for digital television. The ATSCs&nbsp;150-plus&nbsp;member organizations represent the broadcast, broadcast equipment, motion picture, consumer electronics, computer, cable, satellite, and semiconductor industries.&nbsp;For more information visit&nbsp;<a href="http://www.atsc.org">www.atsc.org</a>.

Matthews, NC  January 26, 2016  With thousands of homes affected by the weekend power outages across the eastern half of the U.S., the SmartCharge Light may be the ideal lighting source for future emergencies.<br><br>SmartCharge Light is preparing its second-generation of energy efficient LED Light Bulbs for shipment later this spring, with initial samples already in hand. The second-generation product builds on the success with the SmartCharge Light, the worlds only light bulb with Switch and Grid Sensor technology that enables the switch to operate normally (on/ off) even when the power is out. And it provides up to four hours of backup light thanks to a built-in battery.<br><br>Significant improvements are coming for SmartCharge 2.0. Nearly twice as bright at 650 lumens as the original SmartCharge light bulb, SmartCharge 2.0 will also carry a lower suggested retail price less than $25. With the 2.0 version of SmartCharge, one wall switch can now control multiple bulbs on a circuit, explains Shaliendra Suman, CEO of SmartCharge Light parent company TVL International, a Matthews, North Carolina leader in intelligent connected devices. The bulb works on all supply voltages between 110V and 240V, so it can be used in any country in the world. The consumer can also put the bulb in charge-only mode, where the back-up battery is recharged without the bulb being lit.<br><br>Were now operating a crowdfunding campaign on IndieGoGo to raise the $50,000 needed to put the product into mass production, and were very pleased with initial reaction to our second generation SmartCharge product, Suman said. SmartCharge has applicable UL, CE, FCC and ROHS certifications and the company is looking for distributors all over the world. A limited number of samples are available for distributors to test.<br><br>The SmartCharge LED Bulb looks like a normal light bulb from the outside, but it has technology built inside to enable wall switch control of the lights even when the power is out with no extra wiring required. SmartCharge lets the consumer have light during a power outage when its needed such as during the recent winter storm in the eastern part of the United Stated and also conserve battery power to extend the time that light from the SmartCharge Bulb is available.<br><br>The heart of the SmartCharge Bulb is the patent-pending Grid &amp; Switch Sensor technology, which is able to distinguish between a loss of power due to opening of the line switch and a loss of power from a grid failure.<br><br>TVL shipped more than 8,000 first-generation SmartCharge Light Bulbs to customers in more than 30 countries and last November in California, the SmartCharge won the National Sustainability Award in the Cleantech Open Global Forum  the worlds largest accelerator of early-stage clean-technology companies. Find more information at <a href="http://www.SmartChargeLight.com">www.SmartChargeLight.com</a>.

<div>'Los Angeles, CA- <i>Last year the 25-year-old hit headlines after turning down millions to sell the formulas to his products, now he has officially inked a deal with a new company, &nbsp;and is officially turning over his formulas.</i><br></div><div><i><br></i></div><div>Originally approached to sell his formulas last year, the college student turned down multiple offers from major companies,<a href="http://www.reuters.com/article/idUSnGNX9dLBlv+1cc+GNW20150330" target="_blank"> and his decision hit headlines turning heads around the world. </a>Now Ryan Zamo, &nbsp;the 26-year-old CEO of Z Skin Cosmetics, has officially signed a deal with a new philanthropy style company in Africa to sell his formulas.</div><div><br></div><div>The companies that first offered Zamo deals last year may be giants compared to ' Coca Vita', the new company which has acquired the globally selling skincare formulas, &nbsp;the young entrepreneur commented, "They have a mission statement to help local Kenyans. Coco Vita is trying to help the local coconut farmers, build schools for the children, and breathe life into the ailing local economy. So it's not a company just using my successful products to expand their wallets, but its going to help a really great cause, and that in itself is why I started my business; to help people."</div><div><br></div><div><a href="http://www.zskincosmetics.com/#!welcome/lzx57" target="_blank">Z Skin Cosmetic</a>s was originally started to help Ryan Zamo win his battle over acne. He quoted "I honestly just started making skincare because I was tired of trying everything under the sun and seeing absolutely nothing happening to my skin. I never thought I would have a successful business from it, but my goal became helping others the way I wish someone would have helped me when I needed it, and thats why I took the deal with Coco Vita and not the previous companies." <br></div><div><br></div><div>For more information on Z Skin Cosmetics, visit: <a href="http://www.zskincosmetics.com/#!welcome/lzx57" title="Link: http://www.zskincosmetics.com/#!welcome/lzx57">http://www.zskincosmetics.com/#!welcome/lzx57</a></div><div><br></div><div>Contact:</div><div>Ryan Zamo</div><div>CEO &nbsp;Z Skin Cosmetics</div><div>Ryan@zskincosmetics.com</div><div>9738518573&nbsp;</div><div><br></div>
<p>&nbsp;San Jose, CA  January 30, 2016  1World Online has started off 2016 by initiating full deployment of its platform 2.0 release. What had started as a feed of user polls has now evolved into a multi-purpose solution for data and advertising. The platform, now updated to display a full overview of user engagement metrics, now also supports advertising for businesses- either through their own provider or through 1Worlds selection of leading advertising networks.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>1Worlds poll, quiz, survey, and debate tools can all be advertising-enabled and the interactive units themselves can be sponsored material. Of these units, 1Worlds Sponsored Quizzes has generated the most interest amongst partners. With existing quizzes gaining tens of thousands of completions in the span of a week alone, the advertising potential for brands through this new form of native advertising surpasses that of any other existing solution in the market. </p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Quizzes are a natural fit for sponsorship. As pieces of standalone content, quizzes are already one of the most popular items on social media. When coupled with brands or advertisers, quizzes are still fun for the user, but have the added benefit of generating quality data and leads says Alex Fedosseev, the CEO of 1World. </p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Embracing its user-generated roots, the platforms polling unit also allows for unregistered audiences to submit their own questions via the unit itself. Multiple 1World media partners, for an example, have integrated this feature into their articles- allowing for increased user engagement and time on site.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>The data analytics portion of this platform update is what provides the link between data and advertising. Data collected through each unit engagement is processed to serve up personalized ads to each user, based on their responses. Through this, brands are abled to have better targeted ads and audience members become more relevant- becoming a whole new approach to hyper-targeted advertising. An ever-occurring issue in advertising now has a simple and obvious solution.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>                                           </p><p>As 1Worlds platform continues to progress, the company has also continued to expand its global presence. 1World now has offices present in North America, Latin America, Eastern Europe, Southeastern Asia, and India, which are all generating momentum in new language integrations and localized partnership agreements. For the past 6 months, the company has received a rate of one million new users per quarter and has now reached the milestone of 5 million users worldwide. </p>
