<p>In India, we are struggling with double burden of malnutrition and childhood obesity. Malnutrition remains a silent emergency, for which the Government of India has made significant progress in the past several years by implementing schemes like Integrated Child Development Services (ICDS) and Mid Day Meal (MDM) and on the other side the rates of overweight and obesity are also steadily increasing. Many factors like urbanization, and changing dietary patterns and lifestyles, are causing the rate of obesity and overweight to increase within the school children. Approximately 20% school children are obese in India. Obesity related conditions such as sleep apnea, heart diseases , high blood pressure and diabetes are estimated to cost the Indian economy $ 200 billion because of hospitalizations, prescription medications and paying a premium on their insurance from 2005- 2015 which is presumed to grow more sharply in coming years.</p><p>To deal with increasing obesity among children, a government-appointed committee which has suggested few measures including ban on sale of junk food in and around schools. The Committee on Consumption of Junk Food by School Children, set up by the Women and Child Development Ministry, has suggested a comprehensive definition of junk food in the context of children and that all such food items should be banned in school canteens. Many schools all over India have stopped sale of junk food in their canteens after a circular issued by the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) warned against food high on fat, sugar and salt (HFSS).</p><p>The committee recommended:</p><ul><li>Most common junk foods that are high in fat, salt and sugar (HFSS) such as chips, fried foods, sugar sweetened carbonated beverages, sugar sweetened non-carbonated beverages, ready-to-eat noodles, pizzas, burgers, potato fries and confectionery items should be restricted in schools and 200 meters nearby.</li><li>Advertisement and promotion of such foods targeted at children is to be regulated through a framework that includes all types of media, celebrity endorsements and promotional activities.</li><li>A canteen policy should be implemented based on color coding. Green category foods -- the healthy food options -- should constitute about 80 per cent of available foods. Red category of select most common junk foods that are high in fat, salt and sugar should not be sold or served in schools. Suggested, healthy menu options should include fruit salad, fruits, paneer / vegetable cutlets, khandvi, poha, uthapam, upma, idlis and kathi rolls, low fat milk shakes with seasonal fruits and no added sugar, fresh fruit juice and smoothies with fruits, fresh lime soda, badam milk, lassi etc.</li><li>The Food Safety and Standards Authority of India (FSSAI) should fix limits of unhealthy ingredients such as transfats to 5 per cent at the earliest.</li><li>Labelling regulations must be strengthened by the FSSAI to enable complete and transparent information on the amount of fat, salt and sugar with reference to recommended daily allowed limits.</li><li>Schools should promote nutrition education and awareness for children. A well-structured curriculum on balanced diet and its health impacts should be introduced.</li></ul><p>All school children spend maximum of their productive time every day in the school. The school environment has a significant impact on the development of eating habits and health of the children and influence majorly on health promoting behaviours. School canteens are an important influence on children's diets as children frequently eat whatever is available in the school canteen on school days. As a result, the food products sold in canteens may directly influence as well as have an impact on school performance through children's energy levels and ability to concentrate.</p><p>To promote the nutritional education and awareness for school children, SHARP NGO initiated a unique and innovative School Health &amp; Nutrition Education Program that aims to inculcate healthy habits among children through increased health literacy. The program named as MHMH (My health in my hands) invokes a sense of responsibility among school children to take ownership of their nutritional health.</p><p>Under this project, health check-up is conducted for all the students and the collected health data will be stored at the SHARP repository. It is updated regularly by follow-up check-ups. The children are given 'SHARP Health &amp; Nutrition Card' with unique ID number after the health screening.</p><p>"My Health in My Hands" program is an attempt to inculcate healthy habits among school children through increased health literacy. In this program children are made aware about the importance of eating balanced diet, getting healthy tiffin box in school and health hazards associated with the consumption of junk food. Children were also educated on the need to have safe and clean environment in canteen to ensure the safety of food which they are consuming. To provide a learning environment for this activity, children were encouraged to conductCanteen audits in their own school to inspect the quality of food served and the type of safety and hygiene measures practised in canteen. While conducting these audits, children inspected various aspects of safety and hygiene practised by canteen personnel while preparing, storing and serving food like cleanliness of cooking, storage and serving area, their personal hygiene, freshness of raw products used in food preparation, cleanliness of utensils used. On the one hand this activity gave children a deep understanding of the concern, on the other hand it alsoencouraged schools to maintain canteen in accordance with CBSE guidelines.</p><p>The program culmination will happen with exciting intra and inter school competitions like group discussions, quizzes, extempore and poster competition. The Final inter school championship will have short film competition and a skit competition among participating schools.</p><p>Dr.Puran Prakash, Gen Secy of SHARP NGO said, "MHMH program was really appreciated by the school authorities and parents for its holistic approach towards health and well being of children. By making children track their daily food intake for a period of 3 months, the program attempted 'habit formation' along with awareness. Children too enjoyed the awareness activities and what they like the most about this program, was their dual role of learners and campaigners. Looking at program's impact and acceptance with schools, we plan to make it PAN India from next academic session."</p><p>The program was rolled out in Aug'2015 in few private schools of Delhi and NCR namely Ryan International School, DLF Public School, N K Bagrodia School, Summer Fields School, Bal Bharti Public School, St. Paul's school and many more.</p><p>Notes to Editor</p><p>School Health Annual Report Programme (SHARP) is India's largest school health network which is helping companies to fulfill the corporate social responsibility. SHARP is a non-govt. organization (NGO) with scientifically planned health programme for school children, professionally managed under the guidance of eminent medical experts, sociologists, educationist, psychologists, nutritional specialists and others who have vision of promoting healthcare of children throughout the third world countries. The programme is unique in being the first programme to computerize and place health records of children on the internet. The programme's innovative approach has made it the most popular school health programme in the country with more than a million children across all sections of the society taking benefit out of it through its various projects.</p><p>SHARP has a holistic and comprehensive approach which is spread in a wide geographical area, caters to various stakeholders and provides eminent services to uplift and empower the society to bring it on the path of sustainable development which can strengthen future of our Nation" For more details, please log on to our website: <a href="http://www.schoolindia.org">www.schoolindia.org</a>.</p><p><br></p>
<p><b>Tickets on Sale Now for 2016 Dallas ADDYs<br> <br> </b><b></b></p><p>Dallas, Texas<b> </b>(Jan. 28, 2015)  The American Advertising Federation Dallas Chapter (<a href="http://aafdallas.org/">AAF Dallas</a>) is pleased to announce Corby Davidson as the celebrity host for the 54th Annual AAF Dallas American Advertising Awards, more commonly referred to as The ADDYs. Corby Davidson is co-host of DFWs most popular drive time show, <i>The Hardline </i>with Mike Rhyner on sports radio station KTCK (AM) 1310 and 96.7 (FM) The Ticket in Dallas. </p><p>Taking a cue from the increasingly popular Fantasy Football movement, AAF has selected Fantasy Advertising as the theme. Each award entry was automatically entered into the AAF Dallas draft. Each agency participating in the awards will create a team and scout players  creative directors, art directors, copywriters and flex players  on the draft board. Results will stream live at the awards show in February.</p><p>When Moroch presented AAF Dallas with this years ADDYs theme Fantasy Advertising, we knew it would make perfect sense to have local sports royalty, Corby Davidson from North Texas favorite radio show serve as our host, says Jason Dove president of AAF Dallas. This year we are making history with a record-breaking amount of entries of more than 950 and cannot wait to see who will win big. This is the one time of year that we get to showcase the impressive creative advertising work that Dallas agencies are doing.</p><p>More than 950 entries were submitted this year from more than 70 Dallas advertising agencies, which were judged by Stephen Cargile, principal creative designer <a href="https://thewaltdisneycompany.com" title="Link: https://thewaltdisneycompany.com">Walt Disney</a>; Eunie Kwon, interactive design director, <a href="https://www.mirumagency.com/san-diego">Mirum</a>; and Marcelo Padoca, creative director at <a href="http://lacomunidad.com">The Community</a>.</p><p>The ADDYs Gala will be held Feb.18, 2016 beginning at 6:00 p.m. until 11:30 p.m., at Gas Monkey Live located at 10110 Technology Blvd E, Dallas, TX 75220. This event is expected to sell out  tickets are on sale now and start at $125. For more information and to purchase tickets, please visit <a href="http://www.aafdallas.org" title="Link: http://www.aafdallas.org">aafdallas.org</a>.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><b>About AAF Dallas</b></p><p>Founded in 1908, <a href="http://www.aafdallas.org">AAF Dallas</a> is nearly 1,000 members strong and is affiliated with the <a href="http://www.aaf10.org">10th District of the American Advertising Federation</a>, part of <a href="http://www.aaf.org">AAF</a>s national network of more than 200 ad clubs and 40,000 professionals. AAF Dallas, AAFs 2010-2011 Division 1 Club of the Year, strives to elevate the success of the advertising community through innovation, creative excellence, collaboration, professional development, education and philanthropic endeavors. <p>Oil traders were in for a crazy ride today. It was trading steadly when around mid-Europe the oilprices started rising. Lets look at what happened event by event </p><p><br></p><p><b>1 - Baker Hughes Trigger</b></p><p>The first bullish trigger came from the Baker Hughes report, which said oil rigs across the globe could fall by 30% in 2016. Prices rallied and understandably so!</p><p>The Basic economic law is at work here:&nbsp;Oil prices fall&nbsp;= rigs run into losses and close down = supply drops = prices recover</p><p>So the resulting uptick was normal.</p><p><br></p><p><b>2 - Markets are irrational, always have and always will be</b></p><p>What followed later was an erratic short squeeze - When the sentiment is extremely bearish even the most out of the world news is enough to trigger a correction.</p><p>There was increase in press speculation that&nbsp;'Saudi Arabia was in favor of 5% production cut by all major producers'.</p><p>The news came through from the Russian oil minister, who also said a meeting would be scheduled on Tuesday.</p><p>And boom!&nbsp;prices rallied -&nbsp;Brent rose to a three-week high and WTI oil rose to a 2-1/2 week high.</p><p>But </p><p><b>3 - New player in the game: One does not simply expect OPEC too wait-and-watch</b></p><p>Within an hour Reuters, Bloomberg, and Dow Jones were out to spoil the Oil bull party &nbsp;OPEC rejected joint production cut, sources said&nbsp;Iran wont accept production cut and the Russian minister was caught saying that 'it would be too early to talk about a joint effort'.</p><p>And thus oil prices fell back to levels seen after Baker Hughes news was priced-in by the markets.</p><p>This is clearly an irrational  Iran would never agree for production cut, Bringing US, Canada, Russia, OPEC  Saudi and Iran all on the same page is as good as climbing Mount Everest daily.<br></p><p><br></p><p>Later, we witnessed a short squeeze. Smart traders went in and got out quickly..like a hot shower bath.</p><p>If oil prices rally above the falling trendline on the technical charts, a move towards $37 is likely</p>

In the past 12 months, the company donated $1 million and 50,000 pieces of jewelry while working with over 1,000 local and national organizations. What Matters to You, Matters to Us. Learn more at <a href="http://www.KendraScott.com">www.KendraScott.com</a>.</p><p>&nbsp;###</p><p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;  </p><p><b>Media Contact</b></p><p>Katie Mudd</p><p>TrizCom PR</p><p>Office: 972-247-1369</p><p>Cell: 214-676-4254</p><p>                                                              </p><p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>Do you find <a href="http://www.mofain.com/">hair weavings</a> to be dull and without vitality? Do you feel fed up with its look? Fortunately, there are a number of options that can help you to restore and rejuvenate the look and feel of your hair. Read through this article to learn how changing your hair can help change your life forever, and for the better.<br></p><p>For minimizing breakage, be sure that your hair is completely wet prior to applying shampoo. Don't use any more than about a quarter-size dollop. Then proceed to rub the shampoo in between your palms to start with. Be sure to lather up for no more than 30 seconds or so.<br></p><p>While a pony tail is an easy way to style your hair when you don't have a lot of time, it's best not to style your hair this way, too often. Keeping your hair pulled back with a hair tie can lead to hair loss and damage. Be sure to change up the way you style your hair.</p><p>When you are getting ready to wash your hair with shampoo, make sure that you rinse it out thoroughly before you apply the shampoo. This will remove any residue, such as dirt and dust that your hair may have accumulated. You will get more cleansing power from your shampoo by doing this.</p><p>To get the best looking <b>clip in hair extensions</b> possible, consider using a leave-in conditioner. These conditioners give you the amazing effects that you typically associate with normal conditioner, but the effects last all day long! You'll find leave-in conditioners at your local drug store or salon, in either, lotion or spray-on form.</p><p>If you happen to suffer from a flaky scalp, try using this treatment bi-weekly: Start sectioning your hair and do a gentle rubbing on your scalp using a rubbing alcohol-saturated cotton pad. Once the alcohol dries, start brushing your hair. Finish with a thorough rinse using warm water, and be sure not to shampoo.</p><p>During the summer months, it's crucial that you put extra effort into caring for your hair. Always take the time to wash your hair after swimming or spending time in the sun. It's also a good idea to keep your hair covered with a bandanna or a loose cap, if you plan on being out all day.</p><p>Do not use any settings on your blow dryer that dry your hair with heat. Heat is very damaging to your hair, especially in an effort to dry your hair quickly. Use the cool setting, and dry your hair in a healthy manner. Doing this daily can make a big difference.</p><p>When you finish bathing, skip the blow dryer. Air drying your hair encourages volume and discourages frizz. If you must use a blow dryer, consider using it on the cool setting to encourage the sheath of your hair strands to lay down. This encourages the illusion of shine and is better for your hair than heat.</p><p>Get a haircut every six to nine weeks to keep your hair looking its best. Over time, your hair will break and the ends will split. This creates uneven layers that make your hair look unhealthy and dull. Getting frequent haircuts will help to keep the ends from splitting all the way up to the roots, and help keep your hair shinier and healthier.</p><p>Natural <b>remy human hair weavings </b>brushes are the best choice when it comes to brushes for your hair. The bristles are softer and will flex more. The flexible brushes will cause less damage than using a brush that has stiff, plastic bristles on it. Be sure to choose one that also has smooth tips on it.<b></b></p><p>Hair products that you use to make your hair look nice can be doing more damage than you think. As you choose your products, avoid the ones that contain any alcohol. The alcohol will dry your hair out quickly. These products could also dry out your scalp, so avoid any contact with the scalp.</p><p>Always use a great conditioner. When you use a good conditioner, it moisturizes and protects your hair, and adds a lovely shine. When applying conditioner, spread it throughout your hair evenly, but try to avoid the roots if you have particularly oil hair. Always rinse it out thoroughly, as any residue left in your hair will leave it looking dull.</p><p>When split ends become a problem, the only rational thing for you to do, is face reality and trim them off. Although there are products and processes that can allegedly fix split ends, they are temporary solutions at best. Using a harsh product to tame split ends will only damage your hair further. The sooner you can bring yourself to trim your split ends, the faster you can get back to your ideal hair.</p><p>Stay away from over-brushing or over-combing your hair. Also, do not run your fingers through your hair too often. All of these things can damage fragile hair and even, make your hair fall out. Just brush, comb or finger-comb your hair, when it is absolutely necessary for you to do so.</p><p>For the best hair possible, add massaging your scalp into your weekly routine. Massaging your scalp can loosen up and clear out dandruff and increase circulation to your head for optimum hair growth! This does not need to be done daily to be effective, once a week is enough to see great results.</p><p>Hopefully, this gave you the advice you needed and it was easy to follow. You can now use this in your day-to-day routine. Apply some of the things that you've learned here, and notice a positive change to the look and feel of <a href="http://www.mofain.com/">cheap hair weft</a>.</p><p><b>Hair extension</b> is an advanced hair improvement technique that is nowadays used to convert the hair drastically without looking unrealistic. <a href="http://www.mofain.com/">Mofain Hair</a> is a famous online brand and provides you with the service that is found nowhere else. It is highly recommended to all to buy all hair related products from this company which will blow your mind, provide what you desire for and will prove itself through the best results. <br><br><b>Mofain</b> have many different kinds of hair extensions in stock which includes all types of clips in or tape on hair extension, hair weft extension, fusion, micro rings, lace fronts and hair weave. The company also offers 100% money back guaranty. So, you should try their products at least once and look amazing. For more details, please visit: <a href="http://www.mofain.com">http://www.mofain.com</a> .<br></p><br><br><br><br><br><br><br>

<p></p><p>  <p>College or school is the place where you should study; but the students are young and they want more from life than of obtaining knowledge. It doesnt matter how much the student loves a subject, they should learn how to manage the time in a way that they will get both study and have fun. As all kinds of academic papers writing is a very important and it is a time-consuming part of college life, students can make the things easier for themselves by learning how to do this task in a most efficient manner. There are some tricks to write the essays faster which are provided below by the <a href="http://cheapessaywritingservice.us/">cheap essay writing service</a>, and students can learn and accept them if they want. </p>  <ul><li>Spend 10% of the time on planning. </li></ul>  <p>Its an essential thing; do not rush into writing task without proper preparation. If the person is doing like this then, thought will be jumbled and quality of the writing work will fall dramatically. So that dedicate 10 % of time to planning. Ensure that you start writing with a right mindset and you will not miss any important points. Cheap essay writing service also planning before getting into writing.</p>  <ul><li>Always write outline for the work. </li></ul>  <p>Next crucial point of writing a high quality of essay is preparing a detailed outline about the topic. If this task is managed well then essay will be very easy to write because you only need to expand the main points. &nbsp;</p>  <ul><li>Think about supportive arguments in advance. </li></ul>  <p>The arguments details may not be used.&nbsp; It will be using to support your point of view in outline, but you definitely have to think about them in advance. Or else, you will waste a lot of time while you are writing every point by brainstorming. This advance planning will prevent you from this. And you will be keeping all the important parts in mind and your essay will end up with every required points. This will also interfere your time planning. You may be forced to pay less attention because it is necessary to end the essay in a hurry before the deadline.</p>  <ul><li>Write in easy to understand language. </li></ul>  <p>This will be easier for both reader and writer. Complex phrases can be used to prove some point. However the general rule of academic writing is keep your writing as simple as possible.</p>  <ul><li>Keep the essay summary shorter. </li></ul>  <p>It is not necessary to reiterate every point and the argument in summary. It is suffice to restate main idea and make conclusion about the topic. Students can refer cheap essay writing service for more help.</p>  <p>&nbsp;</p>  </p><br>

<p>Fantôme Magazine (formerly Prysm) Black woman-owned alternative publication is an inclusive space for like minds regardless of race, ethnicity, gender or creed.</p><p>Lithonia, Georgia (January, 2016)  Founded in 2011 by Editor-in-Chief and Creative Director Adaora Ngozi Onyioha Osimiri-Lewis, Fantôme&nbsp;is an art and culture magazine that focuses on the darker side of artistic expression. With a tagline that boasts, Where darkness meets decadence, the publication has set out to represent both the alternative subculture (industrial, goth, punk, metal, etc) and avant garde sensibilities through their coverage of fashion, film, music, and other forms of art. </p><p>As a multi-ethnic American whose roots are Nigerian and Cherokee Indian, Adaoras greater mission above and beyond covering the underground scene is to bring awareness to the diversity of the alt scene nationally and internationally by showcasing people of various backgrounds who serve not only as fans but also creative forces.</p><p>To date, Prysm Magazine has released 7 issues. Under the new name of Fantôme, the publication is slated for a new release Spring 2016.</p><p><br></p><p>	</p><p>ABOUT ADAORA NGOZI ONYIOHA OSIMIRI-LEWIS:</p><p>Adaora Ngozi Onyioha Osimiri-Lewis is a creative professional known for her role as the Creator and Editor-in-Chief/Creative Director of the alt luxury publication Fantôme Magazine (formerly Prysm Magazine). She is also the founder of Goth In The Raw; a raw vegan blog with a dark aesthetic that showcases the benefits of a plant-based diet for individuals, families and children. A vegan since the age of 16, she combines both natural foods and the alternative world through her recipes and advice, making it accessible to all. She will be releasing several cookbooks, food products and wares beginning Spring 2016; along with a YouTube Channel.</p><p><br></p><p>From 2007 to 2009, she fronted the Michigan-based Industrial/Goth band Razorblade Twins (as lyricist/vocalist). Although the band is no more she has a solo project in the works. </p><p><br></p><p>Adaora holds a B.A. in Fashion/Retail Management with a Minor in Advertising from the Art Institute of Pittsburgh. During our major wars, like World War II where people <a href="http://thedropnet.com/brain-pills/" target="_blank">Brain Pills</a> were being drafted they would refuse to serve in the military. <p><b>"StockHolding" becomes first Organisation in India to start accepting payment via Payoye"</b></p><p>In a revolutionary move, <b>StockHolding</b> will begin accepting payments via Unified Payment Platform, <b>"Payoye"</b>,<b> </b>starting from 1st February, 2016. <b>StockHolding</b> will provide this unique facility to all its DEMAT clients to facilitate seamless payments.</p><p>StockHolding, widely renowned for its initiatives in bringing about technological innovations into financial services, has now become the first organisation in India, to make this kind of tie up.</p><p>Payoye is a disruptive Cardless, Cashless, Contact-less Unified Payment Platform, with which payments can be done via any instrument such as Credit Card, Debit Card, Cash Card, Internet Banking, e-Wallets and IMPS. Payoye has incorporated OYETag in all bills that customers can simply scan via their mobile App and pay instantly or save for later. It can be used to make a variety of payments like retail payments, paper based payments, online payments, social media payments etc. Independent of any other hardware or software integration, it is easy to use, highly accessible and can be rapidly scaled. It also provides six layers of protection using military standard encryption, which keeps the users sensitive information extremely safe. Payoye, basically lets its customers skip the chaotic process of making various payments by giving them a single platform, wherein they can make all their payments with ease.</p><p>By making this alliance with Payoye, StockHolding has dramatically increased its options of payment collection via multiple instruments like E-Wallet, Credit Card, Debit Card etc. without the need for any other hardware or software integration.</p><p>With this path-breaking initiative, StockHolding clients now have an option to make seamless, on-the-go payments with Payoye, using credit/debit card, net banking, e-wallets etc. There will be no need to go online or visit StockHolding counters as they shall have the freedom to make hassle-free payments from their smart phones or tablets by just scanning the OYETag. </p><p>Considering the fast-paced and stressful lives most people lead, StockHoldings latest move comes as a welcome relief and certainly has the ability to make the process of payments much more easy, comfortable, seamless and secure.</p><p><b>About StockHolding</b></p><p>Stock Holding Corporation of India Ltd. (StockHolding) is promoted and owned by leading Financial Institutions and Insurance Majors such as IFCI Ltd, SU-UTI, LIC, GIC, NIA, NICL, TOICL and UIC, all leaders in their respective fields of business. StockHolding is a Government Company, being a subsidiary of IFCI. StockHolding has widespread network of branches across the country. StockHolding as one of the market leaders providing financial services over the last 26 years holds Assets under custody of Rs. 30 trillion, the largest in India. StockHolding enjoys the trust of lakhs of customers given its Institutional status and has a proven track record of Operational processes and Service capabilities. StockHolding provides Demat, Sub Broking, E-stamping, Document Management Systems, Distribution of Investment products such as Mutual Funds, Fixed Deposits, Bonds, Debentures, IPOs, Bullion and Distribution of Loan products. StockHolding also provides services for National Pension System (NPS).</p><p>Visit <a href="http://www.stockholding.com/">www.stockholding.com</a> , Call on Toll Free 1800229960, SMS to 5607005</p><p>                        </p><p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><b>DUSSELDORF, Germany (February 2, 2016)  trivagos current headquarters in Dusseldorf, Germany are getting a bit tight. With 222% growth since 2012, the multinational team of 950 </b><b>needs</b><b> room to grow</b><b>, which is why </b><b>trivago has </b><b>commissioned a new state-of-the-art campus </b><b>it plans to </b><b>relocate to </b><b>in 2018.</b></p><p> We thought about moving people into the basement, but decided that building a campus might be a slightly better idea says Founder and Managing Director, Rolf Schrömgens. <b></b></p><p>With less than $1M as an initial investment, trivago has organically grown over the past nine years to nearly $500M (2015) turnover and more than $4B (2015) in market place revenue. Still growing by more than 58% YoY, the team sees moving into a new campus not only as a necessity, but as just the beginning.&nbsp; </p><p>The curved, six-story high-rise, (accommodates 2,000) has been designed by SOP Architekten  and will offer 26,000 m² (280,000 ft2) of open, accessible space  with room to expand by an additional 1,500, to a 16-story building next door.</p><p>As with the current headquarters, the new campus will include creatively-themed rooms and kitchens, and continue to offer trivago sponsored activities  from Bouldering to Krav Maga and Aerial Yoga. The health-conscious working atmosphere will also remain, with organic fruit and healthy lunches still being offered at no cost to employees, as well as ergonomic chairs, standing desks and access to fitness facilities and daily classes. Additionally, the team will have access to local parks, a green rooftop as well as expansive dining areas. </p><p>Our goal is to attract the best talent from all over the world. With 63 nationalities all sitting in one office, making sure everyone feels comfortable is really important, says Sydney Burdick, trivago Global Corporate Communication.</p><p><a href="http://company.trivago.com/2016/01/27/trivago-unveils-plans-new-global-campus-pretty-rad/?utm_source=PRGenie(FreePR)&amp;utm_medium=Press%20release%20link&amp;utm_campaign=Free%20PR%20sites" target="_blank">keep reading</a></p><p>              </p><p>Jeremy Crider  Manager, US/Canada Public Relations<br> <a href="mailto:Jeremy.Crider@trivago.com">Jeremy.Crider@trivago.com</a> </p>
<p></p><p>  <p><b>DÜSSELDORF, Germany  trivagos current headquarters in Düsseldorf, Germany are getting a bit tight, to say the least. With 222% growth since 2012, the multinational team of 950 </b><b>needs</b><b> room to grow</b><b>, which is why </b><b>trivago has </b><b>commissioned a new state-of-the-art campus </b><b>it plans to </b><b>relocate to </b><b>in 2018.</b></p>  <p><br> We thought about moving people into the basement, but decided that building a campus might be a slightly better idea says Founder and Managing Director, Rolf Schrömgens. <b></b></p>  <p>With less than $1M as an initial investment, <a>trivago</a> has organically grown over the past nine years to nearly $500M (2015) turnover and more than $4B (2015) in market place revenue. Still growing by more than 58% YoY, the team at trivago sees moving into a new campus not only as a necessity, but as just the beginning.&nbsp; </p>  <p><b>A few of the details </b></p>  <p>The curved, six - story high-rise, (to accommodate 2,000) has been designed by SOP Architekten in Düsseldorf  and will offer 26,000 m² (280,000 ft2) of open, accessible space  with room to expand by an additional 1,500, to a 16-story building next door. </p>  <p>As with the current headquarters, the new campus will include creatively-themed rooms and kitchens, and will continue to offer trivago sponsored activities  from Bouldering to Krav Maga and Aerial Yoga. The health-conscious working atmosphere will also remain, with organic fruit and healthy lunches still being offered at no cost to employees, as well as ergonomic chairs, standing desks and access to fitness facilities and daily classes. Additionally, the team will have access to local parks, a green rooftop as well as expansive dining areas. </p>  <p><b>Why we decided to build a campus</b></p>  <p>Our goal is to attract the best talent from all over the world. With 63 nationalities all sitting in one office, making sure everyone feels comfortable and at home is really important, says Sydney Burdick, trivago Global Corporate Communication.</p>  <p>Which is why trivago names meeting rooms after individuals hometowns, offers monthly team events and creates many opportunities in and outside of the office to get to know one another. </p>  <p>Creating a nice office is not enough in itself. We want our new campus to be a reflection of our culture and our values, which we see as the main drivers behind our success. Many people are puzzled when they realize that we have nearly our entire global team sitting in one place; but by bringing everyone together, we have seen that coworking and collaborating on a daily basis is fundamental to building mutual trust. It enforces an exchange of information, accelerates action being taken and speeds-up learning, adds Burdick. </p>  <p><b>Where you will find us</b></p>  <p>The new campus will sit on the docks of Kesselstraße in the Düsseldorf Media Harbour. It will be easily accessible by tram and by bike, (which is important, as less than 10% of trivago teammates are traveling to work by car) and close to the famous New Zollhof buildings, designed by Frank Gehry. Düsseldorf, which came in sixth in the world on Mercer Consultancys Quality of Living Rankings in 2015, is home to some of the regions local restaurants, galleries and businesses. </p>  <p>Want to learn more about trivago? Visit us at <a href="http://trv.to/companytrivagoUS">company.trivago.com</a> or watch <a href="http://trv.to/124ReasonsUS">124 Reasons to work at trivago</a>. You can also see what were up to at the moment on Instagram #lifeattrivago. </p>  <p>Interested in working with us? We have 100+ open positions online at <a href="http://trv.to/JobsTrivagoUS">trivago.com/jobs</a>.&nbsp; </p>  <p><b>&nbsp;</b></p>  <p><b>About trivago</b></p>  <p>trivago is the worlds largest hotel search, which empowers&nbsp;120+ million travelers every month in their search for their ideal hotel. By using trivago, you can sift through over 900,000 hotels, from 250+ booking sites and hotel chains in 190+ countries, at once. Our team of 950 creative and focused minds from all corners of the globe, wakes up every day to create a hotel search that is straight forward, transparent and unbiased so you know exactly what your options are. trivago, was founded in 2005, and currently operates on 55 live international platforms in 33 languages.</p>  </p><br>
<p>text <a href="http://google.com" target="_blank">text </a>text </p>
<p>Horsham, PA -- February 03, 2016 -- One of the most iconic personalities in the automotive repair market has been given new life and a new look: Cottman Transmission and Total Auto Care  a leader in the auto repair industry  has reenvisioned and revitalized The Cottman Man as an animated character into The Cottman Man Educational Video Series. </p><p>Long respected for his trustworthy demeanor, The Cottman Man was the embodiment of every Cottman center technician: capable and honest; a friend in the auto repair business the guy who was there to offer a hand when a car wasnt living up to expectations. </p><p>In his new persona, The Cottman Man will be the host on every Cottman center web site, offering tips on auto maintenance and repair considerations, to help make informed decisions about auto repair needs. </p><p>The Cottman Man is someone were proud to stand behind, says Derik Beck, Cottmans VP of Digital Marketing. Hes an image of the very best in each of us: our centers and ourselves. And hes someone we want to emulate every day in our centers, all across the country. Presenting him as an animated character for our web sites allows us to breathe new life into our most cherished concept: serving the motoring community. </p><p>The animated Cottman Man will appear on the Cottman web site, Cottman.com, on <a href="https://www.youtube.com/user/CottmanAutoCare" target="_blank">Cottmans YouTube channel</a>, and then from there hell make his way onto the individual Cottman center web sites. </p><p>The Cottman Man Educational Video Series will include: </p><p></p><ul><li><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6bailxSQx3o&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Reasons To Have Your Battery and Charging System </a></li><li><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kOObSygABKk&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Reasons To Have Your Belts and Hoses Checked</a>&nbsp;</li><li><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HeVxioADXR0&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Reasons To Have Your Brakes Checked</a>&nbsp;</li><li><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FbN6JW3o_3c&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Reasons To Have Your Cooling/Heating System Checked</a>&nbsp;</li><li><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NufCNS93SRo&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Reasons To Have Your Engine Checked</a></li><li><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rcQ0JdBCZR8&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Reasons To Have Your Exhaust System Checked</a>&nbsp;</li><li><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=behW_WWqQv0&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">Reasons To Have Your Transmission Checked</a>&nbsp;</li></ul><p></p><p></p><p></p><p>In his first series of animated short videos, The Cottman Man will provide checklists to help consumers recognize problems with a vehicle. Additional videos will come out later in the year and will introduce tips to help keep a car running right for years to come. Each video will be less than a minute long, and will present complex issues in friendly, easy-to-understand language. </p><p>Your car is important to you; caring for it shouldnt be something to dread, says Cottman President Randy Wright. The animated Cottman Man will provide consumers with the information they need in a clear, friendly style. Were thrilled to be able to provide this level of technical advice in such an accessible format. </p><p>For more information, or to see the new, animated Cottman Man in action, visit the Cottman web site on line at <a href="http://www.cottman.com/videos/" target="_blank">Cottman.com</a>. </p><p><b>About Cottman Transmission and Total Auto Care: </b></p><p>With locations across the U.S., Cottman Transmission and Total Auto Care is a transmission and auto repair brand that services almost any make or model vehicle, foreign or domestic. Cottman Transmission and Total Auto Care centers specialize in complete transmission service, brakes, suspension, air conditioning service and much more. Cottmans headquarters is based in Horsham, Pennsylvania. For more information, please visit <a href="http://www.Cottman.com">www.Cottman.com</a> and <a href="http://www.TheCottmanManBlog.com">www.TheCottmanManBlog.com</a>.<br></p><p><img alt="" src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/robin8-production/robin8-production/124d8049-81d8-47f1-82fc-63fa08b8d5d3/2316CottmanManEducationalVideoSeriesOpeningbanner3.png"><br></p><p>Media Contact:&nbsp;</p><p>Derik Beck <br>VP of Digital Marketing <br>Cottman Transmission and Total Auto Care <br>dbeck@cottman.com&nbsp;</p><p></p><p></p>

<p>                  </p><p><b>Operation Kindness Offers Unique Gifts to Benefit Homeless Animals</b></p><p>CARROLLTON, TEXAS (Feb. 2, 2016)There are many ways to share the love this Valentine's Day, but very few gifts last longer than the holiday. This year Operation Kindness is offering a unique selection of gifts from its <i>Kindness Katalog</i> to show the special someone in your life how much you care, while saving the lives of homeless animals.</p><p>From life-saving surgeries to warm, cozy beds for homeless animals, there are delightful gifts at all price points. You can find a gift that gives back for everyone in your life  whether shopping for your romantic interest or your grandmother. One hundred percent of the proceeds will directly benefit the homeless animals at Operation Kindness, the original and largest no-kill animal shelter in North Texas.</p><p>Flowers wilt and boxes of chocolate quickly break our New Years resolutions, but a gift from the <i>Kindness Katalog</i> will continue to give even after the holiday has passed, says Operation Kindness CEO Jim Hanophy. It is through gifts like these that we have saved the lives of more than 85,000 homeless since we opened in 1976.</p><p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; <i>Kindness Katalog</i> gifts include:</p><p>·&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;  E-Cards  Sending an e-card is an easy way to reach out to Valentines near and far. With a donation of $15 or more, you can select a one-of-a-kind Valentines design to send a message to your sweetheart.</p><p>·&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;  Pet Bed  For a homeless animal, a warm and comfy bed is often their first touch of kindness. For $25, this gift helps ensure every animal has a soft, cozy surface to sleep on every day.</p><p>·&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;  Life-saving heartworm treatment for two dogs  Save two warm, loving hearts by providing medical treatment for two dogs suffering from heartworms, a preventable but deadly disease if left untreated, with a $500 donation.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>To browse the <i>Kindness Katalog</i>, visit <a href="http://www.operationkindness.org/opk/">http://www.operationkindness.org/opk/</a>.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><b>About Operation Kindness</b><br> Founded in 1976, Operation Kindness is the original and largest no-kill shelter in North Texas. Its mission is to care for homeless cats and dogs in a no-kill environment until each is adopted into responsible homes and to advocate humane values and behavior. Operation Kindness has saved nearly 85,000 animals since its inception. The shelter assists more than 5,000 dogs and cats each year, caring for an average of 300 animals daily with another 100-150 animals in foster homes.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Join Operation Kindness in their mission to care for homeless animals by becoming a member of the Happy Tails Society. This group of dedicated friends provides a monthly gift to help pay for medical care, medicine, food, shelter, nurturing and behavior training the pets need to have a second chance at life. Learn more about Operation Kindness at <a href="http://www.OperationKindness.org">http://www.OperationKindness.org</a> or on Facebook (<a href="http://www.facebook.com/pages/Operation-Kindness/30251945822">www.facebook.com/pages/Operation-Kindness/30251945822</a>).</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>###</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><b>Contact:</b></p><p>Katie Hill-Mudd</p><p>TrizCom PR </p><p><a href="mailto:jo@Trizcom.com">Katie@TrizCom.Com</a></p><p>Office: 972-247-1369</p><p>Cell: 214-676-4254</p><p>                                                                    </p><p>&nbsp;</p>

Our mission is to solve the worlds most intractable problems through biology as a technology by empowering scientists to become entrepreneurs who drive innovation that changes the world for the better. The IndieBio accelerator program uniquely provides startups with a fully equipped lab, ?world class mentors and significant seed funding to take brilliant biotech ideas from concept to commercialization. </p> 					<p>About SOSV </p> 					<p>SOSV ?(?@SOSVvc?)  The Accelerator VC  is a venture fund with US $250M AUM operating six global accelerator programs: ?Chinaccelerator ?for internet in Shanghai, ?HAX ?for hardware in Shenzhen and San Francisco, ?IndieBio ?for biotech in San Francisco and Cork, Ireland, ?FOOD-X? for food in NYC. SOSV invests in over 150 companies per year and over its two-decade history has a net realized IRR of over 30%, putting it in the top 5% of private equity managers in the world. </p> 					<p><b>IndieBio Executive Team</b> </p> 					<p>Arvind Gupta, ?@arvndgpta<br> IndieBio Founder and SOSV General ?Partner<br> Formerly the design director of product development and strategy at ?IDEO?and co-founder of fitness startup Starters, Arvind brings over a decade of experience in helping startups and Fortune 50 companies launch new tech products. Our technology produces a true functional window to the living dynamic brain, which will revolutionize our understanding of how it works and our ability to prevent and treat brain-related health problems. </p> 								</div> 							</div> 						</div> 					</td> 				</tr> 			</tbody></table> 			<table> 				<tbody><tr> 					<td> 						<div> 							 						</div> 						<div> 							<div> 								<div> 									<p>CEO: Andrew Gray<br> Email: ?Andrew.gray@valinano.com Location: Monrovia, CA </p> 								</div> 							</div> 						</div> 						<div> 							 						</div> 					</td> 					<td> 						<div> 							<div> 								<div> 									<p>Vali Nanomedical </p> 									<p>Vali is bringing medicine into the 21st century with smart, programmable delivery of therapeutics and imaging agents. We are partnering with major Pharma companies to solve their delivery problems; this year we will launch a novel imaging agent that can be used for basic research and as a clinical diagnostic tool. Our technology can also reprogram cancer cells to commit suicide while their healthy neighbors thrive - we envision a future in which we enable in vivo synthetic biology, curing disease without using drugs at all. </p> 								</div> 							</div> 						</div> 					</td> 				</tr> 			</tbody></table> 			<table> 				<tbody><tr> 					<td> 						<div> 							 						</div> 						<div> 							<div> 								<div> 									<p>CEO: Jeff Nosanov<br> Email: ?jeff@vsensemedical.com Location: Rockville, MD </p> 								</div> 							</div> 						</div> 						<div> 							 						</div> 					</td> 					<td> 						<div> 							<div> 								<p>V-Sense Medical </p> 								<p>Every year millions of patients develop diseases that could be prevented with monitoring and early detection of vital sign abnormalities. V-Sense developed the Sentinel Monitor from NASA radar technology to remotely and continuously measure key vital signs of everyone in a room. As we deploy the Sentinel in nursing homes and then residential homes, well gather half a million hours per day of predictive vital sign data that subscribing medical networks can use to predict and prevent disease. </p> 							</div> 						</div> 					</td> 				</tr> 			</tbody></table> 		</div></div>
<div> <div> <p>Its no secret that paper shuffling consumes more of the doctors  workday than interacting with patients. Between checking the schedule,  writing charts, writing prescriptions, and waiting for tardy patients, a  busy physicians day can become cluttered by tasks that have little to  do with medical practice. Wouldnt it be nice to streamline the chaos  with an efficient telehealth program? Besides allowing doctors to  interact with patients remotely, telemedicine platforms can automate  data collection, enhancing EMRs with instantly captured information  gleaned from patient telemedicine sessions. They can send automated  appointment reminders to patients, cutting the no-show rate and making  better use of a doctors time. And the eHealth services they provide can  drastically reduce paperwork, enabling physicians to focus on actual  patient care. ConnectExpert offers all these features, and its flexible  enough to use with a PC or an iOS system.</p></div></div><div><div><p>Imagine being able to  update an EMR automatically. Rather than putting pen to paper and taking  physical notesnotes that later must be transcribed by a stafferthe  script or recording of a telehealth session is automatically analyzed,  and the files are updated. Its just that easy. Instead of looking at a  paper chart a patient filled in while sitting in the waiting room,  imagine receiving an electronic file containing all the information you  need. Imagine a digital file for each patient in your practice. Imagine  being able to check within each file for possible drug interactions, or a  preexisting condition that may be causing symptoms. It can all be a  reality with ConnectExpert.</p><p>For more information, please, feel free to visit<a target="_blank" href="http://connectexpert.com/features"> http://connectexpert.com/features</a></p><p>Apart  from the reduced paperwork, appointment reminders, and data collection  capabilities, technology enabled care has another key benefit: cutting  out the need for in-office consultation visits. Very often, doctors are  compelled to see patients merely to check-in on their overall state of  health. Theyre being given a primer course before surgery, or advice on  treatment, or a quick follow-up check up. Wouldnt it be nice to  conduct those light appointments remotely? If patient care requires  little more than the ability to communicate, why shouldnt it be done  via a telemedicine platform? In this way, a doctors time in the office  can be used in the most efficient way possible: doing exams, procedures,  and providing hands-on care.</p><p>Contact Info:</p><p>Address: Web CS Limited, 6 St. Davids Square, Westferry Road,</p><p>London, United Kingdom, E14 3WA</p><p>Tel.: +44 (0) 20-351-984-77</p><p>E-mail: info@connectexpert.com</p><p>Facebook:<a target="_blank" href="https://www.facebook.com/connectexpert"> https://www.facebook.com/connectexpert</a></p><p>Twitter:<a target="_blank" href="https://twitter.com/Connect2Expert"> https://twitter.com/Connect2Expert</a></p><p>Linkedin:<a title="Link: https://www.linkedin.com/company/connect-expert" target="_blank" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/connect-expert"> https://www.linkedin.com/company/connect-expert</a></p><p>Website:<a target="_blank" href="http://connectexpert.com/"> http://connectexpert.com/</a></p> </div> </div><br>

<p><b>If youre a hunger organization, you worry about the winter more than any other time of the year.</b> &nbsp;During the holiday giving season, many groups sponsor food drives. &nbsp;Once January hits, its crickets. &nbsp;Winter food drives are rare - weather conditions make them hard to organize and difficult to donate to. &nbsp;Those groups that sponsored holiday food drives will wait awhile before organizing their next one. &nbsp; The result is a huge drop in food donations and a corresponding cut in the amount &nbsp;of food that can be distributed. &nbsp;</p><p>The other challenge is sourcing fresh produce. &nbsp;Hunger organizations have increasingly recognized the importance of supplying healthier food to those they support - including fresh fruits and vegetables. &nbsp;Many people facing hunger also struggle with diet related conditions such as diabetes, hypertension and obesity due to lack of access to healthy food. &nbsp;In the summer and early fall, many hunger organizations can rely upon local farms to help them. &nbsp;Once the growing season ends, fresh produce donations reduce to a trickle. &nbsp;</p><p><a href="http://www.ampyourgood.com" target="_blank">Amp Your Goods Crowd-Feeding</a> system is designed to tackle both of those problems. &nbsp;Crowd-Feeding enables groups to sponsor a food drive thats run entirely online. &nbsp; Instead of traveling to a collection box to drop off food, people purchase the food they want to donate at Amps website and the food is delivered for them directly to the hunger organization they want to support. &nbsp; Traditional food drives are limited to non-perishable food items because the donated food is going to sit in a collection box for awhile before it gets delivered. &nbsp;With Crowd-Feeding, theres no collection box so people can donate perishable food like fresh produce. &nbsp;</p><p><b>Some winter food drives being run around the US</b>:</p><p><a href="https://amplify.ampyourgood.com/user/campaigns/2391" target="_blank">Real Estate Company in Greenwich, CT</a></p><p><a href="https://amplify.ampyourgood.com/user/campaigns/2411" target="_blank">Boy Scout Troop in NJ</a></p><p><a href="https://amplify.ampyourgood.com/user/campaigns/1901" target="_blank">High School in SF Bay Area</a></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p>

<div><img alt="" src="http://www.ucarecdn.com/13735469-904c-4882-bdf2-b7ba0fb5bbcb/" title="Image httpwwwucarecdncom13735469-904c-4882-bdf2-b7ba0fb5bbcb"><br></div><p><a href="https://twitter.com/HarrowSports" target="_blank">Harrow Sports</a> announces that world-renowned Professional Squash player and <a href="http://www.harrowsports.com/squashteam" target="_blank">Harrow ELITE Team</a> athlete Ryan Cuskelly is the 2015 U.S. Pro Squash Series Champion. The U.S. Pro Squash Series consists of 20 Professional Squash Association sanctioned events, with players participating in a minimum of four tournaments and collecting points at each. Cuskelly completed in five tournaments throughout 2015, amassing 1,380 points total. The runner up is <a href="http://www.harrowsports.com/" target="_blank">Harrow</a> Player and ELITE Team member, Alan Clyne.</p><p>"I'm really happy to win the U.S pro series it really tops off my best year so far on the PSA tour. Also being based in the US it's extra special for me as I play most of my events here and can see the US pro series really growing as there are more and more tournaments every year," said Cuskelly.</p><p>Ranked No. 16 in the World, Cuskellys winning series included victories at the Oregon Open, a runner-up finish at the Charlottesville Open, a final four position at the Pittsburgh Open, a quarter-final place at the Houston Open, and a qualifying finals exit at last months Motor City Open.</p><p>Ryan Cuskelly joined Harrows <a href="http://www.harrowsports.com/squashteam" target="_blank">ELITE Team</a> in March of 2015. The ELITE Team is made up of top <a href="http://www.harrowsports.com/" target="_blank">Harrow</a>-sponsored Professional Squash Players from around the world. In the U.S. Pro Squash Series, ELITE members Alan Clyne placed second, and Abdulla Al Tamimi came in seventh.</p>
<div>I know, you're busy! </div><div></div><div><div>You're crazy busy, I know&nbsp;you are kicking ass and taking names most days...&nbsp;</div><div>but inside you're feeling crappy, tired, hangry and just plain bad most of the time, even though you try not to show it.</div><div></div><div>You wish things would change, but you don't know how and part of you is afraid to try something else new, because you're pretty sure that&nbsp;it won't work either&nbsp;(hello $200 juicer and unused gym membership).&nbsp;<br><br></div><div><div><div>I heard a great saying the other day..</div><div>Human Beings are like icebergs, they only</div><div>show about 10% of who they really are.</div><div></div><div>If you're reading this,&nbsp;I know you're amazing,</div><div>I know you care more than you show it,</div><div>I know you want to reveal your&nbsp;dazzle into the world...</div><div></div><div>The saddest part of being like an iceberg is that most of the time its our&nbsp;greatness&nbsp;we hide from each other.</div><div></div><div>Does that ring true for you?</div><div>Do you hide your light, your power, your beauty</div><div>beneath negativity that serves as protection,&nbsp;</div><div>do you try not to give TOO much to others,</div><div>especially when they don't DESERVE it?</div><div></div><div>Do you reserve the BEST parts of you... for... you?</div><div></div><div>I want to ask you to consider that your&nbsp;</div><div>beauty, giving nature and light is for you</div><div>to enjoy and give freely, not for others to earn. I want you to just consider the idea that you are supposed to&nbsp;feel beautiful and vibrant most of the time...&nbsp;</div><div></div><div>For me this thought has been a compelling reason&nbsp;to be more giving, more authentic and&nbsp;</div><div>more beautiful, to truly attempt living out loud.</div><div></div><div>I feel that often we tie our beauty up into our worth,&nbsp;and to avoid giving and shining because it is&nbsp;risky,&nbsp;it is scary to be noticed, to stand out, be vulnerable&nbsp;and to be considered by others as better than, conceited and too beautiful, too authentic and possibly even weird.</div><div></div><div>We are fascinated by people who achieve this, but also quick to point out that they are flawed as well. (Hint: we all are and we can forgive ourselves)</div><div></div><div>I find that food is often involved in the layer of protection we hide behind, comforting ourselves with "comfort foods" instead of revealing ourselves vulnerable  to others by&nbsp;saying that we want more intimacy, more authenticity and more love... and even more beauty.</div><div></div><div>As I've written before, when we are busy thinking, consuming and regretting our food choices, we have no room to&nbsp;feel our feelings... this is what emotional eating is.&nbsp;Food takes the place of our emotions.</div><div></div><div>I know those are scary words... they almost sound like a medical diagnosis from which you'll never recover,</div><div></div><div>but truthfully they just represent a choice, probably a habit at this point.</div><div></div><div>At New Year's people want to&nbsp;instantly change the habits,</div><div>but they don't first change their thoughts...and they wind up giving up in a couple weeks.</div><div></div><div>When you first start to get clear on what you want</div><div>and how you want to live, that makes your habits</div><div>much easier to change...</div><div></div><div>I want to ask you what are your intentions for this year?</div><div></div><div>What is the life you want to live so much that you are almost afraid to say it out loud?</div><div></div><div>That is what I want for you,</div><div>to live your life out loud.</div><div></div><div>My intention behind Newport Skinny Tea has always been to help women live their most beautiful, authentic, healthy lives. I do that by continually innovating and simplifying products and information that make living an amazing life simple and enjoyable.</div><div></div><div>Truly this company has been one of the best parts of my life and I thank you from the bottom of my heart that you have let me be a part of your journey, I want you to know that I do not take the responsibility lightly.</div><div></div><div>Tomorrow I will be announcing the details of the January Tea Challenge, its a special and emotional day for me, I will talk about it more then.</div><div></div><div>You deserve the best, this year its your time&nbsp;</div><div>to Shine!</div></div></div></div><div><div></div></div><div>Wishing you the best in health &amp; happiness!</div>

<p>Do you wish to have aquarium in your house? The thing you should decide on is the kind of fishes you would want in the tank. Once you have decided on this the next thing you have to think about is fish food. It is one of the significant things for keeping your tank healthy.<br><br>There are many kinds of food available. It is always good for you to have idea regarding the kinds of fish food available online.</p><p>Flake food is known to be one of the most common type of food. These are easy to use. You just have to sprinkle it in water and the fishes will come to eat. There are varieties of flakes available for particular fish at the online stores.<br><br>For the saltwater fish diet, marine flakes are popular. Apart from that tropical flake is available for fish such as angels, barbs etc. There are specially designed flakes available for goldfish. The ingredients of the flakes are based on the natural diet of fishes. These flakes are the basic staple food for all fish.<br><br>Pellet is the other type of fish food online Australia. These are available in different sizes however majority are for large fish. One of the common kinds of pellet available is cichlid pellet. There are some of the kinds of pellets which are designed to float on the other hand others will slowly sink which is beneficial for bottom dwellers. In case you have large fish such as catfish, Oscars etc you can consider purchasing pellets.<br><br>You can buy fish food like freeze dried foods as they are the best alternative to the live food. It is the kind of food that is completely natural. It comprises of lot of nutritional value and the taste that fish are tempted to. Some of the varieties available for such fish food are bloodworms, plankton and others.</p><p>One thing that you need to know is that frozen food is loved by the fish. Hence you can consider frozen fish food online Australia. This is available in natural form having various varieties like krill, shrimp and others. You can feed this food as the supplement to the regular staple diet. This is known to be the best option to live food.<br><br>Spirulana is a fish food, also available at <a title="Link: http://victorbolden.piwigo.com/picture?/1/category/1-aquaristic_online" target="_blank" href="http://victorbolden.piwigo.com/picture?/1/category/1-aquaristic_online">aquaristic online</a> and most of the fishes love these nutritional algae. This is best for herbivorous cichlids as well as saltwater fishes like tangs and clownfish. You can feed this kind of food as their regular diet.<br><br>These are some of the kinds of fish food online that you can consider purchasing for your fish tank. The only thing you need to be careful about is selecting the correct site for purchasing these. Only when you have selected the best site you will be able to get quality food for your fish.<br></p><br><br>

Nimble Accounting is based on a unique cloud architecture with process automations and innovative work flow dedicated to bring down steep reduction in the day to day accounting book keeping efforts. Innovative data entry concepts guides the user in making the correct entries with minimum errors. This allows even non-accounting sector individuals to perform complex accounting tasks such as accrual entries, financial reports which are automated, saving significantly in recruitment of man power costs on a long run. <p> Configuration : Nimble Accounting is a cloud-based all in one accounting package that is securely accessible over Internet. All you may need is a computer or tablet or a smart phone for you to log in from anywhere, at any time and access all of your information in one easy-to-read format which is presented in an intelligent way and is also customizable to suit your business requirements. Reduce your days outstanding while accommodating your clients complex billing requirements. </p><p> Nimble Accounting is integrated with a user-friendly Control panel that allows valid Business Users to control basics such as adding new Users, Goals and customized Fields to configure more complex Business process work-flow sheets, taxes, templates, alerts and notifications. Comprehensive permissions with controlled authorization can be given to each user accordingly that are further grouped into for easier process management. Moreover end users can change columns, sorting and layouts for their specific login which can be saved for a user friendly overall experience. Data can be edited right on the reports grids for faster updates along with the ability to create their own email and note templates along with customized alerts and email notifications from dashboard to improve productivity. </p><p> Deployment options for end users :  </p><p> 100% customized for IT consulting/staffing and other staffing businesses with Tailor-made solutions for Retail and Restaurant industries. Single login for multiple businesses with solution for businesses with multiple locations or verticals. Timely availability of all information and insights anytime on any computer, laptop, tablet or smart-phone. Save time and money through automated business processes and timely information, including alert mechanisms and paid vs. unpaid, billed vs. non-billed reports similarly processes through POS/vendor system/payroll service provider integrations, automated data entry (like auto accrual entry), report book, single login etc. Early warning of problems and issues through business specific alerts and dashboard metrics  Better control from user access mg-mt, dashboard metrics and graphics, budget and forecasting, global accounting concept, Inter Company Financial Analysis (ICFA) etc.  Better decision making and improved profitability through timely insights from customized reports, flash P&amp;L logs, combined reports, consolidated reports, sales and expense analysis, pending transaction report etc.  Ease of use and pleasant user experience through purpose based accounting, single login, great work-flows, presentation of menu, access to menu items etc. that leads to productivity increases.  Designed to handle complex data, calculations, commissions, payables and receivables. Can create, save, modify ledger, journal books and profit and loss statements and track all day to day transactions along with expenses and timely analytics reports. Complete payroll day to day transactions can be edited on the go along with various recurring transactions can be scheduled with automated reminders. Profit and loss statements, expenses, payments, inter company transactions, bank, cash account statements and all the information can be tracked on the go. Lock &amp; unlock Users to protect privacy of the data along with multiple login options and authorizations. Integrated Dashboard displays notifications, alerts, pop-ups and mails to track your receivables &amp; payables. A customizable platform that is ready to adopt staffing organization's policy with add-on Taxation reminders. Option for cloning or copying of your Vendors Accounts and Data cards is available. Can track individual employees working hours for defined wages and commission payments along with business consultants work and payments. Allows you to pay automated calculated liabilities from processed payrolls along with printing multiple checks. Quick navigation to various links and reports along with a 'Help' option is provided for lag free end user experience. </p><p> Integration Capabilities :  Nimble Accounting is built upon a stable Application Programming Interface Software-as-a-service model (SaaS) application that is user specifically crafted and integrated internally within the interference along with Third party solutions that can easily communicate with the all stable API.  This stable Application Programming Software has a very cleverly user friendly designed interference that allows one to export and Exchange any information from the system as well as import data into the system. Most of the standard files formats are supported including .txt,.xml,.csv and integration with several web based services. </p><p> Unmatched Deployment Options : Nimble Accounting provides the most flexible deployment options to accommodate the needs of larger, demanding Staffing firms. It does provides total control over security and configuration to meet Business User specific requirements. Regardless of deployment option, end users can access all business information on any modern browsers. Nimble Accounting can capture detailed sales information for analysis. The comparison can be performed at a high-level for all the stores combined with previous data. Or you can do a detailed analysis between stores with the current year data and/or with the previous year data. Proactive alerts enable faster lead, job order and service follow up. </p><p> One Dashboard to get a consolidated picture of your business on a daily basis :Nimble Accounting's integrated powerful Dashboard feature provides you with all of your business information in one screen. The dashboard is designed to keep you posted on key performance indicators like aggregate sales details, expenditure details, P&amp;L logs, bank balances and accounts payable. If you need to get to the bottom of it, the drill down capabilities of the dashboard can dig right down to the transaction or employee details. The dashboard also gives you alerts on pending tasks, so that you are invoicing on time and paying your bills on time, besides reminding you of your business related events.Nimble Accounting can keep you posted on the performance levels of your business by letting you to configure it to automatically send flash P&amp;L statements to your mail box every week or for that matter every day with the liberty of picking and choosing the reports that you want to be sent on periodic intervals. </p><p> Available anytime from anywhere Combined Reports : Nimble Accounting is designed and developed for multiple location operations, so that all of your accounts are in one place. Data from all of your locations are automatically consolidated to generate combined P&amp;L logs and combined Balance Sheet for all of your location as and when the need arises. It can automatically create and post the sales accrual entry at the end of every month in order to calculate the exact sales, even if the month end happens during the middle of a week. Passing this entry correctly will generate accurate P&amp;L logs. For franchisees, it automatically maps division codes and generates the monthly P&amp;L statements, eliminating hassles and friction in the process. It can create and post the sales accrual entry at the end of every month in order to calculate the exact sales, even if the month end happens during middle of a week passing this entry correctly will generate accurate P&amp;L logs.. </p><p> Nimble Accounting offers the industry's most innovative enterprise staffing software for contract/temp and direct hire firms across professional, restaurant franchise, commercial and health-care specialties with detailed data capture from the POS system, vendor systems and payroll vendors. Furthermore the automatic creation of accrual entry and automatic consolidation helps in completing the data entry functions in a very short time. </p><p> Normally expanding and developing a business generally requires purchase of new hardware, additional software licenses and a whole lot of effort in setting up as well as support cost. But with Nimble Accounting its a lot simpler, in less than 30 minutes your new location or business is ready for operations and all this works with a small subscription fee.  The pretty simple stable Application Programming Interface Software-as-a-service model (SaaS) application that can be  user specifically crafted and integrated so that you can do it yourself, or if you face any difficulty, our superlative 24x7 support team is always there to help you at no extra cost. Look no further use the Nimble Accounting unique cloud based all in one Accounting Services today for precise automated Staffing solutions to get in control of your Business success. </p><p>  Contact Address:<br> Nimble Accounting<br> 200 Motor Parkway<br> Suite D-26<br> Hauppauge<br> NY <br> USA<br> 11788<br> Phone:<br> (302) 525-4225<br></p>

<p>Golden Heart Senior Care-Rochester Hills will host a three-day <b>Senior Care Job Fair, February 18, 19 &amp; 20 </b>at its office<b>&nbsp;located at 671 E. Big Beaver Road, Suite 111, in Troy, MI</b>. &nbsp;The private duty caregiving agency has immediate part-time and full-time openings for experienced Caregivers and Client Care Managers to provide in-home, non-medical services for clients in Oakland and Macomb Counties. &nbsp;</p><p>Golden Heart Senior Care offers very competitive pay, flexible schedules, paid time off, a 401k plan, opportunities for advancement in a growing company and more great benefits.&nbsp;</p><p><b><u>QUALIFICATIONS</u></b></p><p>Caregiver applicants must have at least three years of professional caregiving experience and training as a nurse assistant, patient care technician or medical assistant.&nbsp; Current State Certification is preferred but not mandatory.</p><p>Applicants for positions as Client Care Managers must have at least five years of professional caregiving experience, at least 1 year of staff management and customer service experience, plus training as a nurse assistant or patient care technician. Current State Certification is preferred but not mandatory.</p><p>Additionally, <u>all</u> applicants must have current CPR and First Aid certifications; experience in working with the elderly; the ability to pass federal and local background checks, as well as a drug screen; their own reliable transportation; a valid drivers license; current vehicle insurance; and a clean driving record. &nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;<b><u>DUTIES &amp; STARTING PAY</u></b></p><p>Caregiver responsibilities include companionship, light housekeeping, personal hygiene care (bathing, grooming, dressing), meal preparation, medication reminders, laundry, errands, walking and transferring assistance, etc.&nbsp; All duties are performed in the clients home. Starting pay for Caregivers is $10 - $10.50/hour based on experience, qualifications, references and certifications.&nbsp; </p><p>Client Care Manager responsibilities include supervision of Caregivers, management of client relationships, on-call support for open shifts, preparation of client care plans and other documentation, scheduling of Caregivers, etc.&nbsp; Duties are performed in the companys Troy office and in clients homes. Starting pay for Client Care Managers is $12.50 - $13/hour based on experience, qualifications, references and certifications.</p><p>&nbsp;<b><u>JOB FAIR HOURS &amp; INFORMATION</u></b></p><p>Hours of the Golden Heart Senior Care Job Fair <b>are 9:00 AM  6:00 PM on February 18 &amp; 19, and 10:00 AM  2:00 PM on February 20. </b>&nbsp;Applicants must <b>bring two copies of their resume and contact information for at least three professional references</b> to the Job Fair.&nbsp; Everyone will be asked to complete a job application when they arrive.&nbsp; If preferred, the job application can be completed online in advance at<b> </b><a href="http://www.goldenheartrochesterhills.com/employment"><b>www.goldenheartrochesterhills.com/employment</b></a>.</p><p>For more information call Sarah at 248-469-0021, ext. #3. </p><p>&nbsp;<i>To learn more about Golden Heart Senior Care-Rochester Hills visit </i><a href="http://www.goldenheartrochesterhills.com/"><i>www.goldenheartrochesterhills.com</i></a><i> or find us on Facebook</i> <i>(</i><a href="https://www.facebook.com/GoldenHeartSeniorCareRH/?ref=hl"><i>facebook.com/GoldenHeartSeniorCareRH</i></a><i>)</i></p>
